Mas a inveja mata e o malvado Brick Jagger, dono da fábrica concorrente, estava quase morrendo quando resolveu raptar Chuck e exigir como resgate os planos do carro.
Para Ophelia o dinheiro não era importante e ela até iria transferir a posse dos planos para o malvadão. Mas Chuck Júnior, pensando em seu futuro, pulou do berço, pegou sua clava e partiu para uma jornada de aventuras atrás de seu pai. Serão 6 fases com vários níveis, chefões, dinossauros, fases de bônus e muitos amigos de Júnior tentando ajudá-lo a ver sua família de novo reunida... reunida, porém rica! Divirta-se com Chuck Rock II.

game.name: Cj Elephant Fugitive

locale.title: Cj Elephant Fugitive
locale.synopsis:
Accused of a crime he did not commit - CJ Elephant is imprisoned in a Zoo. Using advanced peanut propelling weaponry, an uncanny ability to find explosive charges and a handy umbrella he promptly escapes.
Now he must flee London, push on to Paris, across the Alps and career through Cairo until he finally makes it home to Africa.

Acusado de un crimen que no cometió, "CJ Elephant" es encarcelado en un zoológico. Usando un armamento avanzado de propulsión a cacahuetes, una asombrosa habilidad para encontrar cargas explosivas y un práctico paraguas escapa rápidamente. Ahora debe huir a Londres, pasar por París, atravesar los Alpes y correr a través de El Cairo hasta que el finalmente logre llegar a su hogar en África.

Ce titre obscur est l'une des deux suites de CJ's Elephant Antics, un jeu de plateformes édité par Codemasters sur Commodore 64 en 1991 ! Le titre n'a été adapté que sur les micro-ordinateurs de l'époque, une version NES existant sur une compilation non officielle. Ainsi, cette suite parue uniquement sur la portable de Sega en fait d'emblée une pièce de musée...

game.developer: The Big Red Software Company Ltd.

locale.title: Cliffhanger
locale.synopsis: Based on the white-knuckle action-adventure movie starring Sylvester Stallone, Cliffhanger challenges you to brave thundering avalanches, icy cliffs, and the head-spinning heights of the Rocky Mountains while you combat a vicious group of well-armed, extremely dangerous fugitives. You'll hang on for dear life through exciting levels requiring all your strength and skill just to survive. Experience wild new forms of game play like mountain climbing and cave exploration, along with all the excitement of all the incredible hand-to-hand and armed combat action. The adventure isn't over until you find $100 million in stolen loot, defeat the fugitives, and reunite with your friends!

Por 7 niveles que incluyen bosques, grutas y montañas traicioneras los jugadores deben intentar salvar a sus amigos de los locos terroristas utilizando una combinación de técnicas de lucha y alpinismo. Por suerte para ti, puedes utilizar una ametralladora Uzi, navajas y una selección de movimientos mortales de Kung-Fu, pero lo malo es que los terroristas y el terreno conspiran para abatirte.

Voici l'adaptation du film du même nom où vous contrôlez un Silverster Stallone en 8 bits sur console GameGear. Vous devez sauter de roche en roche en éliminant les ennemis pour arriver à bout des niveaux.

locale.title: Clutch Hitter
locale.synopsis: Clutch Hitter is a typical baseball game based on the arcade version of the same name. It has all the Major League teams and their stats for the 1991 season. However, it does not have players names or team names. The game's look is similar to R.B.I. Baseball and it is based off on Sports Talk Baseball for the Genesis. You can also link to another Game Gear and play against a friend. The length of the innings can be determined to choose from five, to seven, to the full nine innings and when batting the screen splits up to see both first and third base to keep an eye on the baserunners.

Es un High Fly Ball ... ¡Se va se va se fue!
Entra en la caja de bateo y prepárate para un poco de calor! Muévete un poco más cerca del plato o sumérgete en la caja, depende del lanzamiento que creas que obtendrás a continuación. Comience su corredor base temprano para adelantarlo con un toque o robar un segundo plano. Mejor aún, taladre esa bola curva colgante en las gradas del jardín izquierdo para obtener una ventaja rápida de dos carreras.
Cuando estás en el montículo, no es solo lo rápido que lanzas, pero donde tiras eso cuenta. Mueva su receptor fuera si desea pellizcar la esquina, o colóquelo dentro para atascar la mezcla para una ventana emergente fácil. Mantenga un ojo en el corredor de base ... una jugada de selección puede sacarlo de una entrada dura. Jugado en casa o en la carretera, tiene toda la acción y la estrategia de lo real. Las salchichas y los cacahuetes se venden por separado.

Clutch Hitter sur Game Gear est l'adaptation arcade du jeu de base-ball du même nom. Toutes les équipes de la Major League de 1991 y sont présentes, en revanche les noms des joueurs ne figurent pas. Il est possible de jouer contre un ami en connectant deux Game Gear.

locale.title: Coca-Cola Kid
locale.synopsis:
Coca Cola Kid is platformer starring the eponymous mascot of the Coca Cola company in the 90s. On his way through the levels, the kid can make use of a skateboard, but has to continue by foot if knocked off. Enemies can be defeated by kicks and flying kicks, energy is -not surprisingly- restored by collecting cans of a certain soft drink.
The game was released in Japan only.

Coca Cola Kid es una plataforma protagonizada por la mascota homónima de la compañía Coca Cola en los años 90. En su camino a través de los niveles, el niño puede hacer uso de una patineta, pero tiene que continuar a pie si es derribado. Los enemigos pueden ser derrotados por patadas y patadas voladoras, la energía es restaurada -no sorprendentemente- al recoger latas de un cierto refresco.
Coca-Cola kid est un jeu de plateforme tiré du film australien réalisé par Dusan Makavejev, sorti en 1985.

locale.title: Columns
locale.synopsis:
Columns is loosely derived from Tetris, as it involves arranging falling blocks in such a way as to clear them. However, in columns they are groups of 3 same-size but varying color blocks, which must be arranged into sequences of 3 or more, either horizontally, vertically or diagonally. Sequences of 4 or 5 count for double or triple points, and diagonal sequences score the most. The real trick is to set up 'combos' - where one line causes other blocks to drop so as to create other lines.
As well as the normal game mode, there is also a 'flash' mode, in which the aim is simply to remove a particular block from the base of the pre-formed pile of bricks. The difficulty of this can be determined by increasing the number of complete rows which are already in place.
Regrese a la antigua Fenicia y acepte el reto de Columns, el juego predilecto de los antiguos mercaderes. Olvídese del tiempo y diviértase con este excelente juego de estrategia y habilidad.

Columns sur Game Gear est un puzzle-game dans lequel votre tâche consiste à disposer des blocs de sorte à les faire disparaître. Les blocs disparaissent lorsque trois éléments de couleur identique, au minimum, sont en contact, ceci de manière horizontale, verticale ou diagonale, cette dernière méthode rapportant le plus de points.

Starten Sie zu einer Reise in die Vergangenheit ins Reich der Phönizier, und stellen Sie Ihre Geschicklichkeit an antiken Säulen auf die Probe. Zeit und Raum sind vergessen, während Sie sich in diesem genialen Spiel, das Strategie und Geschicklichkeit erfordert, verlieren.

Este jogo é fácil de aprender e difícil de largar! As peças coloridas cairão do alto e você deverá formar colunas na vertical, horizontal ou diagonal.
À medida que você avançar no jogo as peças cairão cada vez mais depressa tornando o desafio ainda maior. Junte as frutas, as pedras e os náipes e utilize toda a sua perícia para vencer este quebra cabeças.
Neste jogo o CABO DE JOGO MÚLTIPLO pode ser utilizado.

locale.title: Cool Spot
locale.synopsis: Cool Spot is a solid, colorful platform game featuring the 7-up mascot in the hero position. The game objective is fairly simple; you have to collect enough number of bonuses throughout each level in order to find the trapped Spots.

NO HAY MANERA! ¡Los amigos güays de los Cool SPOT están encerrados! ¡CLARO QUE HAY UNA MANERA! Los Cool SPOT están aquí para alegranos el día! Corta el rollo des maravilloso escenario, de la pasmosa animación y de los apetitosos sonidos de fondo y a jugar hombre, esto es la mar espeluznante...

Cool Spot sur Game Gear est un jeu de plates-formes coloré où règne la "cool attitude". Vous incarnez la mascotte de la marque de boisson 7up. L'objectif est de collecter un maximum de bouchons à travers le niveau pour passer au prochain.

Was??? Die Kumpel von Cool SPOT sind in Knast gelandet! Nur nicht verzagen! Cool SPOT ist gekommen, um sie da rauszuhalen! Nur hör eindlich auf, über die verträumte Landschaft, die atemberaubenden Animationen und die irren Hintergrundgeräusche zu staunen. Ran ans Spiel! Junge, jetzt geht's rund...

Cool Spot era um mascote da 7 Up no início da segunda metade da década de 1980. Durante este tempo, a mancha vermelha no logo da 7 UP foi antropomorfizada: dado braços, pernas, boca e óculos de sol.
A Virgin Interactive produziu um jogo de plataforma estrelando o Cool Spot. O game foi elogiado por sua jogabilidade desafiante e gráficos suaves, assim como a maioria de suas músicas de fundo compostas por Tommy Tallarico, a qual ganhou prêmios.

locale.title: Cosmic Spacehead
locale.synopsis: Linus had crash landed on a distant planet called Earth, and made his way back home again. Trouble is, no one believes his tale of the planet he discovered! Your job is to help Linus make his way back to planet Earth so he can take some pictures to convince his friends. Gameplay consists of two parts, an adventure and arcade action. In adventure mode you can explore lands, find objects, and talk to people. Sentences can be constructed by using the pointer to select actions or objects on the screen (This is similar to the interface LucasArts used in games such as Maniac Mansion.) To reach many new locations involves the action mode, where you will need to cross treacherous landscapes and evade dangerous creatures. This portion resembles a side scrolling platform game. Once you've cleared an action sequence, you will not need to do so again if you decide to revisit a location. Whenever you wish you can receive a password allowing you to continue the game later from the same point.

¡Sumerge tus sentidos en esta gigantesca odisea extraterrestre de descubrimiento cósmico! ¡Una aventura radical, un impresionante arcade y soberbios sub-juegos se combinan en la gesta de ciencia ficción de los años cincuenta que Cosmic Spacehead tiene que llevar a cabo para probar la existencia de la Tierra!

Cosmic Spacehead est un jeu de plates-formes/aventure sur Game Gear. Vous incarnez Linus, un extraterrestre qui s'est écrasé sur la planète Terre. En rentrant chez lui personne ne le croit, il faut donc l'aider à retourner sur Terre pour ramener des preuves. Explorez les différents niveaux pour ramasser des objets et parler à des gens. Peut-être qu'après ça, les gens arrêteront de vous traiter de menteur !

Tauche mit allen Sinnen in diese riesige außerirdische Odyssee kosmisher Entdeckungen im dtil der 50er Jahre ein! Wahnsinnsabenteuer, Arcade-Action und Super-Zwishenspiele machen Cosmic Spaceheads Versuch, die Existenz der Erde zu beweisen, zu einem irren Spaß!"

locale.title: Crayon Shin-chan - Taiketsu! Quantum Panic!!
locale.synopsis: Crayon Shin-chan: Taiketsu! Kantamu Panic!! is an action game for the Sega Game Gear released only in Japan. It is based upon the Crayon Shin-chan anime.

Shinnosuke Nohara, conocido cariñosamente como Shin-chan, es un niño de 5 años que vive en la ciudad japonesa de Kasukabe en la prefectura de Saitama con sus padres: Hiroshi Nohara y Misae Nohara, y transcurrida gran parte de la serie con su hermana pequeña, Himawari Nohara. Es un niño muy travieso y rebelde que desconcierta a los adultos con sus ocurrencias y sus comportamientos desvergonzados poco propios de su edad, como su desmedido interés por las mujeres o el «baile del culo» (que ejecuta agachado con los pantalones bajados) interpretado al menor descuido de su madre. Con sus amigos del parvulario y su perro, Nevado, vive diversas aventuras, ya sea en su casa, la escuela o en las zonas de juego de los parques.
Basé sur le dessin animé japonais Crayon Shin-chan, ce jeu n'existe qu'en import

Der fünfjährige Shinnosuke Nohara, genannt Shin-Chan Nohara, treibt seine Eltern Harry und Mitsy Nohara in den Wahnsinn. Er ignoriert alle Regeln und gesellschaftlichen Konventionen, nicht selten zeigt er seinen Gesprächspartnern sein entblößtes Gesäß. Der Witz der Serie baut auf den Handlungen und Bemerkungen Shin-Chans auf, die in den dargestellten Situationen absolut unpassend sind und seine Eltern häufig in Verlegenheit bringen.

locale.title: Crazy Faces
locale.synopsis:
Crazy Faces is an unreleased Sega Game Gear game developed by The Kremlin and was due to be published by Domark. Had it been released, it would have debuted around 1993. SMSPower dumped a prototype of the game in April 2012.
Crazy Faces has the user push tiles around a screen in an attempt to make pictures in the fastest possible time. Pictures involve popular video game IPs owned by Domark at the time, as well as some by Sega (namely Sonic the Hedgehog). The prototype has no music.

Crazy Faces es un juego inédito de Sega Game Gear desarrollado por el Kremlin y que será publicado por Domark. De haber sido lanzado, habría debutado alrededor de 1993. SMSPower lanzó un prototipo del juego en abril de 2012.
Crazy Faces hace que el usuario presione las casillas alrededor de una pantalla para intentar hacer fotos en el menor tiempo posible. Las imágenes involucran IP populares de videojuegos propiedad de Domark en ese momento, así como algunas de Sega (es decir, Sonic the Hedgehog). El prototipo no tiene música.
Puzzle game à base d'images provenant des jeux de Domark et sega, ce jeu n'a jamais été commercialisé. Il s'agit ici d'un prototype sans le son.

locale.title: Crystal Warriors
locale.synopsis:
The continent of Tyramus has lived in peace for almost a century, thanks to the four elemental crystals of the kingdom of Arliel. However, peace is threatened by the invading armies of the Jyn Empire, led by Emperor Grym, who wants to use the four crystals to rule over Tyramus. Fortunately, Princess Iris can escape with one of the crystals and now the player has to protect her and the crystal and somehow find a way to drive back the hordes of Jyn.
Gameplay in Crystal Warriors is quite similar to Shining Force. The player fights in turn-based battles controlling different characters like fighters, healers, rangers and mages, all with different strengths and skills. Whenever two units engage in battle, they enter a duel mode lasting for up to two turns. In this mode the player can choose between four commands: "battle" (attack), "retreat", "spell" and "monster". While the first three commands are quite self-explanatory, the "monster" command is interesting. Whenever a non-human enemy is defeated, it can be tamed and be used in battles. While most monsters do not have many HP they can serve as good attackers for physically weak characters or take some hits in order to protect his master. In-between battles the player can visit towns to rest, buy weapons and spells or recruit new party members.
¡Tres de los cuatro cristales de Ariel han sido robados! La princesa Iris tiene el cuarto. ¡Ayúdala a recuperar las valiosas gemas!

locale.title: Crystal Warriors
locale.synopsis: Le royaume de Tyramus est menacé par l'invasion de l'Empire de Jyn qui veut utiliser le pouvoir des Quatre Cristaux à des fins funestes. Dans Crystal Warriors sur Game Gear, votre tâche consiste à escorter la Princesse Iris, détentrice de l'un des cristaux, et à renverser l'armée ennemie dans des batailles au tour par tour. Servez-vous à bon escient de vos guerriers, magiciens et guérisseurs.

locale.title: Crystal Warriors
locale.synopsis:
Das Spiel orientiert sich spielerisch stark an Fire Emblem, das heißt, man steuert eine Gruppe aus mehreren Helden durch eine Reihe von rundenbasierten Kämpfen, die in einer Top-Down Grafik dargestellt werden. Die Spielgeschichte wird dabei in den immer identischen Ausrüstungs- und Anwerbepausen zwischen den Kämpfen in Form von Stadtgesprächen erzählt, größere Interaktion mit der Umgebung existiert in diesem Spiel nicht.
In den Kämpfen steuert man bis zu neun frei wählbare Helden aus der verfügbaren Menge, die man rundenweise über eine in quadratische Felder gegliederte Karte steuert. Es gibt in diesem Spiel keine feste Rundenabfolge, jede Figur kann also unabhängig bewegt werden. Konfrontationen werden in der Form Angriff/Gegenangriff in einer Seitenansicht dargestellt. Dabei kommt ein einfaches Schere-Stein-Papier zum Einsatz, welches in diesem Spiel durch die vier Elemente dargestellt wird, die den einzelnen Heldenklassen zugeordnet sind. Dabei haben bestimmte Elemente Vor- und Nachteile gegenüber den anderen. Gegnerische Figuren werden teilweise mit einer Vorform der Nebel des Krieges dargestellt, welche ihre Fähigkeiten und Klasse verbirgt. Eine weitere Besonderheit sind neutrale Tiere, die nach ihrer Niederlage als gezähmt gelten, und von dem Charakter im Kampf eingesetzt werden können. Stirbt ein Charakter in diesem Spiel, ist sein Tod endgültig.

locale.title: Cutthroat Island
locale.synopsis: In this game you play the role of a pirate lady called Morgan who was given a piece of a map by her father before he died. In the game you set out to find more pieces of the map so that you can find the hidden treasure buried on Cutthroat Island. The gameplay involves you scrolling along the screen and sword fighting pirates and other scoundrels one on one with various different attacks. As you progress you unlock more combos. This game is based on the film by the same name.

Afila tu larga espada para la última batalla en alta mar. Mientras saqueas y descubres tesoros, piedras preciosas y lingotes de oro, te esperan batallas de piratas sanguinarios con cuchillos y pistolas. Traza tu rumbo a través de lugares peligrosos, pero piénsalo dos veces antes de zarpar, los muertos no cuentan historias en Cutthroat Island.

CutThroat Island sur Game Gear est l'adaptation du film éponyme sorti en 1995 et connu en France sous le nom L'île aux Pirates. Pour débuter l'aventure, vous avez le choix entre Morgan et Shaw, il est même possible de jouer à deux. Les deux pirates s'échappent d'une prison et partent à la conquête d'un trésor. Il faut récupérer toutes les pièces de la carte qui y conduisent. Certaines armes et des bonus peuvent être ramassés tandis que des techniques de combat sont apprises au fil du jeu.

locale.title: Daffy Duck in Hollywood
locale.synopsis: Presenting the world famous Daffy Duck P.I. Armed with your lethal bubble gun, search the Hollywood film sets for Yosemite Sam's Golden Cartoon World Movie Awards and the despicable Mad Professor Duck Brain.

Presentando al famosísimo Investigador Privado. Daffy Duck (Pato Lucas). Armado con tu pistola letal de burbujas, busca en los platos de Hollywood el Premio de Oro del Mundo de los Dibujos Animados, que pertenece a Sam.

Daffy Duck in Hollywood est un titre de plates-formes au scrolling horizontal sur Game Gear. Le réalisateur récompensé Yosemite Sam appelle le détective Daffy Duck pour lui demander de l'aide : retrouver son trophée en or dérobé par l'immonde professeur Duckbrain. Armé de son pistolet à bulles, Daffy Duck part en investigation en plongeant dans les films de Sam ce qui justifie la variété des environnements du titre : western, science-fiction, horreur, jungle, etc. Daffy Duck peut sauter et transformer les ennemis en bulles. Pour progresser il doit réduire au silence certains adversaires sous peine de voir les accès bloqués. Dans les levels, récupérez un maximum de bulles afin d'augmenter votre puissance, votre score de points et votre protection sous la forme d'un fée qui virevolte autour de Daffy Duck.

Wir präsentieren den weltberühmten Daffy Duck! Bewaffnet mit Ihrem Blasen-Gewehr suchen Sie in den Filmkulissen Hollywoods nach Yosemite Sams Golden Cartoon World Movie Awards und dem widerlichen, verrückten Professor Duck Brain.

O famoso diretor de desenhos animados Yosemite Sam está com um grande problema. Seus troféus, acumulados ao longo de uma brilhante carreira, foram roubados pelo maligno professor Duck Brain que está pedindo 1 milhão de reais pelo resgate.nnnnO pão-duro diretor não quer gastar esta fortuna mas está desesperado para pôr suas mãozinhas nos troféus. Sam depositou todas as suas esperanças em seu velho amigo Patolino (Daffy Duck para os americanos). Será que ele vai se arrepender?nnnnPatolino vai virar Hollywood de cabeça para baixo, atravessando 3 estágios, cada um dividido em dois sets, cada set subdividido em 3 cenas... ufa! São muitos desafios para um pato só!nnnnMas Patolino não estará desarmado. Ele está contando com suas poderosíssimas bolas de chiclete, uma arma plasmática de material grudento desenvolvida pelos fabricantes de guloseimas para envolver qualquer inimigo que ousar enfrentar Patolino.

En este juego, cada regate, pase, patada y codo es real: todo está digitalizado del baloncesto real. 24 disparos diferentes de jumpers para golpear, increíble velocidad y efectos de sonido que golpean el rebote hacen de estas cumbres una acción que se pliega. ¡Robinson demuestra su caso con golpes de monstruos con ambas manos y ataques netos impresionantes! Acción del torneo 3-en-3 o de inclinación total. Elige un escuadrón asesino de un tablero de 20 jugadores formado por especialistas en slam, snowboarders y asesinos de bolas. Captura los comentarios de color del Almirante en los descansos.

David Robinson's Supreme Court : Dans ce jeu, chaque dribble, passe, coup de pied et coup de coude est réel - tout est numérisé à partir du vrai basket. 24 coups différents de sauteurs aux claques, une vitesse incroyable et des effets sonores qui claquent le rebond font de ces sommets une action qui plie les cerceaux. Robinson prouve son cas avec des claquements de monstres à deux mains et des attacks nets impressionnants! Action de tournoi 3-sur-3 ou full-tilt. Procurez-vous une escouade de tueur à partir d'un tableau de 20 joueurs composé de spécialistes du slam, de planchistes et de voleurs de balles. Attrapez le commentaire de couleur de l'amiral aux pauses.

game.name: Donald Duck No Yottsu No Hihou

locale.title: Deep Duck Trouble Starring Donald Duck
locale.synopsis:
Donald meets Hewey, Dewey and Louie, back from their latest adventure with Uncle Scrooge. But Uncle Scrooge has been cursed by a pendant he found while adventuring, and is now floating in the air like a balloon! He gives Donald his adventurer's diary and asks Donald to retrace his steps and return the pendant to its rightful place - this is the only thing that will return Scrooge to normal.
Deep Duck Trouble is a platform game where you play as Donald Duck. You must make your way through four different areas of the island - the jungle, an inlet, a volcano, and a valley - and defeat bosses at the end of each area. Donald can defeat enemies by jumping on their heads. He can also defeat them by kicking bricks which will may then hit his enemies. Donald's trademark temper also comes into play: if he eats a chili pepper, he will become furious and plough through anything in his way, whether it be bricks or enemies!

¡Viaje con el Pato Donald por Junglas llenas de peligros, misteriosos restos de naufragios de barcos piratas, y cavernas brillantes de hielo llenas de abominables hombres de las nieves! ¡Donald tiene que salvar of Tío Gilito, y usted tendrá que ayudarle!

locale.title: Deep Duck Trouble Starring Donald Duck
locale.synopsis: Dans le jeu de plates-formes Deep Duck Trouble Starring Donald Duck sur Game Gear, le joueur doit suivre le carnet de bord de Picsou pour inverser la malédiction qui le fait flotter dans les airs tel un ballon. En compagnie de Donald, traversez îles, jungles et volcans et battez un boss à chaque fin de niveau.

locale.title: Deep Duck Trouble Starring Donald Duck
locale.synopsis: Begleiten Sie Donald Duck durch gefahrvolle Dschungel, mysteriöse Piratenwracks und glitzernde Eishöhlen, die von geheimnisvollen Schneemenschen bewohnt werden. Donald muß nämlich Onkel Dagobert aus einer üblen Situation befreien ? und Sie sollen ihm dabei helfen!

locale.title: Deep Duck Trouble Starring Donald Duck
locale.synopsis: O Tio Patinhas é o cara mais preocupado do mundo em ganhar dinheiro. Ele ouviu falar da lenda que dizia que, numa misteriosa ilha, havia um colar que lhe traria tanta sorte quanto a moedinha n° 1.nnnnSe fosse verdade, sua enorme fortuna duplicaria. Sem pestanejar, ele partiu para a tal ilha, achou o colar e, ao voltar, começou a se sentir muito leve. Sabendo da volta de seu tio, Donald foi fazer uma visita surpresa e encontrou-o inflado como um balão, prensado no teto.nnnn" Socorro Donald, eu lhe darei 15 centavos se você voltar à tal ilha e puser o colar de volta ao local de origem. Só assim poderei me livrar da maldição! ". A quantia não era grande coisa, mas de qualquer jeito Donald não poderia negar este pedido do Tio Patinhas.nnnnO pato mais azarado do mundo terá que passar pela floresta, pelo vulcão, pelas cavernas de gelo e muito mais antes de se livrar do colar. Boa sorte em sua aventura, Donald! Ela será tão cheia de perigos que talvez fosse melhor ter mandado o colar pelo correio.

locale.title: Defenders of Oasis
locale.synopsis:
A long, long time ago, the legendary king Jamseed defeated the evil Ahriman, the spirit of darkness. But just before, Ahriman managed to send into the world his most horrifying servant: the dragon Zahhark. Years have passed, Zahhark was defeated by the descendants of Jamseed, but its own descendants continued menacing the kingdom of Shanadar. Many generations later, you, the young Prince of Shanadar, has to confront the evil. Zahhark's offsprings plan to destroy the kingdom, and the Prince must first seek aid in a neighboring country, accompanied by a beautiful Princess, by the Genie from a lamp, and other friends.
This is a traditional Japanese-style RPG. You control the Prince and his party members, visiting various locations, buying and finding items, and fighting random enemies and bosses in a turn-based combat viewed from first-person perspective.
En el papel del príncipe, tú deberás defender el reino de Oasis de las fuerzas del mal, en este entretenido y emocionante juego.

Basé sur d'anciens mythes Iraniens, Defenders of the Oasis sur Game Gear est un jeu de rôle où vous contrôlez le Prince de Shanadar et combattez les descendants du dragon Zahhark. Vous êtes accompagné par une princesse au joli minois, le génie de la lampe, ainsi que d'autres acolytes.

game.name: Desert Speedtrap Starring Road Runner And Wile E. Coyote

locale.title: Desert Speedtrap starring Road Runner and Wile E.
locale.synopsis:
This is a platform game starring Looney Tunes famous Road Runner(who you control) and nemesis Wile E. Coyote. Road Runner can jump, eat birdseed to replenish life and run, of course! Holding the D-pad down speeds him up. The clock is ticking and if you run out of time a try is lost, collecting stars adds time to the clock
There are various items/powerups and bonus areas
3 difficulty settings, choice to play with or without music and/or sound effects and an option to play the game music while not in game

Road Runner es un pájaro que vive a su aire. Corriendo caminos y pensando en sus cosas. Pero Wile E. Coyote, el viejo enemigo de Road Runner, ha decidido que tiene ganas de comerse a Road Runner a la plancha. Wile E. hará lo imposible para cenarse a Road Runner, pero con un poco de suerte " y un poco de ayuda por su parte " ¡Road Runner podrá burlar al astuto coyote!

Desert Speedtrap sur Game Gear et un jeu de plates-formes où vous contrôlez BibBip et tentez d'échapper à son éternel poursuivant : Wile. E Coyote. Vous pouvez sauter et utiliser la légendaire vitesse de BipBip pour parvenir à la fin du niveau, avant que le temps qui vous est imparti ne soit écoulé.

Der Road Runner ist ein unbekümmerter Zugvogel, der sein freies Leben auf der Landstraße genießt und niemandem etwas zuleide lut. Wile E. Coyote dagegen, der Erzfeind eines jeden Road Runners. 1st weniger harmlos: ihn gelüstet es nach einem Braten, vorzugsweise in der Form omes Road Runners. Wile E. ist zu allem bereit, um den Road Runner in eine leckere Mahlzeit zu verwandeln, aber mit etwas Glück " und Ihrer Hilfe " wird es dem Road Runner gelingen, auch diesen cleveren Kojoten zu überlisien!

Desert Speedtrap coloca-te no lugar do Papa-Léguas (Road Runner), a lutar para sobreviveres a todas as armadilhas e artimanhas do Coyote (Wile E. Coyote) - um lobo que sonha em saborear a carne dessa adorável avestruz.nnnnIrás enfrentar 8 níveis recheados de túneis de comboio, minas explosivas e perigosas estradas cercadas de armadilhas. Cuidado! Um único deslize e estarás no menu Coyote.nnnnNos desenhos animados ele leva sempre a pior, mas aqui, se não fores esperto, acabas em comida para lobo. Faz tudo para que o Papa-Léguas continue livre, desbravando as estradas dos desertos americanos.nnnnBenvindo às aventuras de Papa-Léguas - o Easy Rider dos desenhos animados.

game.name: Desert Strike - Return To The Gulf

locale.title: Desert Strike : Return to the Gulf
locale.synopsis:
The first game in the Strike series. A year after the Gulf War, a self styled General named Kilbaba (Muababa in the GBA version) takes over an Arab Emirate and threatens to start WWIII against its enemy in the West, the U.S. The whole world holds their breath as the President chooses you to destroy Kilbaba and his terrorist army before he launches a nuclear attack on the world!
You must fly an specially designed AH-64A Apache on a series of missions from rescuing MIAs, destroying power plants, to blowing apart SCUD missles! Take out his defenses while trying to find out Kilbaba's plans. Take on the Madman and forever rid this threat....in the desert!

La simulación de helicópteros número uno' ¡Ahora para tu Game Gear Pilota tu helicóptero AH-64 Apache a través de la excitante acoon en 27 misiones. Destruye scuds, tanques, reactores nucleares y rescata a personas clave en esta prueba de velocidad y destreza a tope.

Desert Strike : Return to the Gulf sur Game Gear est le premier jeu de la série Strike. L'histoire prend place un an après la guerre du Golf alors qu'un général tyrannique menace le Moyen-Orient et les Etats-Unis. Le président vous charge d'abattre le général Kilbaba et ses terroristes, avant qu'ils n'engagent un conflit nucléaire mondial. Vous pilotez un hélicoptère Apache et vos objectifs sont divers : porter secours, détruire des objectifs, détourner des missiles...

Der Hit unter den Hubschrauber-Simulationen - jetzt auch auf Game Gear' Steuern Sie Ihren AH-64 Apache-Hubschrauber durch 27 aulregende Kampteinsâtze. Zerstören Sie Scud-Rakelen, Panzer und Atomkraftwerke! Retten Sie hochrangiges Miltärpersonal in dieser acbongeladenen Herausforderung an Geschwindigkeit un Können des Piloten!

locale.title: Devilish
locale.synopsis:
Genki's first game is a paddle/pong game with a background story. Once upon a time there were a prince and a princess who loved each other. But the evil jealous demon named "Y" turn them both into stone paddles. Suddenly, a blue sphere fell from the sky, becoming the ball which the paddles can now push forwards, overcoming obstacles and defeating demons.
"Devilish" is different from other paddle games by letting you play with two paddles. The lower one behaves just like a usual paddle - you use it to prevent the ball from dropping down. The upper one can move and turn, allowing you to hit the ball from different angles and from different parts of the screen. You advance through levels by destroying bricks and enemies, going up until the level boss enemy appears.
Ábrete paso entre bestias y trampas explosivas, pasando por ocho emocionantes dimensiones. ¡Este juego te hará vivir una experiencia que sólo puede recibir el calificativo de diabólica!

Devilish sur Game Gear est un casse-briques amélioré. En effet, vous dirigez horizontalement et verticalement, deux barres, sur lesquelles rebondit votre bille casse-briques. Franchissez les obstacles, éliminez vos ennemis à coups de bille, et terrassez les boss de fin de niveau pour annuler la malédiction qui a frappé le prince et la princesse.

locale.title: Aladdin
locale.synopsis:
Sega's 8-bit systems received a unique adaptation of Disney's 1992 animated film Aladdin.
Like other versions, it is a side-scrolling action game. The player controls Aladdin, making his way through a variety of locations, including the streets of Agrabah, the Cave of Wonders, the Sultan's palace and more. Gameplay takes several different forms: some levels are chases, where Aladdin runs automatically, but must be made to jump over chasms or rolling rocks and barrels, evade falling objects and avoid getting caught by a guard. Other levels are platforming affairs: Aladdin must run, jump and climb, find keys or switches to open doors while searching for the exit. Rocks can be collected and be thrown to dispatch enemies or hit buttons otherwise out of reach. Finally, there are also several magic carpet rides in the game, in which the level scrolls automatically and the player must make sure to avoid any obstacles in the way.

Aladino esquiva a los guardias en las calles de Agrabah, mientras intenta evitar las trampas disimuladas de la Cueva de las Maravillas y los peligros del Palacio del Sultán. Móntate en la Alfombra Mágica y cruza el imponente cielo. Luego desafía al Malvado Jafar a un duelo final de espadas y magia.

Reprenant les différentes séquences du film d'animation de Disney, Aladdin sur Game Gear permet de retrouver tous les personnages de l'histoire. Ce jeu de plates-formes propose effectivement de suivre Aladdin des rues d'Agrabah aux couloirs du palais royal en passant bien sûr par la célèbre caverne aux merveilles. Le Génie est aussi de la partie et permet de gagner des bonus.

Schlüpfen Sie in die Rolle von Aladdin. Tricksen Sie die Palastwachen aus. Widerstehen Sie den Versuchungen in der Höhle der Wunder und meistern Sie die Gefahren im Palast des Sultans. Wagen Sie einen atemberaubenden Ritt auf dem fliegenden Teppich und fordern Sie den bösen Jafar zu einem Duell mit Schwertern und Magie!

Meu caro amigo... esfregue esta embalagem mágica que 3 desejos seus serão realizados.
1º: Será concedida a você a maior aventura de todos os tempos. Você será levado à Arábia e entrará na pele do próprio Aladdin, com direito a namorar a princesa Jasmine, voar de tapete mágico, virar um príncipe e ganhar a amizade do macaquinho mais simpático do mundo.
2º: Você ganhará a habilidade necessária para atravessar as 6 fases de Aladdin, incluindo a Caverna dos Tesouros, os Telhados de Agrabah e o Palácio do Sultão, enfrentando os soldados e a magia negra do malvado Jafar.
3º e último: Você terá direito a mil e uma noites de diversão, animadas por 4 Mega de incríveis gráficos e pela trilha sonora que ganhou até um Oscar da Academia®!
Agora, se ainda assim você não gostar de Aladdin... nem um Gênio resolve seu problema!

game.name: Doraemon - Nora No Suke No Yabou

locale.title: Doraemon: Nora no Suke no Yabou
locale.synopsis: Doraemon Nora no Suke no Yabou is an action game for the Sega Game Gear. It is based upon the 1979 Doraemon anime.

Juega con Doraemon por toda la ciudad en tu Game Gear explorando cada rincón consiguiendo diferentes objetos que te ayudarán a superar este reto. Este fenomenal de acción/plataformas revolucionará el género. ¡A qué esperas! ¡Juega con el gato cósmico!
Doraemon: Nora no Suke no Yabou est un jeu éducatif basé sur la série animée japonaise Dorarmon de 1979

locale.title: Doraemon: Waku Waku Pocket Paradise
locale.synopsis: Doraemon Waku Waku Pocket Paradise is an action game for the Sega Game Gear. It is based upon the 1979 Doraemon anime series.

Juega con Doraemon o con ayuda de tu amigo Nobita en este apasionante juego de acción y mini-juegos y descubre todo lo que está ocurriendo en la ciudad. Juega con otro amigo con el cable Gear-to-Gear y disfruta de este juego ambientado en el mundo de Doraemon.
Doraemon Waku Waku Pocket Paradise est un jeu éducatif basé sur la série animée japonaise Dorarmon de 1979

locale.title: Double Dragon
locale.synopsis:
MESS WITH THE BEST DIE LIKE THE REST
That's the motto of the Dragon lords - the meanest. roughest street gang around. Brothers Billy and Jimmy lee Just found out the hard way that getting out of this gang is even tougher than getting in. Only one got out with his life. From sweeping side kicks to the dirtiest street fighting imaginable, you'll be up to your neck in martial arts action as you take on the role of Billy to avenge your brother's death.
Too bad for the Dragon Lords they taught you everything you know. Now it's time to show them they picked the wrong brother to mess with!

Empleando el antiguo arte marcial del Kenpo, ábrase camino por entre la jungla urbana controlada por despiadadas bandas de facinerosos. Mantenga la guardia alta, porque lucha para salvar a su prometida y devolver a las calles la tranquilidad y el orden.

Double Dragon est un titre de beat'em all au scrolling horizontal sur Game Gear. Dans un New-York post-apocalyptique, Billy et Jimmy Lee partent au secours de Marian la fiancée de Billy. Double Dragon vous permet d'arpenter les rues en éliminant les adversaires qui croisent votre chemin avec des techniques de Sou-Setsu-Ken. Outre les combos de coups de poing et de pied, les frères Lee disposent de coups de pied sautés et autres coups de coude. L'originalité du soft est qu'il est possible de ramasser divers objets et armes des adversaires pour les retourner contre eux.

Mit Hilfe der alten orientalischen Kampfsportant Kenpo kämpfen Sie Ihren Weg durch eine Stadt frei, die von rücksichtslosen Schlägerbanden kontrolliert wird. Seien Sie bei Ihren Kampf auf der Hut, dann wird es Ihnen gelingen, Ihre Freundin zu retten und in den Straßen Recht und Ordnung wiederherzustellen.

Numa cidade dominada pela guerra e pelo crime, vocês precisam um do outro para sobreviver.
Você é Billy Lee e seu irmão gêmeo é Jimmy Lee, mas são mais conhecidos como "Spike" e "the Hammer" Mestres em artes marciais, dominam todos os golpes mortais. Prepare-se para a grande batalha.
A mais terrível gangue da cidade (os guerreiros negros) seqüestrou a namorada de Jimmy, e está usando-a para atraí-lo para seu território.
Você terá que salvá-la, e para isso usará todas as suas habilidades.
Mas tome muito cuidado principalmente com o pior de todos: o líder da gangue.

locale.title: Dr. Franken
locale.synopsis:
Dr. Franken is an action game developed for the Game Boy by Motivetime. Codemasters acquired a license to port the game to the Sega Mega Drive and Elite Systems were due to bring it to the Sega Game Gear, but neither version materialised.
A "demo" build of the Game Gear version has since been leaked online.

Ayuda a tu cabeza hueca favorita a recuperar a su novia. Adelante. Tira el interruptor. Y ven a un viaje de monstruos con el buen viejo Freaky Franky. Está buscando todas las piezas del hermoso cuerpo de su Bitsy para que pueda volver a unirlas en la máquina de vida del Dr. Frankenbone. Excepto que parece que Itsy Bitsy se ha dispersado por todo el castillo. 7 niveles espeluznantes. Y hay 230 salas llenas de cosas esperando para atraparte. Entonces, ¿qué sucede de repente? No estarías asustado ahora, ¿verdad? No hay nada que temer. Es suficiente para conducir a cualquiera.

Dr. Franken est un prototype d'un jeu jamais publié ni terminé. Contrairement à ce que laisse penser son titre écrit un peu partout en lettres gothiques, le jeu ne nous propose pas d'incarner le docteur Frankenstein, mais bien sa création, affectueusement nommé... Franky. Avant de décéder, son maître avait apparemment prévu d'offrir à Franky une compagne pour qu'ils puissent vivre de nombreux jours heureux et pourquoi faire des trucs rigolos avec leurs corps pendant des siècles. Malheureusement Bitsy - c'est son petit prénom - est quelque peu en morceaux... Morceaux joyeusement éparpillés dans l'immense château du scientifique, curieusement infesté de bestioles démoniaques. Pas décidé à rester vieux garçon, Franky se lance à la recherche des fragments de sa bien aimée, mais aussi des éléments pour remettre en marche la célèbre machine à donner la vie.

locale.title: Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine
locale.synopsis: Okay, so this Dr. Robotnik guy, he decides to turn something else into robots. This time, it's the citizens of Beanville! It's up to you to save them from their doom. You drop pairs of beans into the dungeons, trying to create groups of four in matching colors. You must challenge Dr. Robotnik's robots to a battle and defeat them, and eventually face the Eggman himself.
Usted tendrá que guardar la calma y pensar con rapidez para ganar en este fantástico juego cabezas. ¡Compita con un amigo, o pelee contra los robots más astutos secuaces de Robotnik!!

Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine sur Game Gear est un puzzle-game où vous devez arranger des blocs de couleur de manière à les faire disparaître et à réaliser des enchaînements qui auront raison de votre opposant. Sauvez les habitants de BeanVille de la robotisation qu'Eggman veut leur faire subir !

Ein Puzzle-Spiel, das Sie süchtig machen kann! Fordern Sie einen Mitspieler heraus, oder kämpfen Sie gegen Dr. Robotniks heimtückische Robot-Lakaien - in jedem Fall müssen Sie stets Ihre Nerven und die Übersicht behalten!

O maligno Dr. Robotnik inventou uma máquina que transforma pessoas boas em robôs podres! Em Mobius, a famosa casa de Sonic the Hedgehog, o povo de Beanville está sendo cercado e jogado nas masmorras do doutor para esperar sua vez no Robotizador!

locale.title: Dragon : The Bruce Lee Story
locale.synopsis:
Based on the 1993 movie of the same name, Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story has Bruce Lee learn that he was born in America and he sets off to explore this new land. However it is a dangerous place and must fight to survive.
Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story is a side-scrolling action game. Bruce Lee travels through various locations and engages enemies in martial arts. As Bruce Lee, the player can jump and attack. The direction button being pressed at the time of the attack determines whether Bruce will Punch, Roundhouse Kick or Low Kick. Power-ups are scattered throughout the levels and can be activated by attacking them. Bruce has a health meter at the top of the screen, when it is depleted he loses a life.

Entra en el mundo de Dragon, el lugar en el que vivió durante 32 difíciles años la leyenda de las artes marciales, Bruce Lee. Un lugar en el que te encontrarás con los enemigos más fieros y astutos que jamás se hayan visto en un juego para la GAME GEAR. Puedes disponer de una devastadora gama de 35 movimientos diferentes, y te aseguramos que vas a necesitarlos... Con tres estilos de lucha diferentes: Mantis, Fighter y Nunchuku. Numerosos movimientos especiales y secretos que tendrás que descubrir tú solo. Con el Multi Tap? pueden participar tres personas.

Dragon : The Bruce Lee Story sur Game Gear est un beat'em up basé sur le film du même nom sorti en 93. Vous devez vous battre pour survivre et exploiter à bon escient la science de Bruce Lee. Des bonus sont disséminés à travers les niveaux, ils vous permettront de faire exploser votre fureur et ainsi décupler votre puissance.

Erlebe die Welt des Dragon, die Welt, in der Bruce Lee, die Legende des Kampfsports, 32 nicht immer leichte Jahre verbrachte. Die Welt, in der Du die raffiniertesten und härtesten Gegner treffen kannst, die jemals in einem GAME GEAR-Beat-'em-up-Spiel zu sehen waren. Über 35 knallharte Kampftechniken stehen Dir zur Verfügung. Du wirst sie auch brauchen.... Mit drei verschiedenen Kampfstilen: Mantis, Fighter und Nunchuku. Viele geheime Spezialtechniken, die Du erst entdecken mußt. Mit der Multi Tap?-Funktion können drei Spieler bis zum bitteren Ende kämpfen.

locale.title: Dragon Crystal
locale.synopsis: Dragon Crystal is a dungeon crawler with RPG elements, along the lines of classics such as Rogue or Nethack. Without relying on a story, the game throws you into a randomly generated world which you should explore carefully - and most importantly, where you must survive! The complex, maze-like levels reveal their structure only after you cover the corresponding map areas. Your goal in each level is to reach a teleporter which will take you to the next one. There are also a lot of random items scattered around - weapons, armor, money, and food. Money allows you to continue the game if you die, food prevents you from starving. The enemies are visible on screen, and you fight them in a fast-paced turn-based combat, moving around and pressing direction arrows to strike with the equipped weapon. You are always accompanied by an egg which will eventually grow up to be a dragon if you have leveled up enough.
Luche en innumerables batallas contra horribles criaturas según busca la salida de un extraño mundo de laberintos.

Dragon Crystal sur Game Gear est un jeu de rôle. Vous combattez vos ennemis au tour par tour, en traversant des niveaux où l'objectif initial est de trouver un téléporteur qui vous mènera au niveau suivant. Un oeuf vous accompagne, à vous de le choyer pour qu'il devienne un puissant dragon !
Kämpfen Sie sich durch unzählige Schlachten mit furchterregenden Monstern während Sie fieberhaft nach einem Ausweg aus der bizzaren Welt der irrgärten suchen.

locale.title: Dropzone
locale.synopsis:
Dropzone was the first game to propel Archer Maclean to stardom. The game, originally written for the 8-bit Ataris, is basically a Defender clone, but popular because it so closely recreates the gameplay of the original Defender, with its speedy scrolling and frantic gameplay.
The player is a spaceman with a jet-pack, flying across a barren landscape whose skies are inhabited by a number of different aliens; from the simple Planter to the slowly advancing Blunder Storm or the quick, aggressive Nemesite.
Planters and Nemesites will try to pickup the small men walking on the surface, who must then be rescued. You must shoot down the alien, while avoiding to hit the man. Sometimes, the aliens will carry an android, which is similar to the human but deadly. Care must be taken so as to not pick up the androids. All men must be transported to a surface base, where they are put in safety. This is the Dropzone.

Protege a los hombres que hay en la superficie del planeta IO frente a los extraterrestres invasores que quieren aniquilarlos. Llévalos de vuelta, de uno en uno, a la zona Dropzone. Disfruta de más de noventa niveles de frenética acción explosiva.

Dans Dropzone sur Game Gear, le joueur incarne un spationaute équipé d'un jetpack. Vous devez porter secours tout en évitant d'être vous-même victime des aliens qui usent de ruses pour vous éliminer. Votre ami n'est peut-être pas celui que vous croyez...

locale.title: Dunk Kids
locale.synopsis: DUNK KIDS is a Two on two basketball game with 2 players per side that works on one or two Sega Game Gears! Dunk Kids is endorsed by the All Japan Street Basketball Association, of the ASBA!
Dunk Kids es un juego deportivo, desarrollado y publicado por Sega, que se lanzó en Japón en 1994.
DUNK KIDS est un jeu de basket à 2 contre 2 supporté par le All Japan Street Basketball Association.

locale.title: Dynamite Headdy
locale.synopsis:
Dynamite Headdy is a platformer... with a difference. You control a little character whose main attack comes from his disembodied head. Yes, years before Rayman appeared, we already had a hero who used detachable appendages to attack his enemies.
Rather than the traditional power-ups, Dynamite Headdy enables you to swap your head for different kinds  such as heads that heal you or heads that stick on to walls. You use your head in order to climb up on platforms as well, as you can grab hold of things with it, and on certain stages of the Mega Drive/Genesis version it is used to turn the game into a side-scrolling shooter, as you gain a propeller, jet, or bird head. Basically, Dynamite Headdy is just a traditional platformer at heart.

¡El escenario está preparado! Este personaje de dura cabeza ha de hacer valer sus increíbles cualidades deberás utilizar cualquiera de sus 6 cabezas intercambiables para combatir los enemigos mientras muerde, baila, salta y te lleva hasta el escuro castillo de los diablos.

Dynamite Headdy sur Game Gear met en scène un jouet qui a la particularité de se battre avec sa tête amovible. Lancez-la sur vos adversaires pour vous en débarrasser dans ce jeu de plates-formes cartoonesque et défaites le maléfique Dark Demon qui tente de transformer les jouets de la ville en sbires à sa solde. Combattez également votre ennemi juré, l'ours Trouble Bruin et délivrez la ville du joug démoniaque.

Este é um jogo muito "cabeça"...
Dynamite Headdy está em apuros! Dark Demon está disposto a transformar todos habitantes do mundo em servos demoníacos. Se você der uma mãozinha, pode não adiantar muito, mas se você usar a cabeça...
Nada de trocar de armas. Que tal trocar de cabeça? Há vários modelos disponíveis que conferem mais poder ao nosso pequeno herói, entre eles, a Cabeça de Vácuo, capaz de sugar os inimigos e a Cabeça de Martelo, que lhe dará força extra para bater.
E Dynamite não está sozinho nesta missão: ele conta com a ajuda de Beau, que dá as direções e aponta os pontos fracos do inimigo, de HeadCase, que carrega uma caixa com Poderes Extras nas horas de maior necessidade, e muitos outros. Mergulhe de... bem ,você já sabe... e divirta-se em seis fases fantásticas com cénarios que levarão você a finais surpreendentes!

locale.title: Earthworm Jim
locale.synopsis:
A crow is chasing a worm named Jim while in outer space Psy-Crow is chasing a renegade ship. The ship's captain has stolen an ultra-high-tech-indestructible-super-space-cyber-suit and Queen Slug-for-a-Butt has ordered Psy-Crow to get it, since it can make her more beautiful than Princess-What's-Her-Name. Psy-Crow blasts the captain and the suit falls to Planet Earth.
Back on earth Jim wonders if he is finally safe when an ultra-high-tech-indestructible-super-space-cyber-suit lands on him. Luckily Jim rests in the neck ring of the suit. Then the space particles begin interacting with Jim, causing a light-speed evolution. Jim soon realizes he is in control of the suit.
Jim overhears the Queen's plans for the suit and decides to meet this Princess...

Jim es una lombriz normal y corriente que lleva un traje cuyas cualidades especiales no entiende muy bien. Para llevar a cabo la amedrantadora tarea de impedir que sus viciosos enemigos le pongan las garras encima al traje con poderes especiales, tendrás que utilizar todas las armas y poderes a tu disposición. Utiliza el látigo el arma de plasma y el hámster (mmmm) para luchar contra Chuck Fifi, Evil el Gato y el mayor Mucus.

Earthworm Jim sur Game Gear met en scène Jim, un ver de terre ayant hérité d'un costume aux pouvoirs extraordinaires. Dans ce classique parmi les jeux de plates-formes, le joueur dispose d'un pistolet laser comme moyen de défense. Jim a aussi une large palette de mouvements pour parvenir à franchir des niveaux variés et colorés.

Jim ist ein ganz gewöhnlicher Regenwurm, der sich in einem Anzug wiederfindet, den er nicht versteht. Sie haben die Aufgabe, diesen Anzug mit Super-Kräften vor den fiesen Klauen seiner gemeinen Gegner zu retten. Und dazu müssen Sie alle waffen und Mittel einsetzen, die Sie auftreiben können! Setzen Sie ihre Peitsche, Ihren Plasma-Blaster und Ihren Hamster ein(der Ärmste...), um sich an Chuck und Fifi, Evil the Cat und Major Mucus.

locale.title: Ecco : The Tides of Time
locale.synopsis:
The followup to Ecco the Dolphin, in which Ecco successfully destroyed the Vortex. Unfortunately, it turns out that the Vortex Queen followed it to the Earth and eventually destroyed the Asterite. All the world's oceans are threatened, and actually already doomed.
In order to restore the Asterite and finally defeat the Vortex Queen, Ecco will have to confront once again the tides of time, which have split into two possible futures, the regular one and the dark one dominated by the Vortex Queen.
Ecco: The Tides of Time features even better graphics than its predecessor, and introduces a new gameplay mode in which the camera follows the dolphin from behind instead of from the side.

El malvado Vortex ha regresado y Ecco tiene que enfrentarse a una peligrosa aventura. Con ayuda de la hermosa Trellia guía a Ecco a través de más de 16 niveles de acción acuática incluyendo impresionantes escenas en 3D. ¡Observa como Ecco se convierte en un banco de peces, una medusa e incluso una gaviota mientras luchas en las mareas del tiempo!

Ecco : The Tides of Time sur Game Gear est la suite de la première aventure du courageux dauphin. L'océan est menacé par la Reine du Vortex et le cours du temps a été divisé en 2 futurs, l'un normal, et un autre où règnent les ténèbres instaurées par la Reine. Votre tâche consiste évidemment à rétablir le plus agréable des deux. La possibilité de se transformer en méduses ou en petits poissons-fourrage pour passer inaperçu a été ajoutée.

Der böse Vortex ist zurück und Ecco muß erneut ein gefährliches Abenteuer bestehen. Führen Sie Ecco mit Hilfe der schönen Trellia durch über 16 Level voller Unterwasser-Action und neuartige 3D-Level. Während Sie in gigantische, neue Welten vordringen, verwandelt sich Ecco in einen Fisch-Schwarm, eine Qualle und sogar in eine Seemöve.

locale.title: Ecco the Dolphin
locale.synopsis:
Travel through time along with Ecco the dolphin, in the only game that could call itself a "dolphin simulator". Indeed, you can do pretty much everything a typical dolphin does, including eating fish, surfacing in order to breathe, using your biological sonar and of course, jumping out of the water to amaze your friends.
The storyline is actually deeper that one may think by looking at the box illustration. As Ecco, you are the only dolphin who managed to escape from a giant whirlpool which sucked down your entire pod. The five shining stars on your forehead show that you are the chosen one to save them. But that task will be not be an easy one, as you will have to travel through time and space with the Atlantean time machine, and meet the mystical Asterite in order to defeat the Vortex Queen.
El mundo de Ecco ha sido devastado por un viento misterioso y fuerte. Ayúdele a restaurar la paz en su hogar que está en las profundidades del mar.

Ecco the Dolphin sur Game Gear est un jeu d'action qui a l'originalité de mettre le joueur aux commandes d'un dauphin. L'histoire débute lorsque Ecco assiste impuissant à la disparition de tout l'écosystème, emporté par une mystérieuse tempête. 25 niveaux durant, explorez les abîmes et résolvez de nombreuses énigmes afin de ramener le calme au sein de la crique.

locale.title: Ernie Els Golf
locale.synopsis: Ernie Els Golf is a golf game for the Sega Game Gear released exclusively in Europe.

Hay cuatro cursos diferentes de todo el mundo: St. Davids en Gran Bretaña, Sunny Lakes en los EE. UU., Hokkaido en Japón y Sydney en Australia. Los primeros dos tienen 18 hoyos, mientras que los dos últimos tienen nueve. El juego presenta siete modos de juego diferentes: práctica, stroke play, match play, trío, foursome, stableford y juego de máscaras.

Ernie Els Golf est un jeu de golf ou vous incarnez Ernis Els surnommé le « Big Easy », quadruple champion de tournois du Grand Chelem, l'open américain en 1994 et 1997, et l'Open britannique 2002 et 2012. Autant vous dire que vous n'avez d'autre choix que de ne faire que des un trou en un.

locale.title: Eternal Legend - Eien no Densetsu
locale.synopsis: Eternal Legend: Eien no Densetsu is a Japan-exclusive Game Gear role-playing video game. While the "Eternal Legend" name was used in both game packaging and advertising materials, the subtitle "Eien no Densetsu" was only used to advertise the game for the Japanese market.

El jugador controla a un niño que tiene que salvar al mundo de los monstruos malvados que deambulan por las áreas fuera de las aldeas. El juego se considera un RPG de acción similar a Final Fantasy y Secret of Mana. Hasta tres personajes pueden estar en su grupo, estos tres miembros cambian dependiendo de la historia.

Le joueur contrôle un jeune garçon qui doit sauver le monde de méchants monstres qui errent dans les zones en dehors des villages. Le jeu est considéré comme une action-RPG semblable à Final Fantasy et Secret of Mana. Jusqu'à trois personnages peuvent être dans votre groupe, ces trois membres changent en fonction de l'histoire.

locale.title: Evander Holyfield's Real Deal Boxing
locale.synopsis:
Evander Holyfield's "Real Deal" Boxing is a boxing simulation. Holyfield is the only licensed boxer, the rest are fictitious. Rather than a fanciful approach like Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!!, the developers went for a more strategic sim. Differently from its Genesis counterpart, the game is played from a first or third person point of view, with the fighters facing each other directly. The player can choose to see the fight from his or from the opponent's point of view ("through his eyes").
Players can either play a quick exhibition match or fight their way through the Career mode, using a created boxer to work their way up the 15-boxer ranking list until they fight Holyfield himself. During character creation, players can choose the fighter's head, color of skin, trunks and hair, physical and mental attributes. The physical attributes are dominant hand, power, speed, recovery and stamina. The mental attributes are style (brawler, dancer, boxer and dodger), killer instinct (low, medium or high) and favorite punches (jabs, straights or hooks aimed at head or torso, one for each hand). Between matches, career mode offers various exercises to assign the boxer to improve his stats.
The players can choose the view mode (normal or reverse), three kinds of control schemes, round length (up to four minutes) and fight length (up to 12 rounds).

Levanta tus puños ...
... Y salir a luchar. En la otra esquina ... el Campeón indiscutido de peso pesado del mundo, Evander Holyfield, y está listo para dejarte como un mal hábito.
Ahí está la campana! Él sale balanceándose, sus ojos lanzando fuego. Lanzas un gancho al cuerpo y una escalera a la cabeza. Bloquea y entrega un henificador que te hace besar el lienzo. No lo llaman "Real Deal" por nada.
El boxeo de "Real Deal" de Evander Holyfield convierte tu Game Gear en el Circuito Mundial de Peso Completo. con 14 oponentes diferentes duking para el cinturón del campeonato.
¿Tienes lo que se necesita para derrocar al Campeón?

Evander Holyfield's "Real Deal" Boxing est une simulation de boxe sur Game Gear. Choisissez un match rapide en mode exhibition ou optez pour le mode carrière où vous guidez votre poulain à travers toutes les étapes pour affronter Evander Holyfield. Jaugez bien la fatigue et les coups encaissés par votre boxeur et envoyez votre adversaire au tapis pour accéder à la gloire.

locale.title: F-15 Strike Eagle
locale.synopsis: The seven missions featured in this simulation of F-15 flight are all real-life missions the plane was originally used in. They take in the Middle East and Asia in the 1970s and early 1980s, and have air and ground targets to destroy. You have machine guns, guided missiles and bombs at your disposal. There is an arcade mode and 3 further difficulty levels. The game features 3 enemy aircraft and 3 types of enemy SAMs.

Colócate en la cabina del avión más caliente de Estados Unidos: ¡el F-15 Strike Eagle! ¡Con una increíble maniobrabilidad y potencia de fuego, el F-15 puede enfrentar cualquier desafío, en cualquier lugar, contra cualquier persona! F-15 Strike Eagle es tu oportunidad de pilotar el poderoso jet en misiones peligrosas en el Golfo Pérsico. Intenta destruir las plantas de guerra química y lidera un ataque contra el enemigo. Muchas aventuras gráficas emocionantes hacen que el juego sea siempre desafiante, ¡siempre nuevo!

F-15 Strike Eagle sur Game Gear propose au joueur de piloter un chasseur F-15 dans des missions où le célèbre appareil est réellement intervenu. Vous évoluez donc au Moyen-Orient ainsi qu'en Asie, pour détruire des cibles sur terre et dans les airs.

locale.title: F1: World Championship Edition
locale.synopsis: F1 is an Official Formula One Racing Game. It's also the fastest, most authentic, most thrilling Game Gear racing game yet. Battle it out on the real Formula One Circuits against the real teams and the real drivers of the FIA Formula One World Championship.

F1 es un juego oficial de carreras de Fórmula Uno. También es el juego de carreras de Game Gear más rápido, auténtico y emocionante hasta la fecha. Lucha contra los verdaderos equipos de Fórmula Uno contra los equipos reales y los verdaderos pilotos del Campeonato Mundial de Fórmula Uno de la FIA.
F1 - World Championship Edition est une sequelle au jeux Formula One (F1 Racing), Vous piloterez une formule 1 sur les circuits officiels du FIA Formula One World Championship

locale.title: Faceball 2000
locale.synopsis:
Faceball 2000 is a first-person shooter. You control a H.A.P.P.Y.F.A.C.E., or Holographically Assisted Physical Pattern Yielded For Active Computerized Embarkation. The graphics consist of flat shaded corridors. Enemies are all simple geometric shapes with smiley faces on them. Although the graphics are simple, they allow for full freedom of movement, not unlike Wolfenstein 3-D.
There are two modes of play. First there is a single player mode in which your goal is to find the exit to each level. There are 70 mazes in this mode. The second mode is the multiplayer arena. For the Game Boy: up to 4 Game Boys can be linked together in this mode.

Bienvenido al nuevo y emocionante mundo de Faceball 2000, donde los gráficos en 3D, la perspectiva en primera persona y la maniobrabilidad de 360 grados te ponen a ti y hasta a tres amigos (¡o enemigos!) Dentro de tu Game Boy. Lo que ves es dónde estás, mientras trabajas en equipo, compites entre ellos o juegas solo contra oponentes controlados por computadora. Transpórtate dentro de las paredes de CyberScape, una serie de más de 70 laberintos traicioneros llenos de trucos, trampas y enemigos amenazantes. O bien, ingrese a la Arena donde "Have a Nice Day" adquiere un significado completamente nuevo en rondas rápidas de combate de alta tecnología. Donde quiera que vayas en Faceball 2000, es tu oportunidad de borrar las sonrisas de esas caras felices y molestas, ¡y tal vez algunos de tus amigos, de una vez por todas!

Faceball 2000 sur Game Gear est un jeu de tir à la première personne dans lequel vous contrôlez un smiley qui doit tout bêtement en éliminer d'autres. Vous évoluez dans des environnements clos, dans une 3D réduite à sa plus simple expression. Le mode Single Player consiste à trouver la sortie tout au long des 70 niveaux. Le multijoueur est aussi possible, en connectant plusieurs Game Gear.

locale.title: Factory Panic
locale.synopsis:
Mister Greede, a corrupt tycoon and factory owner, deprives the local citizens of the goods they need and deserve. Thats why you have infiltrated his factory. Now you must manipulate the conveyor belts skillfully to deliver the correct product to the right person waiting outside, but you have only a limited amount of time. Unfortunately, thugs with bats or even guns patrol the factory. Your only weapon against these security guards is a battle cry that temporarily stuns them, but not for too long.
Factory Panic consists of four rounds, and each round consists of eight stages. Before a stage starts, the game tells you how many people are waiting in line and what product they are waiting for. Rounds one and three are played in Switch Mode: step on different switches to rotate associated sections of the conveyor belt. If you get off the switch, the section rotates back to its initial position. One switch may affect more than one section. Since you can only step on one switch at a time, you have to bustle quite a bit in later stages. Rounds two and four are played in Bridge Mode: remove and install small bridges between the belts to control the flow of products.
If a person gets an unwanted product, the time remaining on the timer will decrease. Sometimes, the belt carries special items, e.g. a megaphone that makes your scream attack more powerful, or a weight that can be placed on a switch.
¡Infíltrate en las fábricas de un magnate vicioso y reparte los productos de calidad entre la gente que realmente lo merece!

Vous voici dans la peau d'un jeune garçon (ou Gorbatchev dans la version Jap !) qui va venir en aide à une pauvre population (celle de l'ex-URSS...) qui réclame des vivres. Vous entrez donc dans la principale usine de distribution de ces vivres, et allez devoir faire en sorte de distribuer divers objets tels de la viande, du pain, des médicaments ou encore des Game Gear, à chaque personnage qui attend patiemment de l'autre côté des grilles son besoin propre...

A cidade de Segaville está vivendo uma época de miséria nunca antes vista. Um cruel empresário está dominando todas as fábricas boas da cidade, e está deixando apenas os refugos para a população.
Em desespero, eles lhe pediram para ajudá-los Invada as fábricas e faça de tudo para devolver os bons produtos a quem realmente merece. Não será fácil, mas se você não conseguir, ninguém mais o fará.

locale.title: Fantastic Dizzy
locale.synopsis:
The evil wizard Zaks has cast a spell on the peaceful Yolkfolk, and while many fell under his spell, others have other problems to deal with, including Dizzy, who saw his girlfriend Daisy kidnapped and taken hostage by Zaks, and it's up to him to restore the Yolkfolk to normal and rescue Daisy from the top of the Cloud Castle's tower.
The most technically-advanced of Dizzy's adventure games in many ways, it was the only one to feature actual scrolling rather than a flick-screen system, the only one not to be released for the 8 bit computers the character originated on, the only one to originate on a console, as well as featuring many mini-games, such as Bubble Dizzy and an Operation Wolf clone.
Gameplay involves walking Dizzy through the levels, picking up objects and using them to solve simple puzzles. There are plenty of tests of arcade skill along the way as well, as gaps must be jumped and baddies avoided - starting with a limited number of lives, the player can earn more by completing Theodore's puzzle. Before rescuing Daisy the player must capture all stars that unlock the gates of the tower.

Esta es la aventura animada de Dizzy en Zakeria. Explora las misteriosas minas de diamantes, las fabulosas cavernas, la guarida del dragón y el castillo en las nubes. Te encontrarás con extraños magos, brujos, trolls, piratas, duendes y muchas otras criaturas extraordinarias.

Fantastic Dizzy est un jeu de plates-formes/aventure sur Game Gear. Le méchant magicien Zaks a jeté un sort à tous les habitants du village et a kidnappé la fiancée de Dizzy. Le but du joueur sera bien évidemment de la récupérer mais également de sauver les villageois. La jouabilité repose sur un mélange de plates-formes et d'énigmes à résoudre (en ramassant différents objets et en les utilisant au bon endroit).

Dizzys erstaunliche Cartoon-Abenteuer in Zakeria. Erforsche geheimnisvolle Diamantenminen, sagenumwobene unterirdische Gänge, die Höhle des Drachens und das Wolkenschloß. Du triffst dabei auf seltsame Magier, Zauberer, Trolle, Piraten, Kobolde und viele andere eigenartige und wunderbare Gestalten. "Extrem fesselnd! Ungewöhnlicher Spielspaß! Dieses 'Spiel des Jahres' für das Game Gear solltest du dir auf gar keinen Fall entgehen lassen!" Proscore 92% Sega Pro magazine

locale.title: Fantasy Zone
locale.synopsis: Take command of the spaceship Opa-Opa and blast your way through various fantastical levels as you try to take out all the enemy bases in each stage. Once you've destroyed the bases, you'll have to beat the stage boss in order to move on to the next level. By using your guns and bombs wisely, you'll be able to take down your enemies and explore each of the crazy environments in this side-scroller. You can also buy upgraded weapons for your ship by accessing the shop.
Los canallas de Menon se han llevado al padre de Opa-Opa como rehén. ¡Ayúdale a Opa-Opa a rescatar a su padre!

Fantasy Zone est un shoot'em up sur Game Gear. Vous incarnez un vaisseau spatial, assailli par de nombreux ennemis volants non identifiés. Le jeu n'est pas linéaire et vous permet de vous déplacer vers la droite ou la gauche pour aller traquer de l'alien. Le design est coloré et les monstres originaux.
Die Bösen von Menon haben Opa-Opas Vater als Geisel genommen. Hilf Opa- Opa, ihn zu retten!

locale.title: Fatal Fury Special
locale.synopsis:
Fatal Fury Special is an improved version of SNK's 2D one-on-one fighter Fatal Fury 2. It's a conversion of the 1993 arcade game of the same name. The objective is still to win the tournament by defeating all other fighters including end boss Wolfgang Krauser. Fatal Fury Special features a fairly large selection of fighters that includes:
1. The eight regular fighters from Fatal Fury 2: Terry Bogard, Andy Bogard, Joe Higashi, Kim Kaphwan, Jubei Yamada, Cheng Sinzan, Mai Shiranui and Big Bear.The four bosses from Fatal Fury 2: Billy Kane, Axel Hawk, Lawrence Blood and Wolfgang Krauser (this time they're all immediately playable).Three characters returning from the first Fatal Fury: Duck King, Tung Fu Rue and Geese Howard (the end boss from Fatal Fury). Other improvements include:
1. A new Count Down mode (defeat as many opponents as possible in 3 minutes).Extra color schemes for every character.New & improved background graphics.Dolby Surround Sound support. Fatal Fury Special still features the series' trademark pseudo-3D movement along two planes.

Prepárate para luchar contra todos los contendientes ya que ahora tienes en tu Game Gear el famoso juego de arcade Fatal Fury Special. Selecciona a tu jugador entre 9 legendarios campeones y entra en el Torneo del Rey de los Luchadores, o si no enchúfate a otra Game Gear* para una pelea de 2 jugadores. *Se vende por separado.

Fatal Fury Special sur Game Gear est un jeu de baston en 2D, qui est une version améliorée de Fatal Fury 2. 16 personnages au style unique s'affrontent ici. Battez-vous dans des décors variables et maîtrisez le système de combo qui permet de vider la barre de vie adverse en un clin d'oeil.

locale.title: FIFA International Soccer
locale.synopsis:
The game that started the best-selling series licensed by football's world governing body, this first installment in the long running series used a dimetric (colloquially known as "isometric") viewpoint, previously unusual in football games but quickly imitated by several titles. The televisual presentation, one of the unique points of the early EA Sports titles, with hosts introducing the matches, was another thing making the game stand out from a market dominated by Sensible Soccer and Kick Off games.
Based on international teams (with fictional player names), their abilities in each skill area rated out of 10 to give the player an overall impression of how good they are. The options available follow the standard set: fouls and offsides can be toggled on and off, the match length can be set, and if the timer operates continuously, or only while the ball is in play. Gameplay privileges quick runs, short passes and blistering shots outside the penalty box, and set pieces are controlled by moving a box into the target area for the ball, and then passed, lobbed or kicked directly. On the tactical side, formations can be selected, with 5 different strategies also available (although not all of these combinations make sense) as can the team Coverage - the areas which defenders, midfielders and strikers cover.

EA Sports se ha asociado con el organismo rector del fútbol internacional para ofrecerte el juego de fútbol más realista que se haya creado en GameGear. Increíble portero guarda - ¡embestir o zambullirse después de tiros difíciles en las esquinas! La ventana única de "play-finder" le permite enfocar el campo en patadas de esquina y tiros libres. ¡Encuentra al hombre abierto y golpea la pelota con el objetivo! Deja caer a tu oponente sobre el césped con un tackle deslizante. ¡Tenga cuidado, deslice las jarcias desde atrás y puede resultar en tarjetas amarillas!

FIFA International Soccer sur Game Gear est une simulation de football. Premier titre de la série la plus vendue au monde, FIFA donne la possibilité à 1 ou 2 joueurs de prendre le contrôle d'équipes nationales et internationales lors de matches amicaux, de tournois ou de championnats. Privilégiant les courses et passes courtes, le jeu permet d'adopter une stratégie parmi 5 au choix afin de mieux contrer le jeu de l'adversaire.

locale.title: FIFA Soccer 96
locale.synopsis:
"Aiming to be the first football simulation that is realistic in the true sense of the word, FIFA Soccer 96 was extremely popular at the time of release. It was hailed as the first really successful FIFA release, and opened the way for yearly revisions of the concept.
There were a number of factors that made FIFA96 stand out from the crowd of other football sims. Firstly, the game's commentary was revolutionary at the time -- the renowned British commentator John Motson comments all the incidents and happenings on the pitch in real-time. The ambient commentary is varied, and systems with more than the minimum memory level get extra commentary phrases.
The Virtual Stadium technology has numerous pre-defined camera angles. The game even has a SVGA mode for better-than-minimum system
FIFA96 boasts eleven leagues from all around the world, ranging from the unknown players of the Malaysian league to the celebrated stars of the English and Italian leagues. 59 International teams are also featured, and it's possible to match the teams you want to against each other through friendlies, or you can also choose to play domestic tournaments or International ones such as the World Cup. If you're not satisfied with the composition of the various teams, you can create your own dream team through the custom team creator.

¡El fútbol de la próxima generación está aquí! Las características incluyen: jugadores modelados de Silicon Graphics que utilizan la tecnología de animación MotionDesign. Nuevos movimientos incluyendo 1-2 pases, drible rápido, voleas, maniquíes, falsificaciones y nuez moscada! Más de 3.500 jugadores reales con fortalezas y debilidades precisas. Transfiere jugadores reales y personalizados para crear el equipo de tus sueños. 12 ligas internacionales, incluyendo inglesa, escocesa, italiana, alemana y francesa.

FIFA Soccer 96 est un jeu de football sur Game Gear. Le jeu propose onze ligues officielles ainsi que cinquante-neuf équipes internationales. Il est possible de faire de simples matches amicaux, des tournois ou de participer à la Coupe du monde. Un éditeur d'équipes vous permet aussi de créer la sélection de vos rêves avec vos joueurs préférés.

locale.title: Fire Track
locale.synopsis: This was an attempt at creating a conversion of the BBC Micro game Fire Track to the Sega Game Gear, rewriting it from scratch in Z80 assembly.nnThe player controls a fighter ship which flies at constant speed and heading over a series of worlds. The player is faced with both airborne enemies (who approach in different attack formations) and ground-based enemies. Destruction of a whole attack wave results in bonus points, and destruction of specific ground targets (such as buildings marked with X) results in bonus points (and an occasional extra life) at the end of each level. Some enemies are indestructible and must be avoided. There are no power-ups, although the rate of fire increases with more challenging levels.

conversion du jeu fire track sur bbc micro game.nnLe joueur contrôle un navire de combat qui vole à une vitesse constante et se dirige vers une série de mondes. Le joueur est confronté à la fois à des ennemis aéroportés (qui s'approchent dans différentes formations d'attaque) et à des ennemis basés au sol. La destruction de toute une vague d'attaque donne lieu à des points bonus, tandis que la destruction de cibles au sol spécifiques (tels que les bâtiments marqués d'un X) donne lieu à des points bonus (et parfois plus de points de vie) à la fin de chaque niveau. Certains ennemis sont indestructibles et doivent être évités. Il n'y a pas de power-ups , bien que la cadence de tir augmente avec des niveaux plus difficiles.

locale.title: Foreman for Real
locale.synopsis:
Before marketing fat-reducing grills, boxing legend George Foreman endorsed this boxing game with a 3rd-person view similar to Punch Out. A full range of punches and jabs are available, with full round-by-round scoring from the judges. You can choose from 3-12 rounds, and there are 2 camera views as well as an automatic switch option.
You can play simple exhibition matches or tournaments, or launch into a career mode. In this you start at the bottom of the world rankings, and must reach the top by beating the game's players, who other than George are all fictitious boxers with varying strengths and weaknesses. The coach gives advice before each fight to help highlight weaknesses in your play. There are passwords for each round.

PRESTE ATENCIÓN, PUG: ¡ESTA ES LA LUCHA MÁS GRANDE DE SU VIDA!
¡Enfrentando a 20 de los boxeadores más duros del mundo, y cada uno tiene un poderoso golpe! Si los superas, ¡tienes a "George" George Foreman y el título esperando! Esta no es una pelea de clubes: ¡la tecnología de captura de movimiento de Acclaim hace que esta sea la acción más auténtica que jamás hayas experimentado! Así que entra allí, ponte duro y ponte real: ¡FOREMAN FOR REAL!

Non, George Foreman n'est pas qu'un simple vendeur de barbecues à la télévision mais un boxeur de haut niveau. Dans ce jeu de sport éponyme sur Game Gear vous combattez en vue à la troisième personne. Foreman for Real vous permet de réaliser nombre de coups classiques issus de la palette du boxeur idéal. Choisissez parmi les modes Exhibition ou Tournament, ou lancez-vous dans un mode Carrière et tentez de ravir le titre à George Foreman lui-même !

locale.title: Frank Thomas Big Hurt Baseball
locale.synopsis:
Baseball player Frank Thomas licensed one of the first baseball games to use motion-captured 3D graphics and multiple camera angles. 28 stadia have been rendered in 3D, and each has its own visible and significant differences.
There are 6 distinct game modes, allowing for single exhibition matches as well as full seasons on the playoffs. There is also a Home Run Derby mode, allowing the player to pelt the ball out of the ground for points.
You can choose pitchers and batters, based on their statistics and form. Bowling options are set to define the delivery, with fastballs and curveballs as well as more precise setting of pace and height. Fielding is optional - it's best to leave this to the computer at first You can always alter the infield and outfield depth and shift.
