The objective of each of the 10 time-limited levels (or "scenes") is to collect gems scattered around them. Collecting certain amounts of gems grant access to bonus levels. The player starts the game with 4 lives and 1 continue.

Cubre tus necesidades básicas y escolta a Mowgli a través de la jungla hasta dejarlo sano y salvo en el poblado de los humanos. ¡Lucha contra Kaa, ta serpiente de ojos saltones, y vence a Shere Khan, el tigre voraz, en esta excitante aventura basada en un clásico de Disney! ¡Haz el oso... te enloquecerá!

locale.title: Le Livre de la Jungle
locale.synopsis: Le Livre de la Jungle sur Game Gear est l'adaptation du film de Disney de 1967, lui-même inspiré du livre écrit par Rudyard Kipling. Vous incarnez Mowgli et devez ramasser des fruits, grimper aux arbres et combattre les ennemis de l'histoire comme Sher Khan. Le jeu permet de replonger dans l'univers d'un des classiques de Disney en retrouvant tous ses personnages et ses décors.

locale.title: Das Dschungelbuch
locale.synopsis: Versuch's mal mit Gemütlichkeit, und geleite Mogli sicher durch den Dschungel in die Geborgenheit des Menschendortes Wehre dich gegen die großzäugig Schlange Kaa, und besiege den hungrigen Tiger Shir Khan in diesem spannenden Abenteuer nach Walt Disneys Filmklassiker! Einfach affenstark!

"Jungle Book" foi um dos maiores sucessos de Walt Disney no Cinema. A história de Mogli, o menino-lobo, ainda hoje encanta adultos e crianças de todas as idades e em todo o mundo.nnToda a magia do Mundo Disney vai estar presente neste jogo. Aqui, tu vais ser o próprio Mogli e viver todas as suas aventuras em "Jungle Book".nnMogli pode ter sido criado entre lobos, mas ele é um ser humano e por isso tem muitos inimigos na selva: o malvado tigre Shere Khan quer vingar a sua raiva dos homens justamente no pobre menino. A enigmática cobra Kaa também está doida para poder agarrar o menino-lobo, Mogli. Para completar, Loule, o rei dos gorilas, quer capturar Mogli para obter o segredo do fogo dos homens.nnPara enfrentar todos eles, Mogli irá contar com a ajuda de várias personagens presentes no filme: a pantera Baquera, o elefante Hati e o urso Baloo.nnTira o Mogli da selva, enfrenta os diversos perigos que vão surgir, leva-o a salvo para a aldeia e mostra que perto de ti, o Tarzan não vale nada!

locale.title: The Lion King
locale.synopsis:
Young Simba just can't wait to be king. His father is the current King of the Savannah and the young prince is able to frolic the lands at will; jumping on and around other subjects of this animal kingdom. When Simba's father, King Mufasa, is killed and his evil brother Scar takes over the kingdom, Simba is banished from the lands of his birthright and has to grow up fast, honing his skills, for the day of his return.
The Lion King, based on the famous Disney movie, is a platform game where you control Simba - initially as a young cub, and later as an adult lion. The plot of the game follows the plot of the movie. Each of the levels represents a part of the movie.
As young Simba, you can fight various beasts, such as lizards, by jumping on them. You can also roar to scare some creatures into submission, though every time you roar, you have to wait for your "roar meter" to charge.
As an adult lion, you can still roar and jump, but now you fight enemies by slashing at them with your claws (if you're skillful enough, you can also grab them and toss them off the screen).
The game features no in-game save function, and it needs to be replayed from the beginning every time.

Basado en el último éxito de la factoría Disney, "El rey león" da vida a la majestuosidad y al misterio de África a través de los ojos de Simba, un cachorro de león. Los animadores de los estudios Disney y la música de la banda sonora original han sido utilizados para llevarte a Pride Rock.nnLleva a Simba a lo largo de 10 niveleshasta la última batalla contra su malvado tío Scar. Salta sobre las hilarantes hienas en Elephant's Graveyard, evita a la salvaje manada en la versión 3D con scroll frontal de la escena de la estampida. Juega con Pumbaa y con Timón, amigos de Simba en el exilio, en las pantallas de bonus.nnLa colaboración entre Disney Software y Virgin Interactive Entertainment, combinada con Sega hace a este juego un nuevo clásico de la animación y del entretenimiento interactivo.

locale.title: Le Roi Lion
locale.synopsis: Le Roi Lion est l'adaptation sur Game Gear du film de Disney sorti en 1994. Vous parcourez la savane avec Simba, de son plus jeune âge jusqu'à son retour dans la tribu des lions à l'âge adulte. Tous les personnages et passages du film sont présents, de même que les musiques qui permettent aux nostalgiques de plonger pleinement dans l'univers d'un des classiques de Disney.

locale.title: Der König der Löwen
locale.synopsis: In Walt Disneys "der könig der löwen" erleben sie mit dem löwen Simba das majestätische und geheimnisvolle afrika! Dieses spiel versetzt sie mit animationen von den original-Disney-grafikern und musik aus dem soundtrack direkt in die handlung des gleichnamigen film-hits.nnBeglaiten sie Simba durch 10 atemberaubende level bis zum ultimativen kampf um die königswürde mit seinem bösen onkel Scar. Besiegen sie heimtückische hyänen auf dem Elefantenfriedhof, weichen sie den hufen der wilden büffel in der stampede-szene aus dem film aus, und spielen sie die bonuslevel als einer von simbas freunden, das warzenschwein oder die meerkatze!nnDie partnerschaft von Disney Software und Virgin Interactive Entertainment hat zusammen mit Sega ein spiel hervorgebracht, das neue standards in animation und interaktiver unterhaltung setzt.

O rei Mufasa está cheio de alegria. O seu filho Simba está a aprender rápidamente todas as lições necessárias para poder tornar-se no novo rei e todos os animais estão confiantes no sucesso do pequeno herdeiro. Bem, pelo menos quase todos...nnnnScar, o invejoso irmão de Mufasa, preparou uma terrível armadilha para acabar com o Rei e o seu filho, o que o tornará, desta forma, no sucessor ao trono. Por enquanto, este plano deu certo. Mufasa não conseguiu sobreviver à armadilha e o pequeno Simba, sentindo-se culpado da morte do seu pai, fugiu do reino para nunca mais voltar.nnnnCom o passar do tempo, Simba aprendeu a filosofia do "Hakuna Batata" e percebeu que a bravura e inteligência do seu pai ainda estavam vivas...nele mesmo. Resolveu então lutar pela coroa que era dele por direito e tu vais ajudá-lo nesta incrível aventura.nnnnSerão 10 níveis de muita acção, onde acompanharás o crescimento de Simba e irás enfrentar, com inteligência e habilidade, todos os perigos que o afastaram do trono por tanto tempo. Derrota Scar na derradeira batalha e torna-te, enfim, no novo Rei Leão.

game.name: Legend Of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse

locale.title: Legend of Illusion starring Mickey Mouse
locale.synopsis:
Once upon a mouse, there was a kingdom that was ruled by the selfish king Pete. One day, a terrible shadow crept over the kingdom, threatening the lives of its inhabitants. The king's adviser said the only way to stop the shadow would be for the king himself to travel out and to seek the cure. But the cowardly king Pete preferred to stay in the castle, and sent a simple laundry boy named Mickey instead!
As Mickey Mouse, you will travel through various levels in this platform game. Mickey shoots an unlimited amount of little balls on the enemies, can jump, climb on stairs, hang on ropes, and perform other tricks. Mickey can also pick up items and put them in another place, for example to access a higher level or to break a treasure chest open.

Érase una vez, en un mundo lejano, un reino gobernado por el Rey Pete. Él no era un Rey muy bueno, pero la vida en el reino era buena y sus habitantes eran felices. Pero un día, nubes oscuras tomaron los cielos del reino dejando a las personas muy tristes. "Sólo un Rey, en una jornada real, conseguirá descubrir cuál es la solución de este problema y devolver la paz a los habitantes del reino" avisó al consejero del Rey. El Rey Pete, con miedo de cumplir tal misión, decide hacer de un ayudante del lavadero real, un Rey Honorario. Ahora Mickey tiene en sus manos el destino del reino y la felicidad de sus habitantes. Ayuda a este intrépido ratón a cumplir su misión.

Legend of Illusion starring Mickey Mouse sur Game Gear met en scène la célèbre souris devant défendre un royaume victime d'une mystérieuse ombre. Le roi Pete vous charge de pénétrer dans celle-ci afin de l'explorer et de l'éloigner. Voici la trame de fond de ce jeu de plates-formes où vous serez armé d'un fusil pour vous défendre tout au long de niveaux variés.

Era uma vez, em um mundo distante, um reino governado pelo Rei Pete. Ele não era um Rei muito bom, mas a vida no reino era boa e seus habitantes eram felizes. Mas um dia, nuvens escuras tomaram os céus do reino deixando as pessoas muito tristes. "Apenas um Rei, em uma jornada real, conseguirá descobrir qual a solução deste problema e devolverá a paz aos habitantes do reino" avisou o conselheiro do Rei. O Rei Pete, com medo de cumprir tal missão, resolve fazer de um ajudante da lavanderia real, um Rei Honorário. Agora Mickey tem em suas mãos o destino do reino e a felicidade de seus habitantes. Ajude este corajoso camundongo a cumprir sua missão.nnnnCapriche na mira e acerte os inimigos com as barras de sabão. Faça com que Mickey salve o reino e se torne o novo Rei!

locale.title: Mickey Mouse Densetsu no Oukoku : Legend of Illusion
Lemmings
locale.synopsis:
Your task is to rescue the Lemmings across 120 levels of fast-paced puzzling. These creatures simply walk blindly through the world in the hope of reaching safety at the end of the level - unfortunately these levels include steep drops, gaps in the ground, barriers and rivers amongst other hazards.
You are in control not of any individual Lemming, but of a cross-hair, which can be moved over any of the Lemmings. Along the bottom are a selection of functions which can be assigned to a Lemming, including climbing, floating and bashing. You must click to select the appropriate function, then click on the Lemming to activate it. Each level has a different range of skills on offer, a different amount of Lemmings, and a different percentage target in order to progress.

¡Los Lemmings están apareciendo! Estas adorables pero estúpidas criaturas saltan desde los acantilados, caminan sin rumbo dentro de las llamas y se dejan caer como rocas dentro de charcos de agua. Ellos necesitan que usted los ayude para excavar, construir, y volar un camino hacia la seguridad que abarca más de 120 niveles.

Votre tâche dans Lemmings sur Game Gear est de secourir les petites créatures aux cheveux verts sur 120 niveaux. Un pourcentage d'individus à maintenir en vie vous est indiqué pour chaque mission. A vous de vous adapter à la configuration du terrain de jeu en assignant des tâches telles que creuser, construire un escalier ou encore bloquer le passage dans l'optique de ramener à bon port vos infatigables Lemmings.

Die Lemminge sind auf dem Marsch! Diese putzigen aber unglaublich dummen Geschöpfe laufen über Klippen, wandern gedankenlos in Flammen, und fallen wie Steine in Wasserlöcher. Sie brauchen Ihre Hilfe, damit sie sich 120 spannende Spielstufen hindurch in Sicherheit graben, bauen und sprengen können.

Os Lemmings chegaram ! Oba !! Para quem não conhece, os Lemmings são pequenas e adoráveis criaturas que vivem perto do Pólo Norte. Com um detalhe: são completamente estúpidas ! Tudo o que eles sabem fazer é andar, em uma única direção. Aí já viu: estão sempre metidos em alguma confusão !nnnnUma vez por ano, sua população aumenta muito, e eles têm que sair em busca de um novo lugar para morar. Só que eles são tão curtos das idéias que ficam vagando sem rumo, até a hora em que eles dão de cara com o perigo (cair de penhascos e se esborrachar no chão, por exemplo !). Eles podem morrer se ninguém fizer nada para ajudá-los !nnnnFelizmente eles também sabem obedecer algumas ordens. Tendo você como guia, eles poderão superar as dificuldades, cavando túneis, construindo escadas, bloqueando caminhos perigosos e até mesmo dando uma de kamikaze e explodindo ! BUUUMM !!nnnnFaça um boa ação e evite que esta espécie entre em extinção. Mas cuidado: você não vai conseguir parar de jogar !

locale.title: Lemmings 2 - The Tribes
locale.synopsis: A whole new world! Those lovable green-haired Lemmings are back with a whole new bunch of skills, levels and mayhem to challenge your dexterity and tax your wits. You've gotta save those goofy critters. The Lemmings have split into 12 different tribes and are spread all over Lemming Island. It's up to you to lead them on. With your brains and their magic, you'll be unstoppable as you blaze through tons of awesome puzzles! Take the adventure to a higher level and reunite The Tribes!

Érase una vez doce tribus lemmings que vivían feliz y pacíficamente en la Isla Lemming. Un día, sin embargo, una gran oscuridad cayó a su tierra, como se decía en la antigua profecía. Esta profecía decía que el único camino para que los lemmings pudieran sobrevivir sería la de evacuar la isla, usando el poder del Talismán del lemming. Este talismán consistía de doce piezas, una perteneciente a cada tribu. Con la ayuda del Guía que los ha ayudado antes, todos los lemmings debían ahora alcanzar el punto más céntrico de su isla para escapar de la perdición.

Le principe du jeu reste inchangé par rapport à Lemmings : le joueur doit guider des lemmings - petites créatures humanoïdes - d'un bout à l'autre de niveaux à la difficulté croissante. Pour qu'ils puissent survivre aux difficultés du parcours (cul de sac, ravin, pièges...), le joueur doit leur attribuer des aptitudes : creuser, construire un escalier, utiliser un parachute, etc. Il existe un ensemble de niveaux d'entrainements permettant de se familiariser avec les nombreuses aptitudes.

locale.title: The Smurfs
locale.synopsis:
The evil Gargamel has captured three of the smurfs, so that he can have them for dinner (Once again). One of the smurfs must go out on a dangerous journey and rescue the captured smurfs. Beat the first two bosses to rescue the first two smurfs, then you can take on Gargamel. Make your way through forests, swamps, mountains, mines and more. Also ride storks, mine carts and logs to defeat Gargamel and his minions and to rescue the missing smurfs.
On each level you must collect five stars in order to get access to the bonus level. (You don't have to collect the five stars in order to get through the main level) On the bonus level, try to collect as many bonuses as possible before the time runs out. There are three bonus levels: "The Dam", "The Mushrooms" and "The Butterflies".

LOS PITUFOS ¡Pitúfase quien pueda! Gargamel ha decidido pitufar a TODOS los Pitufos. Ya se ha llevado a tres. Tu misión será arriesgada y peligrosa. Tendrá que afrontar toda clase de enemigos, entre otros al Ketekasko, los Pitufos negros, Azrael, y... Gargamel Sólo triunfarán los más pitufos...

locale.title: Les Schtroumpfs
locale.synopsis: Dans Les Schtroumpfs sur Game Gear vous incarnerez un habitant du village Schtroumpf, désigné pour aller porter secours à trois de ses amis, capturés par le diabolique Garagamel, qui souhaite en faire son dîner. Tracez votre route à travers les forêts, montagnes, marais et autres grottes dans ce jeu de plates-formes au visuel fidèle à la BD.

locale.title: Die Schlümpfe
locale.synopsis: DIE SCHLÜMPFE Gurgelhals hat bereits drei Schlümpfe entführt. Mach Dich schnell auf ihre Suche: schlumpte das Gebirge mit dem Schlitten hinunter, erforsche das Labyrinth in der Mine, fliege auf Storchesrücken... und hüte Dich vor Feinden wie BSS-Mücken, Schwarzschlümpfen, Krakakas, Azrael... und Gurgelhals!

locale.title: The Smurfs 2
locale.synopsis: Inquisitive Smurf and Smurfette have broken the magic crystal and now they are being taken off to various parts of the world. Collect all the crystals to be found along your route. To reveal them, brave the sea-lions of the North Pole, the Indians of America, and the octopuses of the deep... Only after you have smurfed all these challenges and many others will you be able to return to the village.

LOS PITUFOS VIAJAN POR EL MUNDO El Pitufo Fisgón y Pitufita han roto el cristal mágico y entonces son transportados hacia otros lugares del planeta. Recoge todos los cristales que te encuentres en tu camino. Para que aparezcan, vas a tener que afrontar los elefantes de los mares del Polo Norte, los Indios de América, los pulpos de los océanos... Tan sólo cuando hayas pitufado todos estos desafíos, conseguirás volver al pueblo.

locale.title: Les Schtroumpfs autour du monde
locale.synopsis:
Il s'agit de la suite du jeu Les Schtroumpfs et il est basé sur la bande-dessinée du même nom et de la série animée. Contrairement au jeu précédent, le joueur peut choisir quel personnage il souhaite incarner : la Schtroumpfette ou le Schtroumpf costaud (ainsi est-il nommé dans la notice du jeu).
Le système de jeu est différent : le joueur doit aider les deux Schtroumpfs jouables à retrouver des cristaux dissimulés dans les niveaux. Ils sont au nombre de 10 (9 dans le premier niveau) par niveau.

locale.title: Die Schlümpfe reisen um die Welt
locale.synopsis: DIE SCHLÜMPFE REISEN UM DIE WELT Per Neugierschlumpf und Schlumpfine haben den Zauberkristall zerbrochen und wurden dadurch in die verschiedensten Weltgegenden verschlumpft. Sammle alle Kristalle auf deinem Weg ein. Du wirst sie Seehunden am Nordpol, Indianern in Nordamerika und Kraken im Meer abluchsen müssen. Wenn du all diese Gefahren und viele mehr überstanden hast, kannst du wohlverdient ins Dorf zurückschlumpfen.

locale.title: Lunar: Sanpo-suru Gakuen
locale.synopsis:
This is a side-story, set in the same world as the famous Lunar RPGs: Silver Star and Eternal Blue. The town of Burg is populated by harvesters, and you take control of two girls, Ellie and Lena. One day, they are sent to the island of Ien where they should study magic, and there begins their adventure.
The game is a traditional Japanese-style RPG. You navigate your party through a top-down world, visiting towns and hostile areas. Enemy encounters are random, the battles are turn-based and are viewed from first-person perspective.

Esta es una historia paralela, ambientada en el mismo mundo que los famosos juegos de rol Lunar: Silver Star y Eternal Blue. La ciudad de Burg está poblada por recolectores, y tú tomas el control de dos chicas, Ellie y Lena. Un día, los envían a la isla de Ien, donde deben estudiar magia, y ahí comienza su aventura.nnnnEl juego es un juego de rol tradicional de estilo japonés. Navega a su grupo a través de un mundo de arriba hacia abajo, visitando ciudades y áreas hostiles. Los encuentros enemigos son aleatorios, las batallas se basan en turnos y se ven desde la perspectiva en primera persona.

Lunar: Sanposuru Gakuen, se détache considérablement de ses confrères sur Mega-CD, Saturn ou Playstation et nous offre le premier spin-off de la saga. Nous sommes en 1996, en fin de vie de la célèbre Game Gear.
L'histoire débute dans le village de Burg, environ 300 ans avant les événements de The Silver Star, où nous retrouvons Ellie et Lena, nos deux héroïnes. Celles-ci ont la particularité de posséder d'excellentes prédispositions à la magie. C'est pourquoi un certain Glen leur demande de se rendre dans l'École Magique de Ien, une île volante, afin de développer leurs capacités. Une semaine plus tard, les voici sur l'île aux côtés de nombreux autres étudiants. Les cours peuvent commencer ...

locale.title: Madden NFL 95
locale.synopsis:
John Madden's back in the 1995 version of Madden NFL.
Play exhibition, Super Bowl, playoffs or full season with any of the 1994 teams or all Madden teams.
This time around, you can select whether or not to include weather conditions, new player animations (high steppin', QB slides), a bigger field and over 100 injuries.
Also includes windowless passing, all new Madden-designed strategies and team match-up that shows how your players stack up to the other team in their position.

¡ACCIÓN! Oponente de la computadora ultracompetitiva. Nuevo jugador renderizado en 3-D se mueve; brazos rectos, alto steppin ', QB diapositivas. Campo más grande PROFUNDIDAD! Completa las listas de la NFLPA de 1994. 48 listas de jugadores - sub cualquier jugador en cualquier formación. Más de 100 lesiones de jugadores. Temporada completa de la NFL, Playoffs y Super Bowl. 28 equipos de la NFL y All Madden. ¡ESTRATEGIA! La opción de pase sin ventanas obliga a los QB a leer las coberturas de zona o de hombre. Nuevas defensas diseñadas por Madden. ¡La mejor lógica de llamadas de juegos jamás realizada, basada en las estrategias de la NFL '94 -'95!

Madden NFL 95 sur Game Gear vous offre la possibilité de jouer avec toutes les équipes de la NFL de 1994. Vous pouvez choisir entre le match simple, le championnat, les playoffs ou encore le Super Bowl. Le jeu permet aussi de choisir les conditions climatiques dans lesquelles vous voulez jouer. Enfin, chose bien plus intéressante encore dans ce genre de simulation, plus de 100 blessures pourront être infligées !

locale.title: Madden NFL 96
locale.synopsis:
John Madden returns for the '96 season of Madden NFL.
Play exhibition, Super Bowl, playoffs or full season with any of the 1995 teams or all Madden teams.
While you can still select weather and there are over 100 injuries, this version adds voice-overs and the ability to draft and create players and see if they get drafted.
Still includes windowless passing, all new Madden-designed strategies and team match-up that shows how your players stack up to the other team in their position.

Los 30 equipos de la NFL, incluidos Jacksonville y Carolina. Los códigos ocultos revelan equipos y jugadores secretos. Crear jugador Combine Scouting - Juego dentro del juego. Gráficos y animaciones completamente renderizados en 3-D: inmersiones superpuestas, capturas arrodilladas, logotipos en la zona de anotación, tackles de ropa, QB / kickers zurdos. Función de Gerente General: intercambiar y firmar jugadores. Más de 20 nuevas jugadas ofensivas y defensivas. Temporada completa con Playoffs y Super Bowl.

Madden NFL 96 sur Game Gear est en tout point similaire à sa version antérieure à l'exception évidente que vous aurez la possibilité de jouer avec les équipes présentes en NFL en 1995. Vous pouvez choisir d'effectuer un match simple, une saison complète ou de disputer le Super Bowl. Enfin, la principale nouveauté de cet opus réside dans l'ajout de voix digitalisées.

locale.title: Madou Monogatari A - Dokidoki Vacation
locale.synopsis:
Four-year old Arle Nadja goes into a forest near her grandmother's house but becomes lost getting distracted by Carbuncle. Along the way, she is granted powers from magic forest fairies, who teach her multiple spells. In the original version, Owlbear is the final boss who you run into constantly.
This was the only game to be remade and ported onto the Sega Gamegear (known as Madou Monogatari: A Doki Doki Vacation), but massive changes were made such as different enemies. There was also Satan being the main villain and final boss, and an entirely different intro where Skeleton-T, Sasori Man, and Suketoudara make a cameo.

Arle Nadja, de cuatro años, entra en un bosque cerca de la casa de su abuela, pero se pierde al distraerse con Carbunclo. En el camino, se le otorgan poderes de las hadas del bosque mágico, que le enseñan hechizos múltiples. En la versión original, Owlbear es el jefe final con el que te encuentras constantemente.
Este fue el único juego que se rehizo y portó al Sega Gamegear (conocido como Madou Monogatari: A Doki Doki Vacation), pero se realizaron cambios masivos como diferentes enemigos. También estaba Satanás como el principal villano y jefe final, y una introducción completamente diferente donde Skeleton-T, Sasori Man y Suketoudara hacen un cameo.

Arle Nadja va dans une forêt près de la maison de sa grand-mère , mais, distraite, se perd en chemin. Dotée du pouvoirs des fées de la forêt magique , qui lui enseignent ses multiples sorts, elle devra retrouver sa route.

locale.title: Madou Monogatari I: 3tsu no Madoukyuu
locale.synopsis:
In this game, you play a young apprentice sorceress named Arle. She studies at a magic school, and is about to take her most important examination: go to the Tower of Satan, defeat the enemies and overcome all the obstacles on the way using her magic power!
Mado Monogatari I is a puzzle/RPG mixture. Featuring characters and puzzles from Puyo Puyo games, it is set in a 3D dungeon which you explore from first-person perspective. Combat takes place on a platform, and is a mixture of turn-based and real time styles. Enemies attack you even if you wait, but you have time to perform your moves. You should hold down buttons and press direction arrows to execute various magic spells.

En este juego, juegas a una joven aprendiz de hechicera llamada Arle. Estudia en una escuela de magia y está por realizar su examen más importante: ¡ve a la Torre de Satanás, vence a los enemigos y supera todos los obstáculos en el camino usando su poder mágico!
Madou Monogatari I es una mezcla de rompecabezas / rol. Con personajes y acertijos de los juegos de Puyo Puyo, se encuentra en una mazmorra 3D que exploras desde la perspectiva en primera persona. El combate se lleva a cabo en una plataforma, y es una mezcla de estilos basados en turnos y en tiempo real. Los enemigos te atacan incluso si esperas, pero tienes tiempo para realizar tus movimientos. Debes mantener presionados los botones y presionar las flechas de dirección para ejecutar varios hechizos mágicos.

Madou Monogatari I sur Game Gear vous permet d'incarner une jeune apprentie sorcière nommée Arle. Vous devez sortir vivant de la Tour du Diable que vous explorerez en 3D à la première personne. Les combats se déroulent au tour par tour.

locale.title: Madou Monogatari II : Arle 16-sai
locale.synopsis:
Eleven years have passed since Arle Nadja, magician girl extraordinaire, has defeated the evil as part of her examination in the magical school. Now she is sixteen and she can still remember the spells she has learned long time ago. One day she meets a fresh young man who without any apparent reason casts a powerful spell on her. Arle finds herself locked in a prison cell. Grabbing the key, she runs out of the cell, only to find out she is imprisoned in a huge dungeon populated by vicious monsters...
Mado Monogatari II retains the gameplay system of the previous game. You navigate Arle through first-person 3D dungeons. Enemy encounters are random. During the turn-based battles, you can attack only with various types of magic. Since you don't see your own hit points, the key to winning the battles is to choose appropriate spells against various types of monsters.

Han pasado once años desde que Arle Nadja, la maga extraordinaria, derrotó al mal como parte de su examen en la escuela mágica. Ahora ella tiene dieciséis años y todavía puede recordar los hechizos que aprendió hace mucho tiempo. Un día conoce a un hombre joven y fresco que sin ninguna razón aparente ejerce un poderoso hechizo sobre ella. Arle se encuentra encerrada en una celda de la prisión. Agarrando la llave, ella sale corriendo de la celda, solo para descubrir que está aprisionada en una enorme mazmorra poblada de feroces monstruos ...
Mado Monogatari II conserva el sistema de juego del juego anterior. Navegas por Arle a través de mazmorras 3D en primera persona. Los encuentros enemigos son aleatorios. Duranute las batallas por turnos, puedes atacar solo con varios tipos de magia. Como no ves tus propios puntos de golpe, la clave para ganar las batallas es elegir hechizos apropiados contra varios tipos de monstruos.

Onze années se sont écoulées depuis la dernière aventure d'Arle. Dans Madou Monogatari II : Arle 16-sai sur Game Gear, vous incarnez à nouveau la jeune fille apprentie sorcière qui a été enfermée dans un donjon peuplé de créatures pas vraiment sympathiques. La jouabilité est identique à la version précédente, en ce sens, vous évoluerez dans des lieux en 3D, en vue à la première personne. Les combats se déroulent toujours au tour par tour.

locale.title: Madou Monogatari III : Kyuukyoku Joou-sama
locale.synopsis:
You play as the young magician Arle Nadja. One day Arle goes out for a walk and meets a mysterious woman. The woman tells her that she will avenge the death of Satan, whom Arle has defeated in the end of her first adventure. The woman then summons the awful monster Minotaur. Arle has no choice but to run away, and she falls down through a trap into a dungeon. It appears she is now alone there, because the first creature she meets in this dungeon is a frosh king. He asks Arle to use her magical powers to defeat the monsters in the dungeon and to find a way to escape from Minotaur and the mysterious woman.
The gameplay of Mado Monogatari III is similar to the two previous games. The entire game is viewed from first person perspective. You navigate Arle through maze-like 3D dungeons, encountering randomly appearing monsters and fighting them in turn-based combat. In battles you can't attack physically, only use various kinds of magic or items.

Un día, Arle sale a caminar y conoce a una mujer misteriosa. La mujer le dice que vengará la muerte de Satanás, a quien Arle derrotó al final de su primera aventura. La mujer entonces convoca al terrible monstruo Minotauro. Arle no tiene más remedio que huir, y ella cae a través de una trampa en una mazmorra. Parece que ahora está sola allí, porque la primera criatura que encuentra en esta mazmorra es un rey frosh. Él le pide a Arle que use sus poderes mágicos para derrotar a los monstruos en la mazmorra y para encontrar una forma de escapar de Minotauro y la misteriosa mujer.
La jugabilidad de Madou Monogatari III es similar a los dos juegos anteriores. Todo el juego se ve desde la perspectiva en primera persona. Navegas por Arle a través de mazmorras 3D tipo laberinto, te encuentras con monstruos que aparecen aleatoriamente y luchas contra ellos en combates por turnos. En las batallas no puedes atacar físicamente, solo usar varios tipos de magia o elementos.

Arle Nadja est désormais une magicienne émérite. Madou Monogatari III : Kyuukyoku Joou-sama sur Game Gear vous met au défi, comme les deux jeux précédents, de sortir vivant d'un donjon peuplé de créatures qui tenteront de vous barrer la route. Vous devrez les battre dans des combats au tour par tour et évoluerez dans des dédales en 3D.

locale.title: Magic Knight Rayearth
locale.synopsis:
This game is based on the anime and manga by manga artist CLAMP.
In the land of Cephiro, the world was kept in peace and harmony by the wishes of Princess Emauraude, the Pillar of Balance. But the evil priest, Lord Zagato, has kidnapped Emauraude, and Cephiro is being invaded by deadly beasts. If this continues, Zagato will gain complete control of Cephiro! The only ones who can stop him are the legendary Magic Knights...
And those Magic Knights are three young girls from Earth. Hikaru Shidou, Umi Ryuuzaki, and Fuu Hououjii have been plucked from modern-day Tokyo and brought to Cephiro by Emauraude, and they're the only ones who can defeat Zagato...as the Magic Knights!
This interpretation of the manga story is a traditional Japanese-style RPG. The player controls the three main heroines as a party; each one uses different weapons and learns various skills. Typically for the genre, the party roams the top-down world, visits towns, descends into dungeons, chats with non-playable characters, and fights randomly appearing enemies in turn-based style.

En la tierra de Cephiro, el mundo se mantuvo en paz y armonía por los deseos de la Princesa Emauraude, el Pilar del Equilibrio. Pero el sacerdote malvado, Lord Zagato, ha secuestrado a Emauraude, y Cephiro está siendo invadido por bestias mortales. Si esto continúa, ¡Zagato obtendrá el control completo de Cephiro! Los únicos que pueden detenerlo son los legendarios Caballeros Mágicos ...
Y esos Magic Knights son tres chicas jóvenes de la Tierra. Hikaru Shidou, Umi Ryuuzaki y Fuu Hououjii han sido arrancados de la Tokio moderna y llevados a Cephiro por Emauraude, y son los únicos que pueden vencer a Zagato ... ¡como los Caballeros Mágicos!

La Princesse Emeraude, garante de la paix au Royaume Cephiro a été kidnappée. Magic Knight Rayearth sur Game Gear vous propose d'incarner trois chevaliers qui devront battre le seigneur Zagato et toutes les créatures qui ont envahi le royaume pour sauver la princesse et rétablir la paix.

game.name: Magic Knight Rayearth 2 - Making Of Magic Knight

locale.title: Magic Knight Rayearth 2: Making of Magic Knight
locale.synopsis: Magic Knight Rayearth 2: Making of Magic Knight is an RPG for the Sega Game Gear. It is based upon the Magic Knight Rayearth manga and anime series.

Mahou Kishi Rayearth 2: Making of Magic Knight es un juego diferente a los demás juegos de Magic Knight Rayearth, a pesar de tener el título de secuela. Mientras que los otros juegos son juegos de rol, este es un juego de estrategia / estilo de crianza.
El trabajo de los jugadores es entrenar a Hikaru, Fuu y Umi para finalmente convertirse en Caballeros Mágicos.
El juego se basa principalmente en menús con varias actividades en el juego que no se pueden controlar directamente.

Mahou Kishi Rayearth 2: Making of Magic Knight est un jeu différent des autres jeux de la série des Magic Knight Rayearth tout en étant considéré comme une suite. Alors que les autres jeux sont des RPG, ce jeu est un jeu de stratégie.
Le principe des joueurs est de former Hikaru, Fuu, et Umi pour devenir en fin de compte un Magic Knights.
Le jeu est surtout pilotée depuis un menu avec diverses activités dans le jeu qui ne sont pas directement contrôlables.

locale.title: Magic Knight Rayearth 2 : Making of Magic Knight
Magical Puzzle Popils
locale.synopsis:
Magical Puzzle Popils is a single screen platform puzzle game. The object in each round is to go through the labyrinth until the player reaches the princess (or the princess reaches the player). The player can break blocks, climb ladders, go through portals. There are also hazards to avoid, like red spikes and enemies.
Breaking blocks is the most important gameplay element. Breaking a block causes the column of blocks above it to fall one place down. The player must use this block breaking ability to change the labyrinth and create a way to the princess.
The short introduction sequence shows the back story: A beautiful princess fell in love with you! And you fell in love with her too... The wizard of forest "Popil" shut her in his labyrinth. Please save her!

Secuestrada por el hechicero Popils, la bella princesa clama por tu ayuda. A medida que camina alrededor, debes destruir los bloques golpeándolos, pateándolos y golpeándolos con la cabeza en el orden correcto y en el momento adecuado para alcanzarla.

Magical Puzzle Popils est un puzzle game dans lequel vous devez rejoindre (ou vous faire rejoindre) par votre princesse enfermée par le sorcier de la foret "Popil". Pour cela vous pourrez détruire des blocs de pierre, escalader des échelles et passer au travers de portails.

locale.title: Magical Taruruuto-kun
locale.synopsis: Magical Taruruuto-kun is a shoot-'em-up game published by Tsukuda Ideal for the Sega Game Gear. It is based upon the Magical Taruruuto-kun manga and anime series. Another Magical Taruruuto-kun was released on the Sega Mega Drive by a different company.

Esta es una de las adaptaciones del manga y anima a Talulu, el mago de Tatsuya Egawa. El mundo está representado por un mapa que proporciona acceso a 5 niveles de desplazamiento horizontal, así como a minijuegos. Talulu, el mago, puede atacar con la ayuda de su lengua. Él también puede comer Takoyaki a lo largo de los niveles.

Magical Taruruto-kun est un jeu d'action plates-formes en 2D. Il s'agit d'une des adaptations du manga et anime Talulu le magicien de Tatsuya Egawa. Le monde est représenté par carte qui donne accès à 5 niveaux à défilement horizontal ainsi qu'à des mini-jeux. Talulu le magicien peut attaquer à l'aide de sa langue. Il peut aussi manger des Takoyaki le long des niveaux.

game.name: Man Overboard!

locale.title: Man Overboard!
locale.synopsis:
Your name is Kevin Codner  rescue mariner extraordinaire, answering the distress call of a sinking cruise liner, the SS Lucifer. You set off in your little submarine and board the ship where a horde of passengers desperately need your keen oversight and "shipsmarts".
In 60 levels you have to rescue as many passengers (dubbed the Dim Passengers) as possible. At the beginning the passengers fall through a tube in the level. Similar to Lemmings you have to find a way for the passengers to the exit of the level. In order to do so, you must blast hindrances such cargo boxes and bulkheads with bombs or, when no bombs are left, reposition the boxes with a crane. There are also conveyor belts in the levels. If the belt moves in the wrong way, the passengers either can't use it or may even be transported to their dooms, being dropped off into water, fire or steam jets. You can usually choose the direction of the belts by pulling a lever.
There are several types of scenarios that Kevin Codner (you) are faced with throughout the game. Of course the puzzles get progressively more difficult, involving things like patching up cracked pipes to stop a lethal jet of steam from cooking the distressed passengers. You can blast away obstacles and stack crates in creative manners. For instance, you can have them fall onto each other to form a bridge across a gap or to provide shielding from fire. This is usually done by hoisting them onto conveyor belts using a crane.
Each level has a certain "save limit", meaning you have to save at least a certain amount of passengers. This again is akin a bit towards Lemmings, and lots of levels have a built-in time limit, represented be water pouring into the compartment, rising ominously. When the water rises high enough, the passengers will get carried along with it, and they can only swim for a short period of time before getting exhausted and drowning, so you'd better be on time with some assistance.
At the end of each level you receive a password (again, Lemmings-style) so that you may pick up your game from the current level without having to progress through them all from the get-go.

Ésta vez has caído hasta el fondo del agujero. El Steam Ship se encuentra en un viaje de ida al fondo del mar luego de una colisión con un iceberg. Está abarrotada de pasajeros afectados por el pánico esperando a su héroe, Kevin, para que vaya al rescate. En el papel de Kevin, debes guiar a los Pasajeros a través de algunos de los peores peligros encontrados en los juegos modernos antes de que los compartimentos se inunden y se acabe el tiempo.

Sink or Swim, connu également sous le nom S.S. Lucifer : Man Overboard !, est un jeu de réflexion sur Game Gear. Vous êtes Kevin Codner, secouriste à la rescousse des passagers du navire de croisière SS Lucifer. Dans chacun des 60 niveaux, vous devez ouvrir le chemin vers la sortie. Les passagers se déplacent sans prendre garde et il faut sans cesse les devancer pour n'en perdre aucun. Mais attention à ne pas confondre vitesse et précipitation, sous peine d'avoir des morts sur la conscience.

game.developer: The Big Red Software Company Ltd.

locale.title: Mappy
locale.synopsis: You control Mappy a police-mouse whose job is to collect valuables (consumer electronics)from a cat's house. You are being pursued by a gang of five pink cats. Doors are your only defense against the cats. You get from floor to floor by jumping on one of the trampolines. Points are earned by recovering stolen goods. Other ways of earning points are bouncing on a trampoline, putting cats in the microwave, striking a cat with a door, striking cats with a bell, retrieving a treasures from the Boss cat Goro or dropping cats through a hole in the floor.

Usted controla a Mappy un policía-ratón cuyo trabajo es recoger objetos de valor (productos electrónicos de consumo) de la casa de un gato. Estás siendo perseguido por una pandilla de cinco gatos rosados. Las puertas son tu única defensa contra los gatos. Usted obtiene de piso a piso saltando en uno de los trampolines.nnLos puntos se obtienen recuperando bienes robados. Otras formas de ganar puntos son rebotar en un trampolín, poner gatos en el microondas, golpear a un gato con una puerta, golpear gatos con una campana, recuperar tesoros del gato Goro del Jefe o dejar caer gatos a través de un agujero en el piso.

Dans Mappy sur Game Gear vous contrôlez une souris policière dont l'objectif est de récupérer des produits électroménagers dans la demeure d'un chat. Vous êtes poursuivi par cinq chats que vous pourrez assommer pour un court temps en leur claquant la porte au nez ou encore pousser cruellement dans un micro-ondes pour vous en débarrasser définitivement.

locale.title: Marble Madness
locale.synopsis: A port of the arcade game. The idea is deceptively simple: Guide a marble down a path without hitting any obstacles or straying off the course. The game is viewed from an isometric perspective, which makes it harder to stay focused on the direction the ball is to follow. There are tight corridors to follow and enemies to avoid. There is a 2-player mode in which players must race to the finish; otherwise you're racing against the clock.

Marble Madness, uno de los más grandes hits en las galerías. Ahora llega al Game Gear. Más apasionante que nunca, esta versión de Game Gear contiene seis trayectorias cada vez más y más difíciles, con una variedad de trampas que te demorarán y un anfitrión devorador de monstruos de mármol.

Marble Madness sur Game Gear est l'adaptation du hit d'arcade du même nom. Vous devez guider une bille d'un point A à un point B, tout en évitant la chute et les ennemis. Un mode deux joueurs reprend le principe de base du jeu à la différence qu'il vous faut terminer le niveau avant votre adversaire pour remporter la victoire.

'Marble Madness', einer der größten Spielschlager der Arcade-Geschichte, jetzt auch für das Game Gear erhältlich! Diese Version umfaßt sechs zunehmend schwieriger werdende Levels mit zahireichen Hindermissen und einer Horde murmelfressender Monster. Ein absolut fesselnder Spielspaß!

locale.title: Marko's Magic Football
locale.synopsis:
With the help of a mad scientist, Colonel Brown, the owner of a toy factory, has created a substance that can turn people and animals into mutant sludge monsters. After Marko's football comes in touch with the substance, it gets magical powers and Marko sets out to stop Colonel Brown.
The gameplay is similar to the SNES and Genesis versions, meaning Marko can shoot his football to kill enemies or use it as a trampoline, but this version features less moves and a different level design.

Bienvenido al mundo de Marko, un mundo de locura de dibujos animados. Experimenta la mezcla adictiva de habilidades de fútbol y acción de plataforma que se combinan para crear una experiencia de juego magnífica. Agregue los gráficos más increíbles que haya visto y el resultado es el Magic Football de Marko. Es como jugar una caricatura.

Marko's Magic Football est un jeu de plates-formes sur Game Gear. Vous contrôlez Marko, qui doit à tout prix arrêter le Colonel Brown qui transforme les gens en mutants. Armé de votre ballon magique, il faudra traverser tous les niveaux du jeu en faisant plusieurs tricks de football pour vous débarrasser de vos ennemis.

locale.title: Mega Man
locale.synopsis:
The insane scientist, Dr. Wily, has created an army of evil robots, and is using them to take over the world! A robot called Rock volunteers to be converted into a fighting robot, Mega Man. As Mega Man, he takes on Dr. Wily and his powerful robots.
The Game Gear version of Mega Man is an original game created by developer Freestyle, using Mega Man 4 and Mega Man 5 for the NES as its basis. Mega Man is able to perform his slide that was introduced in Mega Man 3, as well as call his dog, Rush, for assistance. He can also charge up his buster for a more powerful shot.
Players can initially select any stage from a choice of four: Stone Man, Napalm Man, Bright Man and Star Man. After defeating these four bosses, players progress to Dr. Cossack's fortress, which contains Wave Man and Toad Man as its bosses. After they are defeated, it's off to the final confrontation with Dr. Wily himself.

¡El loco científico, el Dr. Wily, ha creado un ejército de robots malvados y los está utilizando para conquistar el mundo! Un robot llamado Rock voluntarios se convertirá en un robot de combate, Mega Man. Como Mega Man, se enfrenta al Dr. Wily y sus poderosos robots

L'édition Game Gear de Mega Man est un mélange des épisodes 4 et 5 sortis sur Nes. La cartouche se distingue également par un niveau de difficulté plus élevé puisqu'elle n'autorise pas la poursuite d'une partie après un game over. Dans ce jeu d'action plate-forme, le héros doit affronter une série de robots de combats, chacun doté d'un pouvoir différent. Une fois terrassé, Mega Man peut s'emparer dudit pouvoir pour l'utiliser à son compte dans la suite de son parcours.

game.name: Megami Tensei Gaiden - Last Bible Special

locale.title: Megami Tensei Gaiden : Last Bible Special
locale.synopsis: Megami Tensei Gaiden: Last Bible Special is a Role-Playing game, developed by Sims and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1995.
Los humanos en esta aplicación pueden apelar al poder de Gaia. El héroe principal, El, aprende el arte de Gaia y tiene que salvar al mundo de un mal maestro Gaia ayudado por sus amigos Kishe y Urano.

Megami Tensei Gaiden : Last Bible Special est un jeu de rôle sur Game Gear. Les humains dans ce soft peuvent faire appel à la puissance de Gaia. Le héros principal, El, apprend l'art de Gaia et doit sauver le monde d'un méchant maître Gaia aidé par ses amis Kishe et Uranus.

locale.title: Megami Tensei Gaiden : Last Bible S
Mick & Mack: Global Gladiators
locale.synopsis:
Global Gladiators is a fairly standard platform game with the most notable fact being that the characters were created and licensed from McDonalds (yes, THE McDonalds).
While playing through the game's 12 levels you'll notice McDonalds logos, burgers and all sorts of family restaurant type stuff as you take Mick and Mack (the game's protagonists) on a journey to clean up "Monsters of Slime World", "Toxi-Town" and more.

Ponte el GooShooter y únete a Mick y Mack los Global Gladiators, en su aventura para aniquilar a los Monstruos del Slime World, The Mystical Forest, Toxi-Town y Artie World. ¡Échale un vistazo a los escenarios súper-guay, 1.250 gráficos de estupenda animación y el sonido más conseguido del momento!

Mick et Mack sont les Global Gladiators dans ce jeu de plates-formes sur Game Gear. Armés de fusils à ketchup, ils doivent éliminer les monstres dans les niveaux qu'ils traversent, tout en collectant un maximum de logos McDonald's pour pouvoir passer à la zone suivante, le tout en respectant le temps imparti.

imm deine Schleimschleuder und schließe dich Mick und Mack, den Global Gladiators an, um die Monster von Slime World, The Mystical Forest, Toxi-Town und Arctic World zu bekämpfen. Sieh Dir die super Hintergrundbilder an, staune über die 1250 umwerfenden Animationen, und hör dabei die genialsten Soundeffekte aller Zeiten!"

locale.title: Mickey's Ultimate Challenge
locale.synopsis:
One night, as Mickey (or Minnie) lay in bed reading a book of fairy tales, he started to wonder how it would be to live in a far off land, in a magic castle. As he fell asleep, he woke up in the Kingdom of Beanwick, which is constantly tormented by earthquakes. Then, he offers his help to solve the mystery behind those earthquakes.
Mickey's Ultimate Challenge is a puzzle game in which the player chooses either Mickey or Minnie to play with. They'll find five characters from the Disney's universe in the kingdom, and will be prompted to help them in several tasks.
Each task is a different puzzle, given by a specific character. Daisy, for instance, will ask help to clean the castle's paintings hanging on a wall. The task is in fact a memory game, where Mickey or Minnie must clean the pictures matching pairs. After completing one task, they'll receive a gift.
After completing all tasks, Mickey or Minnie must trade the gifts they won with the right characters. For instance, after finishing Goofy's task, they will receive his hammer. The player must then guess who among the other characters would like to receive that hammer.
Giving the right items to the right characters will allow Mickey or Minnie access to the last puzzle and character.

Cinco rompecabezas mágicos Lleno de diversión familiar! ¡El cielo está retumbando! ¡El cielo está retumbando! ¿Qué puede ser? ", Gritan los ciudadanos de Beanwick. ¿Es una tormenta? ¿Es un monstruo? ¿Es el final del Reino?" No lo sé, pero averiguaré, dice Mickey, "si tengo que buscar en cada habitación del Castillo de Beanwick para resolver el misterio". En Mickey's Ultimate Challenge, voluntarios como Mickey o Minnie para ayudar al Reino de Beanwick a resolver el misterio de los rumores en el cielo. Pero primero debes demostrar que eres digno de este desafío: al pensar en una serie de acertijos diabólicamente ingeniosos, los jugadores de 4 a 104 pueden aprovechar al máximo las capacidades interactivas del juego para poner a prueba tus habilidades de pensamiento crítico. Cinco lugares increíbles!

Mickey s'est endormi en lisant un livre de conte de fées. Il se réveille dans le Royaume de Beanwick, victime d'incessants tremblements de terre. Dans sa grande gentillesse qui lui est propre, la souris offre ses services pour percer le mystère. Mickey's Ultimate Challenge sur Game Gear se présente comme un jeu à énigmes où Mickey rencontre des personnages du royaume qui ont tous un petit problème à régler. Un fois le service rendu, ceux-ci vous guideront dans votre quête.

locale.title: MicroMachines
locale.synopsis:
If you're bored of racing Formula 1 cars, rally cars or MotoGP bikes in their natural habitats, the Micro Machines series could be for you. It involves racing miniatures representing particular vehicle types across a particular terrain found around the house. The Sports Cars race on the desktop, 4x4s in the sandpit, Formula 1 cars on a snooker table, and so on.
These levels were packed with variation. The Snooker tables has the track painted on, although this is open to deviation (as are most levels), and had you racing through the pockets and across the rim of the table. Tanks raced as well, with the chance of shooting out your opponent if they got directly in front of you. The desktop levels include binders to jump across, pencil-sharpeners to avoid, and lots of visual jokes in the open homework.
Viewed from overhead with small graphics, the races include up to 4 cars. In one player challenge mode you race through the 21 tracks in a set order, selecting your 3 opponents as you go along (adding a fair amount of strategy - ideally you should aim to eliminate the better CPU cars early on), eliminating one after every third race (assuming that you can finish in the top 2 of a race within your 3 lives). If you win 3 races in a row without using a continue you get a time-trial race which can earn you an extra life.
The real innovation of the game was in the multiplayer modes. You started with 4 points each, and when one car gets far enough ahead to force the other car off-screen, the slider moves in their favour. Once it reached the end (which involved beating them 4 times more than they beat you) you win the level, although if 3 laps were completed, the person leading at that point is declared the winner - with a sudden death play off if scores are level. 9 of the tracks are available in this mode, although you can also play this Head to Head system as a 1-player game across all the tracks.

¡Esto es un caos en miniatura! Corre en bólidos, chóppers y lanchas! Recorre como una bala las mini-pistas a escala espectacular. ¡Eres capaz de conducir sobre rutas llenas de hoyos de arena, mesas de billar y pupitres de escuela! ¡Es excelente!

MicroMachines sur Game Gear vous propose de diriger les petits véhicules de la marque, dans des courses fun et variées au beau milieu d'une baignoire, d'un bureau, ou d'une table à manger. Les courses incluant jusqu'à 4 concurrents. Si l'un d'eux tombe du circuit où se fait trop distancer, il perd un point.

Es geht drunter und drüber, diesmal klitzeklein! Rennen Sie winzige Autos. Motorräder und Boote! Rasen Sie durch die spektakulären, maßstabsgetreuen Ministrecken! Schaffen Sie Rennen in und auf Sandkästen, Billiardtischen und Schulpulten? Dann los, es ist einfach super!

locale.title: MicroMachines 2 : Turbo Tournament
locale.synopsis: The second game of the Micro Machines series. Like in its predecessor, you behind the steering wheel of an extremely small car. You race around on interesting places, like a table, a treehouse and many more. The control of the cars is sometimes quite difficult, especially if you don't know the tracks (the top-down view is not very clear). The CD-ROM version additionally features CD-Audio music and a track editor.

16 personajes locos para elegir!
¡Más grande, mejor, más rápido, más malo, más! ¡Están de vuelta! Codemasters le ofrece Micro Machines 2 - Turbo Tournament, con más micro-poder que nunca. Al pasar el ratón, seguir, andar en bicicleta, el juego explotó en todos los aspectos. Circuitos interactivos, lluvia, saltos salvajes y mucho más.
Head to Head, Challenge, Knockouts, Super League. Más de 37 circuitos interactivos con peligros animados. Hasta 8 personas pueden jugar en un torneo. Música salvaje y FX. 12 nuevos vehículos increíbles para conducir!

MicroMachines 2 : Turbo Tournament est un jeu de courses sur Game Gearqui vous met aux volants des fameux bolides miniatures. Le but est d'arriver premier en prenant soin de distancer les autres joueurs pour leur faire perdre des points.

locale.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers
locale.synopsis:
This is a one-on-one fighting game for one or two players.
Single players pick a Ranger (Red, Pink, Blue, Yellow, Black, or the unlockable Green) and take him or her through a series of battles against Rita's monsters. After one normal battle, the monster grows very large, and then it is time to take out the MegaZord.

¡Es la hora de Morphin! Los Power Rangers deben salvar a la Tierra de las malvadas garras de Rita Repulsa. Hay dos cosas que tienen poder ilimitado: la actitud de los adolescentes y los Dinosaurios. Los Power Rangers poseen ambas cosas.

Mighty Morphin Power Rangers sur Game Gear vous propose d'incarner les héros de la série télévisée à succès des années 90. Vous incarnez l'un des cinq Power Rangers (dont le vert sera à débloquer) dans des phases de combat contre les monstres de Rita. La deuxième phase du combat démarre lorsque celle-ci décide de faire grandir son monstre. Vous invoquez alors le Megazord et prenez ses commandes dans un combat titanesque.

game.name: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers - The Movie

locale.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers - The Movie
locale.synopsis: Based on this summer's blockbuster hit, Power Rangers The Movie delivers action, fighting and adventure! Ivan Ooze has surfaced after six thousand years, and he's in a foul mood! It's up to you and the Power Rangers to stop him before he unleashes a steady stream of destruction on an unsuspecting universe. Introducing for the first time - White Ranger! It's Morphin' time!

Basado en el éxito de taquilla de este verano, Power Rangers The Movie ofrece acción, lucha y aventura. ¡Ivan Ooze ha aparecido después de seis mil años, y está de mal humor! Depende de usted y de los Power Rangers detenerlo antes de que libere una corriente constante de destrucción en un universo desprevenido. Presentando por primera vez - ¡White Ranger! ¡Es hora de morfina!

Le jeu Power Rangers The Movie reprend des passages clés du film, tel la 1re rencontre avec Ivan Ooze, l'obtention des Ninja Coins par les Rangers et le duel final du Film, mais aussi un retour sur l'épisode White Light dans lequel Tommy-Ranger Blanc apparait dans la série, un retour sur l'épisode Power Transfer qui se recentre sur la passation de pouvoir de Jason, Trini et Zack à Aisha, Adam et Rocky, et un niveau inédit où les rangers doivent battre successivement Goldar et Lord Zedd(non vu dans la série)

locale.title: MLBPA Baseball
locale.synopsis: Never before has a baseball game been created that captures the details of the sport like MLBPA Baseball. Realistic run-downs, accurate cut-off plays, the double switch, multiple defensive alignments, snap throws, even bad hops and booted balls. Throw in every player from Alamar to Zeile and you've got the only baseball game worth playing for the Super NES.

Nunca antes se había creado un juego de béisbol que capturara los detalles del deporte como MLBPA Baseball. Descensos realistas, jugadas de corte precisas, doble cambio, alineaciones defensivas múltiples, lanzamientos rápidos, incluso saltos malos y bolas con botas. Incluye a todos los jugadores de Alamar a Zeile y tienes el único juego de béisbol que vale la pena jugar para Game Gear.
MLBPA Baseball est un jeu de baseball, n'ayant pas la licence officielle, le titre propose de faire des matches entre 28 équipes fictives représentant des villes des Etats-Unis.

game.name: Mod2psg V1.8 - Secret Of Monkey Island

locale.title: Mod2psg V1.8 - Secret Of Monkey Island

game.name: Moldorian - Hikari To Yami No Sister

locale.title: Moldorian - Hikari to Yami no Sister
locale.synopsis:
Once upon a time, there lived two races that lived seperately from each other aside from uncivilized monsters, "humans" and "demons". Humans lived on one end, tending to the land and living relatively mundane lives and demons lived on the other, strong with magical powers and willing to prove their dominance, though humans were rarely targets of their aggression. The world Moldoria acted as the boundary that seperated the two races and allowed each other to co-exist mutually. However, one day, while two mortals of the quaint village of Koizun, Nabal and Milia, are running simple errands and investigating the eastern woods, they witness a demon running through the woods.
Uncertain of what this could mean, the two decide not to alert the townsfolk and investigate where the demon went, which is a hole in the woods. Milia stands watch while Nabal checks inside, but when he returns, Milia is abducted by a demon. Nabal alerts the town and his father, who goes out to search for Milia, but when he fails to return, Nabal decides to go himself, which is the start of his adventure as he interacts with various supporting characters while finding out why the demons kidnapped Milia and why the demons are now on the move.
Los humanos y los demonios viven en cada extremo del mundo de Moldoria. Hasta el día en que Milia es secuestrada por un demonio. Eres Nabal, su amigo, y vas a buscarlo.
Les humains et les démons vivent à chaque extrémité du monde de Moldoria. Jusqu'au jour ou Milia est enlevé par un démon. Vous êtes Nabal, son ami, et vous partez à sa recherche.

locale.title: Moldorian : Hikari to Yami no Sister
Monster Truck Wars
locale.synopsis: Get behind the wheel and crush the competition ! Six thunderous Monster Trucks pulverize everthing in their path on the toughest circuits in America! Driving turboforce, explosive nitro bursts and 1500 horsepower fire up your mean monster machine !!

¡Agárrate al volante y arrasa en esta carrera! ¡Seis atronadores Monster Trucks pulverizan todo lo que encuentran a su paso, en los circuitos más duros de la redonda! Una turbofuerza impulsora, explosiones de óxido nitroso y una potencia de 1.500 caballos de vapor mantienen en acción a tu impresionante máquina monstruosa!

Monster Truck Wars est un jeu de course dans lequel vous êtes au volant de monstres d'acier gigantesques capables de rouler sur des voitures. Présenté en vue du dessus à la Micro Machines, le soft propose plusieurs tracés à travers l'Amérique du Nord et différents véhicules à l'apparence distincte. Jouable uniquement en solo, Monster Truck Wars permet également de customiser ou de réparer votre engin avec l'argent gagné en championnat si vous parvenez à vous qualifier aux différentes épreuves.

Setz Dich ans Steuer, und laß die Konkurrenz Deinen Staub schlucken! Sechs riesige Monster Trucks donnern über die härtesten Strecken und zermalmen alles, was sich ihnen in den Weg stellt. Die totale Turbopower, explosive Nitroantriebe und 1500 PS bringen Deine höllische Monstermaschine voll in Fahrt!

locale.title: Mortal Kombat
locale.synopsis:
Five Hundred years ago, an ancient and well respected Shaolin fighting tournament, held every 50 years, was corrupted by an evil and elderly sorcerer by the name of Shang Tsung. Shang was accompanied by Prince Goro, a warrior of the Shokan race (a four armed half-human/half-dragon). Knowing that if ten tournaments in a row were won by the Outworld champion, the Earth Realm would be conquered by evil and fall into darkness, Shang entered Goro in the tournament and had him defeat the great Kung Lao. Goro has been reigning supreme as the undefeated fighting champion for five hundred years now. As the last tournament required draws near, Raiden, Thunder God and protector of the Earth Realm, enacts a plan to tip the scales in the humans favor, Seven fighters step into the arena on Shang Tsung's mysterious island: Shaolin warrior Liu Kang, Special Forces operative Sonya Blade, the mercenary thug Kano, fame-seeking actor Johnny Cage, the ice wielding Lin Kuei warrior Sub-Zero and his undead adversary Scorpion, and Raiden himself.
Mortal Kombat is a side-scrolling 1 on 1 fighting game. Fighting is set as one on one kombat, allowing each player to perform a variety of punches, kicks, and special moves in order to defeat their opponent. When the opponent faces their second round loss, the winner can perform a finishing move called a "Fatality" on the loser. The Fatality is a move unique to each fighter that graphically kills the loser in a blood-soaked finale.
Mortal Kombat began its life as a 2-player arcade title. It is notable for its use of digitized actors to represent the game's fighters, as well as its use of copious amounts of blood during gameplay.
PREPÁRATE... ¡El mayor éxito arcade ya está a tu disposición! ¡LOS GUERREROS DE KOMBAT! ¡ACABA CON EL! ¡VEN AQUÍ! ¡GORO VIVE!

Battez vos adversaires pour défier le guerrier Shokan nommé Goro, champion du tournoi depuis plus de 500 ans. Adaptation du célébrissime jeu d'arcade, Mortal Kombat sur Game Gear vous permet d'incarner 8 prétendants à la victoire finale, dont les protégés du seigneur Raiden, seuls remparts contre la menace qui pèse sur le Royaume de la Terre.
MACH DICH AUF WAS GEFASßT...Der Spielhallenknüller Nr.1 ist da! ALLE KOMBAT-KÄMPFER! MACH IHN FERTIG! EINFACH ERSCHÜTTERND! GORO LEBT!

locale.title: Mortal Kombat 2
locale.synopsis:
The Mortal Kombat fighters, plus several new ones, return for a tournament held by the evil Shang Tsung of the Outworld. The action is one-on-one as before, and famed for its high level of violence and blood (other than the sanitised Nintendo version). There are 5 difficulty levels and optional credits, as well as the usual two player mode including same character duels.
To win the main tournament, the player must beat each of the other human players, before taking on Shang Tsung, Kintaro and finally Shao Kahn. Players have a range of punches and kicks available, as well as flying kicks, uppercuts, roundhouses, and the special moves, which vary for each player. These include throws, uppercuts, long-distance bullets, bicycle kicks and a teleport feature.

Los duros Kombatientes del famoso juego, número 1 de máquinas recreativas, se han reunido para un nuevo desafío: Mortal Kombat® II. Y tú manejarás todas sus acciones: brutales movimientos, camaradería en el combate, Babalities, sopresas ocultas, demoledora combinación de movimientos (combos) y extraordinarios movimientos de remate. ¡Que kontinúe el Kombate...!

Mortal Kombat II, est un jeu de combat sur Game Gear. Combos, fatalités et autres coups spéciaux, tels sont les ingrédients qui fondent le succès d'un jeu réputé pour la violence de ses affrontements. Le joueur incarne l'un des 12 personnages et doit vaincre un par un l'ensemble de ses concurrents directs pour gagner le tournoi et mettre un terme au règne du maléfique Shao Kahn.

Die gnadenlosen Kämpfer des Arcade-Superhits Nr.1 sammeln sich zum Mortal Kombat® II. Und Du hast das Kommandol Knallharte Schläge, Freundschaften, Babalities, versteckte Überraschungen, vernichtende Kombinationsbewegungen und wahnsinnige Finishing Moves. Der Kampf geht weiter... DER LACHE SCHLAGT ZU! BRENZILG! IST DAS ALLES, WAS DU KANNST? MACH IHN VERTIG! GIB'S IHM!

locale.title: Mortal Kombat 3
locale.synopsis:
Shao Kahn has won. The Earthrealm is no more. In order to revive his Queen Sindel, the emperor Shao Kahn used the Outworld Tournament from Mortal Kombat 2 as a diversion while his Shadow Priests revive his fallen Queen on Earth. Once enacted, the dimensional bridge between the two realms connects, allowing Kahn's extermination squads to invade and destroy Earth, and enslave the population's souls.
A small team of Raiden's "Chosen Warriors" survives the attack: Mortal Kombat champion Liu Kang and his ally Kung Lao, Special Forces agents Sonya Blade and Jax, the shaman Nightwolf, the riot cop Stryker, the nomadic Kabal, and former Lin Kuei warrior Sub-Zero, who has gone rogue from his clan. Facing the warriors are the mercenary Kano, cyber-ninjas Smoke, Sektor and Cyrax, Sheeva, a female Shokan, the sorcerer Shang Tsung, and Queen Sindel herself.
Mortal Kombat 3 brings new elements to the 2D fighting series: multi-level playfields, "Dial-A-Combo" attacks, a "Run" button to speed up the battles, and "Vs." codes, which unlock new powers and abilities once both players enter a code sequence in pre-match-up screens. Also included are more stage fatalities and finishing moves as each warrior attempts to go one-on-one with the Centaurian enforcer Motaro, and Shao Kahn himself.
Mortal Kombat 3 is the last traditional one-on-one fighting game game in the series to feature motion-captured digitized graphics for its kombatants, and introduces online network play to the PC version.

PREPÁRATE PARA LA PELEA DE TU VIDA... ¡Se pueden seleccionar 8 jugadores, incluyendo 6 personajes nuevos y un luchador escondido en alguna parte del juego! ¡Son los luchadores más grandes que se han visto nunca en le Game Gear, para que puedas meterte de lleno en la acción! Cinco escenarios copiados directamente de los de la versión para máquinas recreativas. ¡Entradas secretas que te permiten abrirte paso a golpes hacia nuevos escenarios y así pelear en una extraordinaria lucha bi-nivel! ¡Más Fatalities y Babalities! ¡Luchadores impactantes y completamente digitalizados que hacen posible que la acción tenga un realismo nunca visto! SUMÉRGETE EN LA OSCURIDAD DE MORTAL KOMBAT 3. ES TU PELEA, ES TU VIDA.

Shao Kahn est sorti vainqueur du précedent Mortal Kombat. Le Royaume de la Terre n'est plus. Vous devrez dans Mortal Kombat 3, affronter à nouveau les poulains de Shang Tsung, ainsi qu'une redoutable adversaire, la Reine Sindel. De nouveaux mouvements et la possibilité de courir ont été ajoutés à cet opus qui clôt la trilogie sur Game Gear.

locale.title: Ms. Pac-Man
locale.synopsis:
In 1982, a sequel to the incredibly popular Pac-Man was introduced in the form of his girlfriend, Ms. Pac-Man. This sequel continued on the "eat the dots/avoid the ghosts" gameplay of the original game, but added new features to keep the title fresh.
Like her boyfriend, Ms. Pac-Man attempts to clear four various and challenging mazes filled with dots and ever-moving bouncing fruit while avoiding Inky, Blinky, Pinky and Sue, each with their own personalities and tactics. One touch from any of these ghosts means a loss of life for Ms. Pac-Man.
Ms. Pac-Man can turn the tables on her pursuers by eating one of the four Energizers located within the maze. During this time, the ghosts turn blue, and Ms. Pac-Man can eat them for bonus points (ranging from 200, 400, 800 and 1600, progressively). The Energizer power only lasts for a limited amount of time, as the ghost's eyes float back to their center box, and regenerate to chase after Ms. Pac-Man again.
Survive a few rounds of gameplay, and the player will be treated to humorous intermissions showing the growing romantic relationship between Pac-Man and Ms. Pac-Man, leading all the way up to the arrival of "Junior".

¡La Srta. Pac-Man está aquí para volverlo totalmente loco y salvaje con más diversión de lo que jamás hayas imaginado! Cuatro fantasmas combativos están persiguiendo MS. PAC-MAN. Usa tu habilidad y estrategia para acumular puntos mientras superas a los fantasmas que devoran. Tome una píldora de energía y obtenga aún más puntos. ¡Ahora engullen a todos esos fantasmas intrépidos!

Ms. Pac-Man sur Game Gear est un jeu d'arcade dans lequel vous dirigez une petite boule jaune dans un labyrinthe infesté de fantômes à votre poursuite. A vous de leur échapper tout en ramassant les pac-gommes sur votre chemin. Attrapez des bonus afin de pourchasser les fantômes à votre tour et les dévorer pendant un court laps de temps. Mais attention à leur course aléatoire !

locale.title: Nazo Puyo
locale.synopsis:
Nazo Puyo (Secret Puyo) takes the "Quest mode" found in many Puyo Puyo games and breaks it off into a game of its own. Whereas the usual Puyo Puyo gameplay is centred around beating an opponent by having a more skillful play technique, the puzzle mode (and all Nazo Puyo) games is a leisurly puzzle game where you have to fulfill a set goal on a screen already filled with a certain arrangement of Puyos.
These goals may be to simply eliminate all Puyos on-screen, to eliminate all Puyos of a certain colour, or to eliminate a certain number of Puyos at once. You may also be asked to do a "rensa", or chain reaction, in a certain number of steps. A "rensa" is arranged by making so that if one set of four or more Puyos is eliminated, it will make neighbouring Puyos fall so that new combinations arise, and are eliminated. The fulfillment of the goals may be complicated by the fact that you are given only Puyos of a certain colour to work with.
The game has also an edit mode, where you can make your own puzzles given all the options described above.

Nazo Puyo toma el "modo de misión" que se encuentra en muchos juegos de Puyo Puyo y lo divide en un juego propio. Mientras que el juego habitual de Puyo Puyo se centra en vencer a un oponente mediante una técnica de juego más hábil.

Nazo Puyo sur Game Gear est un puzzle-game dans lequel vous devez disposer des blocs de petits haricots colorés de manière à réaliser des regroupements de couleur qui vous rapporteront des points. Le jeu suit les lois de la pesanteur dans le sens où lorsqu'un haricot n'est plus soutenu, il tombe, ce qui permet de réaliser des enchaînements qui prennent tout leur sens en multijoueurs.

locale.title: Nazo Puyo 2
locale.synopsis:
Nazo Puyo 2 continues where the original left off. We have here 200 new puzzles to solve, compared to the 100 of the predecessor. Each puzzle is played Puyo Puyo-style, but with a certain goal to complete using a preset set of puyos, e.g. "destroy all puyos", "eliminate 9 puyos at once", "make a triple combo" and so on, thereby taxing your Puyo Puyo skills and strategies.
Another new addition is a battery backup, allowing you not only to save your current position, but also to save all puzzles you may create in the edit mode.

Nazo Puyo 2 continúa donde lo dejó el original. Contiene 200 nuevos acertijos para resolver, en comparación con los 100 del predecesor. Cada puzle se juega al estilo de Puyo Puyo, pero con un objetivo determinado de completar usando un conjunto preestablecido de puyos, p. "destruir todos los puyos", "eliminar 9 puyos a la vez", "hacer un combo triple" y así sucesivamente, lo que grava las habilidades y estrategias de Puyo Puyo de los jugadores. Otra nueva adición es una batería de respaldo, que permite a los jugadores no solo guardar su posición actual, sino también guardar todos los acertijos que puedan haberse creado en el modo de edición.

Nazo Puyo 2 sur Game Gear poursuit dans la lignée de son prédécesseur. Il s'agit toujours de disposer des haricots multicolores de manière à les faire disparaître et à réaliser des enchaînements qui auront raison de votre adversaire.

locale.title: Nazo Puyo Arle no Roux
locale.synopsis:
One day, Arle (Aruru), the cute girl who is also the protagonist of the Puyo Puyo and Mado Monogatari games, decides that she shall have curry rice for dinner. She heads for the market, but all the market stalls are run by the usual crowd of baddies from Puyo Puyo. And they won't take cash! Instead, before they give her the necessary ingredients, she must solve the Puyo puzzles they have on offer.
The game starts out as a normal top-down RPG, where Arle can go from stand to stand and choose in which turn to clear the merchants' puzzles. The puzzles are played in the typical Nazo Puyo style, with a set field of existing Puyos which Arle must tackle given only a limited number of new Puyos. In order to clear a puzzle, Arle must fulfill a certain goal, such as clearing all Puyos of a certain colour, make chain reactions of a certain length, or eliminate only a certain number of Puyos (no more, no less). Luckily, she can see what Puyos are available for several drop in advance. If she fails to solve a puzzle, Arle can retry, but for each failure, she will lose health. Solving a puzzle makes her level up through the same system used in Mado Monogatari, with a ring of lights around the screen. Raising a level restores health. Will Arle ever be able to cook her curry?
The game also contains a "Toko Puyo" mode, which is the endless mode known from most regular Puyo Puyo games.

Un día, Arle, la linda chica que también es la protagonista de los juegos Puyo Puyo y Mado Monogatari, decide que ella tendrá arroz con curry para la cena. Ella se dirige al mercado, pero todos los puestos del mercado están a cargo de la multitud habitual de malvados de Puyo Puyo. ¡Y no tomarán efectivo! En cambio, antes de darle los ingredientes necesarios, debe resolver los puzzles Puyo que tienen en oferta.

Le jeu de rôle japonais Nazo Puyo : Aruru No Ruuu sur Game Gear propose au joueur d'incarner Arle, une fillette qu'il va devoir aider à retrouver les ingrédients nécessaires à l'élaboration de son dîner. Le jeu mélange RPG et puzzle-game. Arle est également la protagoniste du jeu "Puyoyo".

locale.title: NBA Action Starring David Robinson
locale.synopsis: NBA Action Starring David Robinson is a take on the Genesis version of NBA Action '94 which features the standard five-on-five formations and has an entire 82 game season or, if you want, a 26 game season instead, not including the play-off games. It also features all 27 NBA teams at the time and requires a good bit of basketball strategy and know-how. It is endorsed by and features then San Antonio Spurs superstar David Robinson.

¡LA TEMPORADA DE LA NBA JUEGA EN EL GAME GEAR! Protagonizada por David Robinson y los 27 equipos de la NBA con listas reales. Este juego es una acción de 5 en 5 NBA sin parar. Los 27 equipos de la NBA: Suns, Bulls, Spurs, Knicks, Supersonics, Rockets - ¿Quién usará la corona de la NBA? Lista Real de la NBA. ¡Todas tus estrellas favoritas están aquí! L. Johnson, Ewing, Pippen, Mullin, Malone, Kemp, Olajuwon, Webber, Mushburn, ¡y más de 300 más! Protagonizada por David Robinson. ¡Game Gear es el vecindario del Sr. Robinson! Características de la NBA: Exposición, temporada de juego 26 o 82, Playoffs y Finales de la NBA. ¡Tiros de 3 puntos, estadísticas del juego y compatibilidad de Gear-to-Gear para el tiempo de show de 2 jugadores!

NBA Action starring David Robinson sur Game Gear vous propose de jouer une saison entière en classique cinq contre cinq avec les 27 équipes de la NBA de 1994. Le jeu requiert une connaissance minimum des règles et des stratégies du basket-ball.

locale.title: NBA Jam
locale.synopsis: NBA Jam is a two-on-two basketball game You can play any NBA team, and you can play as players like Barkley, Starks, Pippen, and Grant. Each human player controls a single player, so choose your squad wisely to take team-mate skill into account. The game is action-oriented, and players can perform unrealistic slam-dunks. Full performance statistics are automatically recorded. The play clock and 3-point line apply, but other rules are largely overlooked.

¡Llega a tu Game Gear el increíble videojuego para máquinas recreativas NBA JAM! ¡Ahora puedes controlar los movimientos de las mejores estrellas de la NBA, con sus asombrosos tapones y espectaculares mates! Listas de jugadores actualizadas, incluyendo a nuevas estrellas como Hardaway, Webber, Mashburn, C. Robinson, Rider y Sprewell. Mates con auténtica suspensión: Cannonball, Tomahawk y Helicopter, entre otros.

NBA Jam sur Game Gear est le premier jeu de basket à proposer de jouer avec des joueurs professionnels mais avec les règles de la rue. Les matches se disputent donc en deux contre deux et les fautes sont presque absentes. En revanche, les actions sont volontairement irréalistes, afin de pouvoir admirer ses stars de NBA préférées réaliser des dunks de plusieurs mètres de hauteur, tout en faisant des figures spectaculaires.

locale.title: NBA Jam : Tournament Edition
locale.synopsis:
This game lets you play two-on-two arcade basketball with players from all the NBA teams. Gameplay is fast and action-packed, with few rules, no fouls, and deliberately unrealistic jamming. Players are rated on eight ability categories, from steals and blocks, to dunks and 3-pointers.
Up to four human players can take part, each always controlling a single player for their team, and AI for missing players. This allows for four players to face each other in teams of two, or for two players to team up against a third player with a CPU team-mate.
The Tournament Edition ups each team's roster to three players, and allows for substitutions between quarters. Shoving players now results in injuries, which lower a player's stats; encouraging you to sub them out and let them recover. Aside from the usual secret characters and cheat modes, the T.E. also includes four new additions you can individually enable from the special options menu:
1. "Hot Spots" are randomized zones on the court that reward extra points (up to a 9-point shot!) for making a basket while standing within them.
Powerup icons appear randomly, and convey temporary arcade-like benefits when picked up. Some examples are instant "on-fire," enhanced 3-point accuracy, monster dunks from anywhere on the court, or a bomb that knocks all other players to the ground.
"Juice Mode" increases the speed of the game up to 4x.
"Tournament Mode" disables all other modes, special characters, and cheats, and challenges you to defeat all the NBA teams to unlock extra players (2 extra players for almost every team). Winning Tournament Mode also unlocks a higher CPU difficulty level.

NBA JAM Tournament Edition te trae la emoción de unos mates sin igual.
