El juego es muy largo y contiene más de cien tipos de monstruos que puedes reclutar, al igual que Dragon Quest V.

Revelations : The Demon Slayer est un jeu de rôle sur Game Gear. Les humains dans ce soft peuvent faire appel à la puissance de Gaia. Le héros principal, El, apprend l'art de Gaia et doit sauver le monde d'un méchant maître Gaia aidé par ses amis Kishe et Uranus.

locale.title: Revenge of Drancon
locale.synopsis:
Just when things were going great with Tom-Tom and his girlfriend Tanya, some thug of a woodland king had to kidnap her and hide her away, and Tom-Tom doesn't have a clue where. That's why he has to explore deep dark forests, cross endless oceans, climb treacherous slopes, survive endless volcanoes, and even walk through clouds. But Tom-Tom will never be totally alone. You see, when he goes through the exotic locations, he has to come face to face with its inhabitants, like bees, spiders, snakes, coal-kids, frogs, bats, snails, coyotes, and octopuses, to name a few. The hatchet is Tom-Tom's only line of defense against these menaces.
There are ten areas, each containing four rounds each, but the tenth area can't be accessed unless Tom-Tom collects all the dolls during his rescue mission. During his journey, he can break open different eggs that will reveal hatchets, skateboards, mushrooms, milk, and even guardian angels. You can ride the skateboard through each round, as long as you don't collide with an inhabitant. When you complete each round while still riding the skateboard, you'll start the next round still riding it. As you progress through each round, your vitality will start to get low, but it can be increased by getting milk, mushrooms, potato chips,or fruit that appear everywhere you go. As well as the normal eggs, there are also speckled eggs that must be avoided, otherwise the God of Death will be released, and once he follows you, you'll lose vitality much quickly. At the end of every fourth round, there is a king waiting to destroy you with his fireballs or lightning bolts.
There are also warp-gates, but you don't find them, they find you. You see, warp-gates appear in rounds 1-4 of each area. If you happen to get one fruit, a special item will appear. These special items include handbags, wrist watches, a pair of shoes, a teddy bear, and a bottle of perfume. Another girl will appear and take you up to the clouds where the object is to collect as many hearts as you can without falling down or getting the item again. Once you have collected all the hearts, you can get the item to return to the surface, and more often than not, you'll get further in the round.
¡El malvado rey Drancon ha raptado a Tanya! ¡Destruye a las feroces criaturas y rescata a tu novia!

Wonder Boy sur Game Gear est un jeu de plates-formes mettant en scène Tom-Tom, un sympathique cavernicole dont la compagne Tanya a été kidnappée. Armé d'un marteau de pierre, en équilibre sur un skateboard ou aidé d'une petite fée, il va devoir traverser 9 niveaux pour récupérer sa dulcinée.
Der böse König Drancon hat Tanya gekidnappt! Vernichte die wilde Kreatur und rette das Mädchen!

Sua namorada foi sequestrada pelo malvado Rei Dracon. Salvá-la não será fácil pois o Rei Dracon não é um adversário comum.
Você terá que penetrar nas profundezas da Floresta Negra e cruzar desertos de 10 Terras diferentes. Encontre os suprimentos que lhe darão a velocidade e a força necessárias para esta jornada. Você terá que lutar contra muitos inimigos como: cobras, piranhas, morcegos, aranhas e no final contra as Bolas de Fogo do Rei Dracon.
Será que você está pronto para resgatar sua namorada e provar que o bem sempre vence o mal?

locale.title: Riddick Bowe Boxing
locale.synopsis:
Riddick Bowe Boxing is another one of the many boxing games released at the time, but with subtle differences. The HUD contains damage and energy meters along with a miniature ring up the top of the screen, useful to see the player's position in the ring so as not to get backed into a corner real easily.
Players can compete in the standard, 1-Player v. CPU, 1-Player v. 2-Player or even a career mode, where there are four preset fighters to choose from along with an option to create customers boxers. The career starts out at position #25 in the ranking and players slowly work up the ladder, going to the gym in between bouts to build up stats to eventually take on "Big Daddy" himself, Riddick Bowe.
The game is practically a copy of Evander Holyfield's Real Deal Boxing, save for the graphics style and the included fighters.

Está invicto y lleva dos cinturones de campeonato. Cada peso pesado en disputa quiere una pieza de Riddick Bowe ... ¡pero Big Daddy quiere revolcarse contigo!
¡PASA AL ANILLO ... CON EL REY PESADO!
"Únete con un amigo en el modo 2 jugadores y limpia su reloj con todo lo que tienes". "Crea tu propio boxeador, desde el color de sus guantes hasta el poder de su golpe". "Después de cada pelea, descarga en la bolsa de velocidad o ve por algunas rondas con el mega gimnasio". "Sube de rango y recibe consejos útiles del campeón en el camino".

Riddick Bowe, triple champion du monde en poids lourds, donne son nom à un jeu de boxe sur Game Gear. Vous avez le choix parmi sept boxeurs fictifs et commencez en bas de la hiérarchie. Pour gravir les échelons vous affrontez les boxeurs mieux classés. En mode versus vous pouvez choisir l'un des 25 boxeurs du jeu, y compris Riddick Bowe. Comme dans la réalité, les matches s'étalent sur douze rounds de trois minutes, à moins de vaincre par KO en diminuant la jauge de l'adversaire.

locale.title: Rise of the Robots
locale.synopsis:
You are a cyborg handyman in the far away future sent to a huge megacorporation where an evil AI has taken control of the companies robots. You are charged with facing these robots in combat and eliminating them one by one to reach the core and deactivate the AI.
Gameplay wise this is a standard beat-em-up with gorgeous graphics. It has some annoying limitations like not being able to jump over your enemy and only one fire button.

¡La revolución futurista ya está aquí! El primero de una serie de juegos de nueva generación, que combina lo mejor en programación, diseño y gráficos. Los resultados son asombrosos. ¡Prepárate para el combate de tu vida!

Rise of the Robots est un jeu de combat mettant en scène des robots sur Game Gear. Dans un monde futuriste, une intelligence artificielle a pris le contrôle d'Electrocorp, une immense entreprise de robots. Dans le mode Histoire, vous contrôlez ECO35-2, un cyborg envoyé pour éliminer les robots les uns après les autres afin d'atteindre le coeur de l'intelligence artificielle et la désactiver. Le mode deux joueurs permet de faire des combats en choisissant parmi les cinq robots du jeu.

Das ist der Zukunftsschock! Der pionier einer brandneuen Generation von Spielen, die modernste Programmierung und fortschrittlichste Grafiken mit aktuellem Design verbinden. Das Ergebnis ist schlichtweg atemberaubend. Machen Sie sich auf den Kampf Ihres Lebens gefaßt!

locale.title: Ristar
locale.synopsis:
An evil tyrant with a silly name (Greedy) has arisen to control a solar system full of sentient beings. He Corrupts the leaders of each world and thereby enslaves the populace. He has sent his minions in the disguise of planet natives into the worlds to enforce his rule...
A lush forest planet, the last planet in the tyrants agenda manages to send a call of help to the solar systems ancient hero before being over run. However Greedy even has managed to remove the great hero. Yet he did not count on the interference of the hero's sun... Ristar!
You control Ristar in his attempt to liberate the solar system. You will stretch his arms to grab enemies and summarily head-but them. Your long limbs will be used to climb various surfaces. Being a star adds even more to the unique gameplay, already chock-full of action and puzzles.

El malvado Rey de Despair gobierna la constelación de Valjee bajo un dominio de terror, provocando la miseria y la oscuridad. Pero desde lo más profundo del espacio llega Ristar, una estrella fugaz destinada para la grandeza. Solamente con sus poderes especiales y sus brazos elásticos puede restaurar la felicidad a través de los 6 niveles.

Vous contrôlez Ristar dans ce jeu d'action sur Game Gear, à la jouabilité unique. Servez-vous de vos bras élastiques pour éliminer vos ennemis et grimper où bon vous semble dans le but d'anéantir un tyran qui a pris le contrôle d'un système de planètes.

Der gefährliche König Despair hält das blühende Reich Valjee unter einer Schreckensherrschaft voller Terror, Not und tiefster Finsternis. Aber aus der Tiefe des Weltalls erscheint Ristar, ein strahlender Held der seinesgleichen sucht und seinem großen Schicksal furchtlos ins Auge blickt. Nur die speziellen Fähigkeiten seiner elastischen Arme können in sechs aufregenden Leveln Frieden und Freiheit wiederherstellen. Ü''brigens: Ristar stammt von den original Sonic-Programmierern.

locale.title: Road Rash
locale.synopsis:
Road Rash is an aggressive motorcycle racing game where the player assumes the role of a biker who takes part in a series of illegal races across the U.S.A. Starting at the back of the pack the objective is always to finish first on a linear course, overtaking the other bikers. This is achieved by driving very well or by playing it dirty, knocking opponents of their bikes using clubs, crowbars or your bare hands. The other racers fight back in a similar fashion and there are also hazards. All the races take place on the regular road with normal traffic (in both directions) and the cops, as well as occasional oil slicks and stray cows.
By winning races you can get promoted to a stronger division and earn cash with which you can buy a better bike. Whenever you're knocked off your bike or hit something you will have to run back to your bike and lose valuable time, plus your bike will suffer some damage. When the player crashes with cops nearby, it is possible to get busted and then you have to forfeit the race.
Like the whole Road Rash lineage, the game has arcade-like gameplay with no intention to be a motorcycle simulation. While the game has a two-player mode, this is not simultaneous.

El Desafio:- "La competencia por su vida" - No existen reglamentos, Ni velocidad limite, Tampoco existe regresso! Mire con atencion las carreteras bloqueades, grasientas y a los policias! Alcanze velociadades minimas de 240 km/h mientras golpea, empuja y apporrea a su openente antes de que el llege de primero! La adrenalina esta subiendo...y El esta esperando por Usted...!

Road Rash sur Game Gear est un jeu de motos qui sort des sentiers battus. Vous disputez des courses sur le continent américain, le plus souvent sur route, où vous avez la possibilité d'infliger les pires crasses à vos opposants. Les victoires vous rapporteront de l'argent qui vous permettra de vous payer une moto plus puissante.

Das Ziel:- Renn für dein Leben?hier gibt es keine Regeln, keine Geschwindigkeitsbegrenzungen, und kein Zurück! Pass mal auf für Straßensperren, ölfüzen, und auch auf die Grünen: Erreich Geschwindigkeiten von 240 km/st wärend Du den Feind schlägst, knüppelst und ihm nachtretet - bevor er Dich 'rangeht! Das Adreneline pumpt durch die Arterien, der Blutdruck steigt jetz hoch...und er warted auf Dich!

Sabes como nasceu Road Rash? Tudo começou quando dois rapazes, eternos rivais, conhecidos por Fang e Polygon, resolveram "correr" em busca da fama. Participavam nas competições oficiais, até que um resolveu sabotar o outro, sendo esta rivalidade levada ao extremo.
Apartir desse momento, surgiram os "rash" de estrada, bem diferentes das antigas competições: sem princípios e sem leis, com muitos pontapés, socos e pauladas a 150 à hora!
Tu já estás convidado a participar neste grande desafio: corre pela tua vida, não há limites de velocidade e não há regras para esta aventura sem volta! Fica atento ao óleo na pista, além de obstáculos (vacas, carros, árvores, etc.) também tens os polícias à perna.
Primeiro escolhe a tua moto. Lembra-te de que algumas têm grande potência, mas perdem na facilidade de condução. Tens oito opções ao todo! Quanto às estradas, poderás correr no Deserto de Palm (não vá derreter...), na Floresta de Redwood (cuidado com as pedras) e muito mais!
Vence o teu adversário antes que ele chegue primeiro!
A adrenalina está alta... o teu opositor espera por ti!!

locale.title: RoboCop 3
locale.synopsis: RoboCop 3 is a side-scrolling platform shooter. You get missions (such as rescuing your colleagues who are being kept hostages), which are divided into several smaller levels. The levels usually consist of several platforms, and are heavily populated by enemies who shoot at you. You can gather special repair kits, which will be used to restore your health after you've completed a level. "RoboCop 3" is more of a shooter than its predecessors, having more and tougher enemies.

El viejo Detroit. Las calles son un peligro. Sólo un hombre puede enfrentarse a tales individuos. ROBOCOP! Con la tecnologia de las armas, piel y nervios de acero acecha a sus victimas... ¡malhechores por cualquier esquina!

RoboCop 3 sur Game Gear est un jeu mêlant plates-formes et tir. Vos missions consistent pour la plupart à porter secours à des collègues ou des civils en mauvaise posture. Vous trouverez en chemin des kits de réparation qui vous permettront de récupérer l'énergie que vous auront enlevée vos nombreux assaillants.

Die Altstadt von Detroit. In den Straßen lauern dunkle Gefahren. ROBOCOP! Mit modernsten Waffen, einer Haut aus Stahl und den dazu passenden Nerven stürzt er auf sein Opfer. Kein Übel ist vor ihm sicher!

O perigo e a violência dominam as ruas da Velha Detroit....
Apenas um homem é capaz de enfrentar esta onde de criminosos - Robocop?! Com toda a tecnologia e o poder de suas armas, seu corpo de aço e seus movimentos friamente calculados, não há bandido que escape!
Três fases, 6 níveis, uma enorme variedade de armamentos e inimigos das mais diferentes espécies é o que você vai encontrar em Robocop 3.
E aí? Está pronto para encarar o desafio e salvar Detroit? Não vai ser moleza... Mas, certamente, o herói cyborg não vai decepcionar. Pelo menos esperamos que não!

locale.title: RoboCop vs Terminator
locale.synopsis:
In the future, human soldiers of John Conner's resistance force against the machines are fighting a losing war against Skynet and it's robot forces. Discovering that one of the foundation technologies for Skynet is the cybernetics technology used in the creation of Robocop. One of the resistances' soldiers, Flo is sent back in time before the Rise of the Machines to destroy Robocop and stop Skynet from being built. However Skynet learns of the time travel attempt and sends Terminators to stop Flo.
In the game you control Robocop who may move across the screen, jump, fire and exchange weapons. Robocop starts with the Auto-9 which has unlimited ammunition... other weapons may be more powerful but contain limited ammo. Beginning the game on a mission of law enforcement, you soon meet up with Flo and must engage in battle against Terminators, the forces of OCP and several obstacles

En un futuro próximo, los mundos de RoboCop y Terminator se funden en una única realidad. Tú eres Robocop y debes salvar a la Humanidad destruyendo al Súper-Ordenador Skynet en un posible futuro en el que las máquinas gobiernan la Tierra y Skynet es el Jefe Supremo.

Robocop vs Terminator sur Game Gear est un jeu d'action combinant les univers des deux long métrages éponymes. L'histoire débute lorsque les soldats de John Connor découvrent que Skynet est issu de la technologie cybernétique utilisée pour fabriquer Robocop. Incarnez ce dernier, entrez dans la résistance et venez en aide à Connor pour sauver l'humanité des machines.

In naher Zukunft werden die Welten des RoboCop und des Terminators zu einer einzigen Realität verschmelzen. Als RoboCop mußt du die Menschheit retten, indem du den Skynet-Supercomputer in einer vorstellbaren Zukunft zerstörst, in der Maschinen die Welt beherrschen und Skynet der oberste Herrscher ist.

locale.title: Ronald McDonald in Magical World
locale.synopsis:
Donald no Magical World is a Sega Game Gear platform game. It features Ronald McDonald, mascot of the McDonald's fast-food chain. The game was only released in Japan, though curiously if the player inserts the cart into a western Game Gear, it will be translated into English, revealing a unused title in the process - Ronald in the Magical World.
The game has many similarities to the Sega Mega Drive game, McDonald's Treasure Land Adventure, though the gameplay, story and level design is slightly different. Some of the music is shared between the two, however.

Cuenta con Ronald McDonald, mascota de la cadena McDonald's de comida rápida. El juego solo se lanzó en Japón, aunque curiosamente si el jugador inserta el cartucho en un Game Gear occidental, se traducirá al inglés, revelando un título no utilizado en el proceso: Ronald in the Magical World.
El juego tiene muchas similitudes con el juego Sega Mega Drive, McDonald's Treasure Land Adventure, aunque el diseño del juego, la historia y el nivel es ligeramente diferente. Sin embargo, parte de la música se comparte entre los dos.

Ronald Mc Donald et ses amis, Grimace, Birdie et Hambuglar, se baladaient sur les chemins, quand soudain... Un coffre magique apparaît ! Quel suspens, hein ? Bref, Grimace et les autres sont aspirés dans le pays magique et Ronald va devoir les retrouver au travers de 4 niveaux colorés.

game.name: Royal Stone - Hirakareshi Toki No Tobira

locale.title: Royal Stone
locale.synopsis: Royal Stone: Hirakareshi Toki no Tobira is an RPG for the Sega Game Gear.

Royale Stone es la secuela de Crystal Warriors. El juego sigue la historia de Eva, un antiguo caballero de Martalia, exiliado de su reino por traicionar la confianza de la gente y volverlo contra su propio equipo.

Royale Stone est la suite de Crystal Warriors. Le jeu suit l'histoire d'Eva, un ancien chevalier de Martalia, exilé de son royaume pour avoir trahi la confiance du peuple et vous être retourné contre votre propre équipe.

locale.title: Royal Stone : Hirakareshi Toki no Tobira
Saban's VR Troopers
locale.synopsis:
Saban's VR Troopers is based on the TV show of the same name and is made by the same company that produced the Mighty Morphin' Power Rangers. The story has the evil Grimlord transport the VR Troopers into (ironically) a video game and it is up to the player (literally) to save them and bring them back to the real world.
The gameplay is the standard fighting game, using one of the three different Troopers to kick, punch and use special abilities to defeat a fighter to advance to the next one. Each Trooper has their own strengths, weaknesses and special moves and each has their own separate stages, depending on which the player chooses. It also has multi player capabilities that lets two friends battle head-to-head in a Duel Mode.

Los populares héroes de la serie de televisión llegan a tu Game Gear a todo color para combatir a Grimlord y sus fuerzas diabólicas. Puedes elegir entre los tres personajes de la serie y en cada nivel encontrarás una fase especial de bonus, acción sin límites y una batalla final para alcanzar la victoria.

Les trois héros de la célèbre série TV débarquent sur Game Gear et n'ont aucune pitié pour leurs ennemis. Plongés dans la réalité virtuelle d'un jeu réalisé par l'ignoble Grimlord, les VR Troopers vont devoir surmonter de nombreux obstacles. Aidez nos héros à venir à bout de la multitude de sbires commandés par Grimlord et surtout à sortir de son effroyable jeu !

locale.title: Samurai Shodown
locale.synopsis: In early Japan, a man named Shiro Tokisada Amakusa preaches a heretic religion. Little does anyone know that Amakusa is really a servant of the evil Ambrosia, who took over Amakusa's body. Ambrosia wishes to shroud the world in darkness. Now, choose between 12 warriors (and 3 bonus characters) to fight for the honor of destroying Amakusa, and fulfilling a mission.

Iza To! En Garde! ¡Tipo! Doce de los más poderosos samuráis, ninjas, caballeros y guerreros de Japón, Francia, Estados Unidos y China encierran espadas en SAMURAI SHODOWN. Con espadas, nudillos desnudos, furia y varios Métodos de Caos, lucha para llegar a la batalla final con el Shogun de Satanás. ¡Usa todos los poderes a tu disposición para obtener una cabeza!

Samurai Shodown sur Game Gear est un jeu de combat se déroulant au XVIIIème siècle au Japon. Le titre intègre des modifications par rapport aux classiques du genre telles que l'utilisation d'armes blanches, un système de zoom ainsi qu'une jauge POW se remplissant au fil du combat et débloquant des attaques puissantes.

locale.title: Scratch Golf
locale.synopsis:
Scratch Golf is an overhead golfing sim that the player can play on two different golf courses either against three computer opponents in a game of scratch golf or practice on any course by themselves. Two-players can also play via link up against each other in head-to-head or team up and go up against a computer duo.
Like many other golf games the player uses a power and accuracy bar that is brought up after pressing a certain button and pressing it again to confirm the position.

Es el hoyo 18, y necesitas un par para vencer al resto. Su par 4, 350 yardas, dogleg derecho. Hay agua a la izquierda y trampas de arena que rodean el green. El viento está detrás de ti, y debes cortar la pelota exactamente. Estás relajado mientras caminas hasta el tee, y tu concentración es del 100%. Recuéstate lentamente, desciende al punto óptimo, y mientras sigues hasta el final, ves que la pelota vuela justo donde se suponía que debía ir. Qué agujero será.
¡Scratch Golf, una experiencia increíble!
Scratch Golf est un jeu de golf (comme son nom l'indique) vous incitant à jouer Scratch (Se dit d'un joueur jouant habituellement un parcours dans le Par) Bon courage.

locale.title: Sd Gundam Winner's History
locale.synopsis: SD Gundam Winner's History is a Sega Game Gear game based on the Gundam series.

El jugador controla un pequeño ejército de robots y lucha contra el ejército enemigo. Las batallas tienen lugar en varios ambientes: espacio, atmósfera o superficie del planeta. El jugador debe ocupar puntos y fábricas específicos. Estos producen nuevos trabajos y naves espaciales más grandes. La batalla entre robots es un duelo 1 vs 1, el robot puede operar automáticamente o controlarse manualmente. Las naves espaciales más grandes pueden bombardear al enemigo desde un lugar seguro.
El juego tiene una campaña, el jugador puede jugar en un solo mapa y contra otro jugador.
Adaptation en jeu vidéo de la série basée sur l'anime Mobile Suit Gundam et notamment Super Deformed Gundam.

locale.title: Sega Game Pack 4 in 1
locale.synopsis:
Sega 4 in 1 Game Pack is a collection of minigames, which include:
1. Flash Columns: based on the same game mode of Columns. The player has to connect four pieces to lower reach the flashing gems, and then clear them.
2. Penalty Shootout: football penalty shootout game where the player selects swerve and height of the ball and kicking position, attempting to cheat the goalkeeper and score five penalties, and then save penalties kicked by the computer
3. Tennis: simple tennis game where the player faces one computer opponent, using both Game Gear keys, 1 to make a shot and 2 to lob the ball. Instead of forcing the player to adapt to top and down court, the human player is always in the bottom position.
4. Rally: checkpoint arcade-style racer with five different areas.

Se incluyen cuatro juegos sin título: un clon Columns, en el que el jugador apunta a grupos de cuatro piezas en lugar de líneas de tres, un sencillo juego de lanzamiento de penaltis, un juego de rally básico y un simple juego de tenis.

Sega Game Pack 4 in 1 est une compilation de 4 mini-jeux. Vous avez le choix entre le puzzle-game Flash Columns, un jeu de football centré sur le shootout qui consiste en un simple duel joueur/gardien, un jeu de tennis et un jeu de courses de voitures.

locale.title: Sensible Soccer : European Champions
locale.synopsis:
With the original Sensible Soccer having sold hugely, this updated version was released some months later (and then used as the basis for the later console versions). The teams are updated, with the sides present in the 92-93 European tournaments included, and the player names updated to take transfers into account.
The game was tidied up and changed in a number of areas. The most significant change is the addition of red and yellow cards for discipline (2 yellow card offenses or one professional foul (denying your opponent a clear goal-scoring opportunity) results in that player being sent off). The goalkeepers have been improved in skill, and the 1994 World Cup Qualifying tournament was added.

Póngase al mando de su selección nacional o club europeo preferido y participe en las diversas competiciones de copa y liga. Con todo el ambiente del fútbol europeo del más alto nivel, usted (con sus amistades) puede llevar a un equipo de 15 jugadores al podio de la victoria. ¡El juego de fútbol sin igual!

La mouture European Champions de Sensible Soccer sur Game Gear inclut les noms des joueurs présents en clubs européens lors de la saison 92/93. Vous pouvez aussi participer aux qualifications pour la Coupe du Monde 94. L'un des arguments majeurs du jeu à l'époque était la prise en compte des cartons.

Sie führen Ihren Club oder Ihre Nationalmannschaft durch die verschiedensten Pokal-und Ligawettbewerbe. Dabei haben Sie die Wahl zwischen Clubs und Nationalteams aus ganz Europa. Erringen Sie (und Ihre Freunde) mit 15 erstklassigen Spielern Pokal und Ehren! Nur in diesem Spiel atmen Sie die Atmosphäre des europäischen Spitzenfußballs!

locale.title: Shanghai II
locale.synopsis: Shanghai II, not to be confused with Shanghai II: Dragon's Eye on the Sega Mega Drive, is a Sega Game Gear game. They are both sequels to Shanghai.

Shanghai II es una variante del juego de rompecabezas también conocido como solitario mahjong. 144 fichas de mahjong están dispuestas en filas y apiladas unas sobre otras en varios patrones; el objetivo del jugador es eliminar pares de fichas iguales que no tengan fichas adyacentes desde ambos lados hasta que todo el tablero esté despejado. Esta variante presenta seis patrones con nombres de animales: tigre, escorpión, mono, serpiente, pantera y dragón. El jugador puede elegir mostrar sugerencias o invertir cualquier cantidad de movimientos. Un modo con un límite de tiempo está disponible también.
Shangai II est un énième jeu de Majhong dont le but est de faire des paires à l'aide des différentes pièces disposées aléatoirement par la Game Gear.

locale.title: Shaq Fu
locale.synopsis: Shaq brings his awesome skill and size to a multiworld fighting game! As Shaq, use your lightning-fast shuriken and other martial art techniques to prevail over a bunch of intensely evil warriors in the enforcement of justice. Summon Voodoo's bone-shattering earthquake, rebound with Rajah's shockwave sword or lash out with Sett's terrifying mummy wrap! Scores of secret power moves to discover and master!

Como Shaq, utiliza tu shuriken rápido de iluminación y otras técnicas de artes marciales para imponer más de 5 guerreros intensamente malvados en la aplicación de la justicia. O elige cualquiera de los 6 guerreros y lucha cabeza a cabeza.
ANIMACIÓN IMPRESIONANTE DE LOS DISEÑADORES DE FLASHBACK DESTRUYA A SU OPONENTE CON MOVIMIENTOS DE PODER SECRETO MODALIDADES DE TORNEOS, DUELOS Y HISTORIAS

Shaq Fu est un jeu de combat ayant Shaquille O'Neal, l'un des plus grands basketteurs de tous les temps, comme personnage principal. Alors que Shaq se déplace pour un match de charité, il est aspiré dans une autre dimension où un vieil homme lui demande de sauver son petit-fils. Il devra alors affronter onze créatures pour y parvenir.

locale.title: Shikinjoh
locale.synopsis: Shikinjoh or Shi Kin Joh or Shi-Kin-Joh or Shikinjou (or likewise) is a 1989/1990 puzzle game by Scap Trust for the NEC PC-88 and NEC PC-98. Sunsoft ported it to the Sega Mega Drive and Sega Game Gear in 1991, with the Mega Drive version having added Sega Mega Modem capabilities. No version has left Japan. A version was later included with Sunsoft's Game no Tetsujin The Shanghai for the Sega Saturn.

Shikinjoh o Shi Kin Joh o Shi-Kin-Joh o Shikinjou (o similar) es un juego de rompecabezas 1989/1990 de Scap Trust para NEC PC-88 y NEC PC-98. Sunsoft lo transfirió a Sega Mega Drive y Sega Game Gear en 1991, con la versión Mega Drive incorporando las capacidades de Sega Mega Modem. Ninguna versión ha salido de Japón. Una versión más tarde se incluyó con el Juego no Tetsujin The Shanghai de Sunsoft para el Sega Saturn.

Shikinjou un titre développé sur de nombreuses machines comme la Famicom, la Gameboy, la Megadrive ou encore la Game Gear. Cette fois, le gameplay s'approche du grand classique Soukoban : on dirige en effet un petit personnage vu de dessus qui doit pousser des pièces de mahjong (il ne peut pas les tirer) pour les associer deux par deux, ce qui a pour effet de les faire disparaître et de lui ouvrir un chemin vers la porte de sortie vers le niveau suivant. Il s'agit d'un très bon passe-temps.

game.name: Shining Force Gaiden - Ensei Jashin No Kuni E

locale.title: Shining Force Gaiden: Ensei Jashin no Kuni e
locale.synopsis:
The first of the three Shining Force games for GameGear, this is a Japanese-only gaiden (side-story) to the main series. The events take place in a time period between the first and the second Shining Force games (twenty years after the events of the first game), in a kingdom called Cypress. The ambassador of Cypress kidnaps Anri, the princess of Gardiana, casting a spell on her that envelops her in dark fog. You control Nick, a young prince who decides to help the princess, aided by the warrior team of the first Shining Force.
The game is a strategy RPG with a typical Shining Force-style combat: the largest part of the game is spent fighting enemy forces. You move your party (up to twelve characters) around, attacking or casting spells. Once in contact with the enemy, a short automatic battle sequence occurs. You gain experience points for every attack. Unlike other Shining Force games, you cannot visit towns in this game.

El jugador controla a Nick, un visitante que va a Guardiana, que es elegido para ser el nuevo líder del ?equipo de la luz? de Guardiana. El grupo emprenderá el viaje rumbo al reino de Cypress para rescatar a los soldados cautivos y encontrar una manera de curar a la Reina Anri, quien se encuentra dormida bajo un hechizo lanzado por el embajador de Cypress, Woldol.
Los eventos toman lugar 20 años después del segundo juego de la serie Shining, y es el predecesor directo del cuarto título de la serie, el Shining Force: The Sword of Hajya (?Shining Force Gaiden II?).

Premier volet de la trilogie Shining Force sur Game Gear, Shining Force Gaiden est un jeu de rôle stratégique. La majeure partie du titre est consacrée aux combats. Vous déplacez votre petite communauté sur la carte, le combat survient lorsque vous êtes en contact avec l'ennemi. Chaque confrontation rapporte des points d'expérience, à condition d'en sortir vivant, bien évidemment.

locale.title: Shining Force Gaiden : Ensei, Jashin no Kuni e
Shining Force Gaiden: Final Conflict
locale.synopsis:
One of the three gaiden (side-story) Shining Force games for GameGear. The events of the game take place in a time period between the first and the second mainstream Shining Force games. After Max, the leader of the first Shining Force, defeated the Dark Dragon, peace was restored to the world. However, the sorceress Mishaela took control over the forces of evil. Pursuing her, Max' comrades got injured and were forced to quit. Upon returning back to their hometown, they found out Mishaela has already taken the Elder hostage. Lead by the young warrior Ian, the Force has to find Max and to defeat Mishaela.
The game is a strategy RPG with gameplay similar to other Shining Force games. You control a large party of warriors (you can choose the characters yourself from many available). The game consists mainly of large strategic turn-based battles, in which you navigate your characters around and attack the enemies physically, or cast area-based spells.

Max, el líder de la Shining Force emprende la búsqueda de Mishaela (sirviente del villano presumiblemente muerto Darksol, del mismo juego). Uno de los compañeros de Max, el robot Adam, sale seriamente herido de una de las batallas con Mishaela. La tropa de Max se detiene para ayudar al robot, y solo Max y su compañero Ridion siguen la búsqueda. Desafortunadamente, Max y Ridion nunca regresan. Liderados por un hombre llamado Ian, los ex compañeros de Max emprenderán su búsuqeda, econtrando a su paso situaciones inesperadas...
Tercero de la saga Shining Force GAiden y resulta ser la secuela de Shining Force ("The Legacy of Great Intention") y la precuela de Shining Force II ("Ancient Sealing").

Shining Force Gaiden : Final Conflict se situe chronologiquement entre le premier et le deuxième épisode de le série sortis sur Game Gear. Il s'agit toujours d'un jeu de rôle stratégique où les combats ont la part belle. Vette fois, vous et votre petite communauté devez combattre la sorcière Mishaela, qui a pris le contrôle des forces du Mal.

game.name: Shining Force - The Sword Of Hajya

locale.title: Shining Force II : The Sword of Hajya
locale.synopsis:
This is not a sequel to the game Shining Force: The Legacy of Great Intention for Genesis, but a sequel to a Shining Force Gaiden, which was released only in Japan.
After a prolonged war, the kingdoms of Cypress and Gardiana decided to join forces fighting the evil empire of Iom. Nick, the Prince of Cypress, that was conquered by Iom, had his hand turned into stone during the last battle, and therefore cannot wield his legendary Sword of Hajya. Nevertheless, he tries to recruit people who would help him to gain his kingdom back.
The game is a strategy RPG. You command a large party composed of several units, and most of the game is spent in battles. The turn-based battles occupy the entire location; during your turn, you command your troops to move around and to attack. Your main heroes gain levels in a RPG fashion.

La historia gira entorno a Deanna y sus compañeros, los jóvenes soldados de la armada de Cypress. Nick, el Príncipe de Cypress, dejó el castillo con la orden de derrotar a Iom, una nación malvada. Sin embargo, se marcha sin la poderosa Espada de Hajya debido a no poder usarla, ya que su brazo se convirtió en piedra. Deanna y sus amigos deberán defender su castillo y la Espada, con la ayuda de Mayfair, amigo del Príncipe Nick. Cuando las fuerzas de Iom atacan y roban la espada, será Mayfair el que dirija a los jóvenes soldados para perseguir a los ladrones y recuperar la espada.
Shining Force: The Sword of Hajya (Gaiden II) es la continuación directa de la historia Shining Force Gaiden, y toma lugar solo dos meses después.

Dans Shining Force II : Sword Of Hajya, les royaumes de Cypress et Gardiana ont uni leurs forces pour combattre le maléfique Empire Iom. Le héros, Nick, a vu sa main changée en pierre au cours de sa dernière bataille et ne peut pas décemment brandir sa légendaire Sword of Hajya. Vous devez l'aider à reconquérir son royaume à l'aide d'une équipe de braves combattants dans ce jeu de rôle sur Game Gear.

locale.title: Shining Force Gaiden II : Jashin no Kakusei
Shinobi
locale.synopsis:
As with the original games, Shinobi for the GG (the first portable member of the franchise) is a action side-scroller in which you take the role of an elemental ninja seeking revenge, your task to clear several stages filled with evil ninja and other assorted enemies.
New to this release is the MegaMan-like ability to select which stage (all also unique for this release) to play in any sequence. Each stage contains a fellow elemental ninja held prisoner, who gets released once you complete the level. You can then switch between available ninja mid-stage to take advantage of their unique abilities (green ninja double jumps, blue ninja has a grappling hook, yellow ninja walks on water, etc.) which become a necessity to successfully complete all the levels.
Tú como Joe Musashi deberás usar tus habilidades especiales en el arte del Ninjutsu para liberar a tus camaradas shinobis y destruir la ciudad del miedo.

Shinobi premier du nom sur Game Gear est un jeu d'action où vous incarnez un ninja en quête de vengeance. Vous devrez libérer d'autres camarades ninjas, qui deviendront ensuite jouables. Il vous faudra alors vous servir des spécificités propres à chacun, et choisir lequel sera le plus apte à compléter le niveau.
In dieser Aktionsgechichte, mußt Du. Joe Musashi Dein besonderes Können in der Kunst des Ninjutsu einsetzen, um Deine Kameraden und die Stadt der Angst zu befreien!

Neste emocionante jogo de Artes Marciais, você terá que ajudar Joe Musashi, O SHINOBI VERMELHO, o mais velho dos Ninjas, considerado também o mais poderoso e sábio de todos e detentor de todos os poderes da Arte Marcial de Ninjutsu a salvar seus quatro compnheiros - os SHINOBIS, AZUL, VERDE, ROSA e AMARELO - que foram capturados pelos Guerreiros da Sombra. Joe Musashi terá que passar por quatro lugares diferentes: uma AUTOPISTA, um VALE, um PORTO e uma FLORESTA, destruindo todos os inimigos que encontrar pela frete para salvar seus companheiros e destruir finalmente a CIDADE DO MEDO, reduto dos Guerreiros da Sombra.

locale.title: Shinobi II : The Silent Fury
locale.synopsis: The second Shinobi game for the Game Gear, its a 2D side-scrolling platform game with basic strategy elements. You have to rescue the four elemental ninjas and their corresponding crystal. When you rescue a ninja they join up with you and you can switch to them. Each ninja has a different power and ability which must be used in order to progress through the game. The first four levels can be played in whichever order you want, when both the ninja and crystal have been recovered from all the levels the final level is unlocked.
La Ninja Negra tiene controlada la Neo- Ciudad y ha encarcelado a las Ninjas Elementales - ¡Joe Musashi es su única esperanza de supervivencia!

Shinobi II : The Silent Fury est le second volet des aventures du célèbre ninja sur Game Gear. Il s'agit d'un jeu de plates-formes en 2D. Votre objectif est de secourir les quatre ninjas, et de retrouver leurs cristaux respectifs. Vous aurez la possibilité d'incarner les ninjas libérés, dont les techniques diffèrent quelque peu.
Der Schwarze Ninja hat die Kontrolle über Neo-City und die Elemental Ninjas gefangengenommen. Ihre einzige Hoffnung ist Joe Musashi!

Neo City está novamente em perigo. O poderoso Ninja Negro e seus perversos Tecno-Guerreiros roubaram os quatro Cristais Elementares, responsáveis pelo controle dos elementos Terra, Ar, Água e Fogo. Com eles nas mãos, o Ninja Negro poderá facilmente dominar a Cidade. Para recuperar os Cristais e derrotar os maleficos inimigos, somente um homem altamente treinado, um verdadeiro mestre nas artes marciais: Joe Musashi, o Ninja Vermelho. Junte-se a ele nas cinco emocionantes fases deste jogo, e salve o povo de Neo City da destrução.

locale.title: Side Pocket
locale.synopsis:
The main objective is to cross different USA cities and reach the predetermined scores to go ahead. But remember: you'll have only 16 balls and every error can be lethal!
The game also comes with modes for 2 players with two variants: 2P Pocket Game (the traditional mode) and 2P 9-Ball Game, where the premise is to sink 9 balls before the other player makes them first. If you prefer, test your target in Trick Game or even hear your favorite song in Jukebox.
After each stage completed (and some luck), a bonus stage will appear, as well as the chance to earn extra balls. You will only need a good target in the parquet block!

Marca tu taco y acumula esas bolas. ¡Ahora prepárate, prepárate, rompe! Las bolas se dispersan y el partido está en ... ¡Son las finales del torneo Data East Pool y estás detrás del 8-ball! Tomará una mano firme y un ojo agudo para abrirse camino hasta la cima. Desafía a tus oponentes al último juego de habilidad, pero debes mantenerte fresco ... ¡Es una jungla de fieltro verde por ahí!

Side Pocket sur Game Gear est une simulation de billard/snooker. Vous parcourez les Etats-Unis à travers des défis et tournois. Le jeu offre la possibilité d'affronter un ami en connectant deux Game Gear, et ce en jeu traditionnel, ou bien en défi "9-Ball Game", qui consiste à être le premier à empocher 9 billes.

locale.title: Slam Dunk
locale.synopsis: Slam Dunk is a Sports game, developed by Sims and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 1994.
Juega con tus personajes favoritos del anime, Slam Dunk, 5vs5 en la cancha y disfruta venciendo a todos tus rivales en tu Game Gear.
Slam Dunk est un jeu de basket japonais tiré de la série animée éponyme.

locale.title: From TV Animation : Slam Dunk, Shouri e no Starting 5
Slider
locale.synopsis: You play a hairy yellow guy that kind of looks like a pineapple; it's your job to go through the level painting all of the tiles. Unfortunately it's not as easy as just walking around and using your pink paint, because you are constantly having to avoid various enemies (dog-like characters, Pinocchio heads, KKK hoods, etc.) if you want to complete the level.
Como Slider, tú deberás detener el envenenamiento de Rozen, tu tierra natal, propiciado por los diabólicos Señores de la Escoria.

Slider sur Game Gear (ou Skweek sur les autres supports) est un jeu d'action/réflexion où vous incarnez Skweek, boule rose qui vit paisiblement parmi son peuple. Mais Pitark arrive et pollue votre planète. Armé d'un laser, vous partez sur les 99 continents rétablir l'ordre et redonner à votre planète sa couleur d'origine.
Als Slider mußt Du die Vergiftung Deiner Heimat Rozen durch die teuflischen Herren des Abschaums verhindern.

locale.title: Solitaire FunPak
locale.synopsis: Solitaire FunPak is handheld solitaire game. There are 12 different forms of solitaire to play (Klondike, Tripeaks, Pyramid, Cruel, Freecell, Golf, Canfield, Aces Up, Scorpion, Poker, Stonewall and Florentine). It also has a tournament mode where players can go for standard games, a full championship, a custom game or a custom game with a time limit. The best scores are stored in the hall of fame.

Pruebe su suerte en Klondike, Pyramid, Free Cell, Golf, Aces Up, Poker, Florentine - 12 en total. Elija el juego que desee o seleccione el modo Torneo y pruébelos todos. En casa o en la carretera, Interplay's Solitaire te permite jugar en cualquier lugar y en cualquier momento. Juega como la cosa real (¡excepto que no puedes hacer trampa!). Si estás preparado para la tarea, ¡toma este paquete durante horas de diversión desafiante!

Solitaire Funpak est comme son titre l'indique, une simulation de jeu de solitaire qui vous permet de jouer aux douze variations du jeu (Klondike, Tripeaks, Pyramid, Cruel, Freecell, Golf, Canfield, Aces Up, Scorpion, Poker, Stonewall and Florentine). Il vous est aussi donné la possibilité de participer à des tournois et des championnats.

locale.title: Solitaire Poker
locale.synopsis: Solitaire Poker. That's certainly an odd sounding combinasion, but that's exactly what it is. It's even more interesting that you realize that there is a touch of bingo in there too. Your objective is to draw face-down cards from one of four different piles and draw these cards into five different "hands" that are scored as traditional poker values. Hower the the hands may be scored in any combinasion... vertical, horizonal or diagonal on the game board... (where the bingo element comes into play).
¡Ponga sus manos en el juego de póker de vídeo más excitante! ¡Incluso los veteranos experimentados encontrarán Póker Solitario un reto bienveinido!

Solitaire Poker sur Game Gear est un jeu de réflexion. Vous disposez des cartes de poker sur une grille dotée de vingt cinq emplacements. Le but du jeu est d'atteindre le score nécessaire pour passer au prochain niveau en réalisant des combinaisons verticalement, horizontalement, ainsi que dans les deux grandes diagonales. Parviendrez-vous à placer une quinte flush royale ?

locale.title: Sonic Blast
locale.synopsis: Sonic Blast was released for Game Gear in conjunction with Sonic 3D Blast (aka Sonic 3D: Flickies' Island) for Genesis/MD and Saturn. It boasted similarly rendered character sprites and colorful backgrounds. The game was yet another addition to the series, plus Sega had hoped it would be a boost to the dying Game Gear's title selection at the time. Brazilian based TecToy re-released the game for Sega Master System in 1997, a year after the initial release (while many may think this is a pirated title, TecToy is indeed licensed to produce and release games under the Sega name).

¡Ha vuelto Sonic y está mejor que nunca! Sonic Blast ofrece los mejores gráficos y la jugabilidad más rápida que se haya visto hasta ahora en Game Gear. Puedes tomar el papel de Sonic o el poderoso Knuckles, cada uno con sus propios poderes especiales, mientras persigues al malvado Dr. Robotnik a través de 15 alucinantes fases que también incluyen múltiples áreas de bonus.

Sonic Blast sorti sur Game Gear est le dernier épisode des aventures de la mascotte Sega sur sa console portable. Vous pouvez y jouer Sonic, et Knuckles, qui a la capacité de planer et d'escalader les parois, donnant un nouveau souffle au jeu.

A Master Emerald fragmentou-se em cinco Chaos Emeralds. Robotnik percebe a chance de dominar o mundo e monta mais uma vez seu Death Egg. Sonic e Knuckles decidem que para parar os planos de Robotnik tudo o que lhes restam a fazer é causar sérios prejuízos às perigosas invenções do Dr. Robotnik e coletar todas as esmeraldas a tempo.

locale.title: Sonic Chaos
locale.synopsis: Join Sonic & Tails in another adventure to defeat the evil Dr. Robotnik. It's a robot smashing, tail burning good time. Oh and BTW this gamegear game is the japanese version, the equivalent English version is Sonic the Hedgehog Chaos
¡Vuele a través de nuevas y fantásticas zonas con Tails the Fox, o únase a Sonic en una búsqueda veloz de las Esmeraldas del Caos perdidas!

Sonic Chaos vous permet pour la première fois sur Game Gear, d'incarner soit Tails, le renard à deux queues, soit le hérisson supersonique. La possibilité de voler ajoute une nouvelle dimension d'exploration à ce classique parmi les classiques du jeu de plates-formes.
Fliegen Sie mit "Tails", dem Fuchs, durch phantastische, unbekannte Zonen, oder unterstützen Sie Sonic the Hedgehog bei seiner hektischen Suche nach den gestohlenen Chaos Edelsteinen!

Atenção! Aí vem Sonic em alta velocidade, diretamente da sua última aventura supersônica para mais uma emocionante batalha... Tudo estava tranqüilo desde o último aparecimento do Dr. Robotnik. As seis Chaos Emeralds foram recuperadas e escondidas em um lugar seguro. O único barulho que se ouvia era de Sonic e Tails, quando eles rompiam a barreira do som praticando suas corridas.nnAté que um dia, como já era de costume, tudo mudou. Explosões e estranhas formações geográficas anunciaram que as esmeraldas haviam desaparecido de seu esconderijo. Sonic e Tails já foram atrás do responsável por esta confusão. Será que você consegue adivinhar quem é? Acertou! O Dr. Robotnik, é claro! Desta vez você poderá ter tanto Sonic quanto Tails como parceiro. Escolha um dos dois e prepare-se. Se vocês não conseguirem deter o Dr. Robotnik a tempo, ele vai construir uma super bomba capaz de destruir todo o planeta. E não tenham dúvidas... ele é louco o suficiente para isso!

locale.title: Sonic Drift
locale.synopsis: Sonic Drift is a Sonic the Hedgehog racing game. The evil Dr. Robotnik has stolen the chaos emeralds and you have to win them back in a racing tournament. In Sonic Drift, you can play as Sonic, Tails, Amy, or Robotnik. Sonic Drift can also be found on Sonic Adventure DX and Sega Mega Collection Plus. There are six levels in each game and three different tournaments, totaling 18 levels.

Sonic Drift es un juego de carreras de Sonic the Hedgehog. El malvado Dr. Robotnik ha robado las esmeraldas del caos y tienes que volver a ganarlas en un torneo de carreras. En Sonic Drift, puedes jugar como Sonic, Tails, Amy o Robotnik.
Sonic Drift también se puede encontrar en Sonic Adventure DX y Sega Mega Collection Plus. Hay seis niveles en cada juego y tres torneos diferentes, que suman 18 niveles.

Sonic Drift sur Game Gear met en scène Sonic, Tails, Amy et Robotnik dans des courses de voitures. Vous avez le choix entre six circuits, issus des environements du jeu de plates-formes, chacun avec trois niveaux de difficulté.

Sonic Drift é um jogo de corrida do Sonic the Hedgehog. O malvado Dr. Robotnik roubou as Chaos Emeralds e você terá que ganhá-las de volta em um torneio de corrida. Em Sonic Drift, você pode jogar como Sonic, Tails, Amy ou Robotnik. Há seis pistas em cada jogo e três torneios diferentes, totalizando 18 pistas.

locale.title: Sonic Drift 2
locale.synopsis:
Sonic Drift 2 is the sequel to Sonic Drift, also on the Game Gear and the first in the series to be released outside Japan. One of the new things in the sequel is a lag boost system, which means that anyone who is behind gets a boost to catch up again. This keeps the action in the game. Another new thing is that the gadgets touched while racing do not come into effect immediately. They need to be triggered manually by pressing up on the D-pad.
There are 3 GPs to compete in and each GP has 6 tracks. The names of the GPs are:
1. Purple Chaos GP 2. White Chaos GP 3. Blue Chaos GP
Racing skills can be improved in the Free Run mode on any of the tracks, or, with a Gear-to-Gear cable and a spare copy of the game, direct competition against another human player in the versus mode.

Arranca los motores y prepárate para la carrera de tu vida. Elige entre 7 de tus personajes favoritos incluyendo Sonic, Knuckles y Robotnik, cada uno con su propio poder especial. Conecta el cable Gear to Gear y juega contra un amigo a través de 17 pistas en el último Chaos Grand Prix.
Sonic Drift 2 sur Game Gear met en scène Sonic, Tails, Amy et Robotnik dans des courses de voitures. Vous avez maintenant un nouveau système de boss qui permet au dernier de rester dans la course !

Lassen Sie Ihren Motor an und machen Sie sich zum rennen Ihres Lebens bereit! Sie haben die Auswahl aus 7 Ihrer Lieblingsfiguren, darunter Sonic, Knuckles und Robotnik, von denen jede einzelne über ganz besondere Kräfte verfügt. Stöpseln Sie Ihren "Gear to Gear connector"* ein und nehmen Sie einen Freund mit auf die Fahrt - es geht dabei über 17 Rennbahmen im größten Chaos Grand Prix!

Sonic Drift 2 é a sequência de Sonic Drift, também no Game Gear e o primeiro da série a ser lançado fora do Japão. Uma das coisas novas na sequela é que os itens pegos durante a corrida não ativam imediatamente. Eles precisam ser acionados manualmente apertando o direcional.nnnnHá 3 GPs para competir e cada GP tem 6 pistas. Os nomes dos GPs são:nnPurple Chaos GPnnWhite Chaos GPnnBlue Chaos GPnnnnAs habilidades de corrida podem ser melhoradas no modo Free Run em qualquer uma das pistas, ou com um Cabo de Jogo Múltiplo e uma outra cópia do jogo para competir diretamente contra outro jogador no modo versus.

locale.title: Sonic Labyrinth
locale.synopsis:
One day, Sonic woke up from a nap to find that his classic red sneakers have been replaced with Dr. Eggman's new invention, Speed Down Boots. Curses! In order to remove them, Sonic must go through Eggman's great labyrinth and retrieve the Chaos Emeralds.
Like the later Sonic 3D Blast, this game uses a 3/4 isometric view. Make your way across four main zones, each divided into four stages. In order to complete a stage, you must find the three keys and open the exit before time runs out.
But watch out! Enemies want to hinder your progress. Knock them out with your Spin Dash. And be on the look out for obstacles like bumpers, flippers, teleporters, spikes, and conveyor belts. Collect power-ups to increase your chances of success.

El Dr. Robotnik ha creado un mundo de laberintos en 3D, donde he arrojado a Sonic introduciéndole en una nueva dimensión. Ahora nuestro amigo puede rodar rápidamente en cualquier dirección - recogiendo llaves para acceder niveles ocultos y zonas de bonus a las que nunca antes había podido llegar. ¡Ayuda a Sonic a atravesar el laberinto para acabar con el nuevo clan de malvados Jefes y vencer al detestable Doctor!

Dans Sonic Labyrinth sur Game Gear vous devez aider le hérisson bleu à retrouver ses chaussures rouges et blanches que Robotnik lui a subtilisées. Votre seule arme sera de pouvoir vous mettre en boule afin d'éliminer vos ennemis et de retrouver 3 clefs par niveau permettant de passer au prochain.

Dr. Robotnik hat eine Welt aus 3D-Labyrinthen geschaffen und den armen Sonic hineingeworfen. Jetzt bekommen seine Reisen eine ganz neue Dimension! Ab sofort kann unser blauer Wirbelwind schneller als je zuvor in alle Richtungen sausen und Schlüssel zu Bonusräumen und verstecken Abschnitten finden. Helfen Sie Sonic, den Weg durch die verwirrenden Gänge zu finden und seinen Stachelskalp vor den brandneuen, megafiesen Endgegnern rund um Robotnik zu rerten!

Um dia, Sonic acordou de uma soneca para descobrir que seus clássicos tênis vermelhos foram substituídos pela nova invenção do Dr. Robotnik, Speed Down Boots. Maldição! Para removê-los, Sonic deve passar pelo grande labirinto do Robotnik e recuperar as Chaos Emeralds.nnnnComo o posterior Sonic 3D Blast, este jogo usa uma visão isométrica 3/4. Ande através de quatro zonas principais, cada uma dividida em quatro fases. Para completar uma fase, você deve encontrar três chaves e abrir a saída antes que o tempo se esgote.nnnnMas cuidado! Inimigos querem impedir seu progresso. Derrote-os com seu Spin Dash. E fique de olho nos obstáculos como bumpers, flippers, teletransportadores, espinhos, e esteiras. Colete power-ups para aumentar suas chances de sucesso.

locale.title: Sonic Spinball
locale.synopsis:
The evil doctor Robotnik has a new plan to take over the world. He has built a new weapon, the Veg-O-Fortress on Mount Mobius and with it, he is transforming all creatures into robots. Sonic sneaks into the fortress and tries to stop Robotnik.
Use Sonic as a pinball in 4 dangerous levels. Score points, get rings, collect Chaos Emeralds and destroy the boss at the end of each level.

Desde cenagosas alcantarillas hasta la monstruosa sala de máquinas, la fortaleza más reciente del Dr. Robotnik es una gigantesca máquina de jugar con bolas. ¿Soportará ésta una invasión rotante de Sonic? Bote desde gigantescas aletas y silbantes salidas de vapor. Acelere a través de vertiginosas vueltas y elévese por rampas que desafían a la muerte.

Accompagné de son ami Tails, Sonic le hérisson bleu le plus rapide de la galaxie doit à nouveau affronter le Dr Robotnik dans Sonic Spinball sur Game Gear. Le quartier général ennemi est installé en haut d'un volcan, et le mécanisme qui le protège est similaire à celui d'un flipper. Mettez-vous en boule et escaladez le Mont Mobius pour libérer les animaux transformés en robots par votre pire ennemi.

Sonic the Hedgehog gira em um pandemônio de pinball! A mais recente fábrica de criação robótica do Dr. Robotnik é a Veg-O-Fortress, uma ilha vulcânica abastecida pelas Chaos Emeralds e protegida pelo Sistema de Segurança Pinball. Amarre seu Power Sneakers para todos os novos movimentos do Sonic! Sonic se lança no espaço, rebate nas alavancas e quica em um salto de alta altitude! Aventure-se através de cavernas brilhantes, gosmentas piscinas tóxicas e poços de lava fervente!

locale.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
locale.synopsis:
SEGA's mascot Sonic the Hedgehog made his debut in a famous Genesis title, but Sega's 8-bit systems got their own version of the platformer, featuring the same story and gameplay style, but different levels.
To stop the evil Dr. Robotnik, Sonic must traverse six zones consisting of three levels each. Most of the zones are based on those in the original game, but some are entirely new. Enemies (mechanized animals, defeated by Sonic's spikes when jumping or rolling) and power-ups (speed-ups, shields, extra lives) are mostly the same as well. Sonic can pick up golden rings for protection (when hit, he simply loses all of his rings instead of a life) and bonuses: 100 rings gain Sonic an extra life, and 50 remaining rings at the end of a level allow access to pinball-themed special stages full of bumpers and springs. The final level of a zone is always a boss fight against Robotnik.
Sonic should also collect the six Chaos Emeralds to keep them from falling into Robotnik's hands. In a departure from the original game, these are not hidden in the special stages but somewhere in the regular levels.
Gira por el espacio junto a Sonic, el imperturbable erizo. Da vueltas hasta quedar mareado, salva a los animales y ¡conviértete en el superhéroe!

Sonic the Hedgehog sur Game Gear est un jeu de plates-formes dont la principale caractéristique est l'incroyable vitesse de pointe de son héros, un hérisson bleu. L'histoire débute lorsque le docteur Robotnik capture les animaux de l'île et les enferme dans des robots. Le but du jeu est de libérer les animaux de l'île et de mettre à mal les plans de conquête du terrible Robotnik.

Sonic the Hedgehog macht sich in seinem ersten Abenteuer auf die Reise, um den verrückten Wissenschaftler Dr. Ivo "Eggman" Robotnik aufzuhalten, der auf South Island alle Tiere einfängt und sie in gefährliche Roboter (Badniks) verwandelt, um mit ihrer Hilfe die Chaos Emeralds zu finden und die Welt zu beherrschen, da diese sehr mächtig sind. Nun versucht der schnelle Igel seine Tierfreunde aus den Robotern und Kapseln zu holen. Doch Eggman hat was dagegen und so versucht er ihn in aufzuhalten.

O mascote da SEGA Sonic the Hedgehog fez sua estréia no Mega Drive, mas os sistemas de 8-bits da SEGA tiveram sua própria versão do jogo de plataforma, apresentando a mesma história e estilo de jogo, mas níveis diferentes.
Para impedir o maligno Dr. Robotnik, Sonic deve atravessar seis zonas que consistem em três fases cada. A maioria das zonas se baseia nas do jogo original, mas algumas são inteiramente novas. Inimigos (animais mecanizados, derrotados pelos espinhos de Sonic ao saltar ou rolar) e power-ups (speed-ups, escudos, vidas extras) são na maior parte os mesmos. Sonic pode pegar anéis dourados para se proteger (quando leva dano, ele simplesmente perde todos os seus anéis em vez de perder uma vida) e bônus: 100 anéis de garantem a Sonic uma vida extra, e 50 anéis restantes no final de uma fase permitem o acesso as fases especiais com temática de pinball cheias de rebatedores e molas. A fase final de uma zona é sempre uma luta de chefão contra Robotnik.
Sonic também deve coletar as seis Chaos Emeralds para impedi-las de cair nas mãos de Robotnik. Em contra partida ao jogo original, estas não estão escondidas nas fases especiais mas em algum lugar nas fases comuns.
Comparado a versão de Master System, o jogo ficou mais fácil.

locale.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
locale.synopsis:
Coming back from the vacation Sonic took after foiling the plans of Dr Robotnik, he finds that Tails and all his other animal friends are missing. Sonic finds a letter waiting for him, that reads:
"Dear Sonic,
Robotnik is back, and he's captured all the animals on the island! He is holding me in a place called the Crystal Egg. In order to free me, you have to find and bring the six Chaos Emeralds.
Robotnik made me write this. He says he's waiting for you, and he's created six really nasty robots in order to 'get rid of you once and for all.' I don't know what he has planned, but Sonic, please be careful!
Sincerely, Tails."
That being more that enough motivation for him, Sonic races out to defeat Robotnik again.
The master system version is totally different than the Sonic 2 for Genesis. Tails obviously doesn't accompany you, like he can in the Genesis release. Sonic can also not do his infamous buzzsaw roll by simply ducking and pressing jump.
¡El erizo más rápido del mundo ha regresado, corriendo por todas las nuevas Zonas, con más trucos, trampas y acción que antes!

Sonic the Hedgehog 2 sur Game Gear reprend la recette qui a fait le succès du précédent volet et ajoute la possibilité d'utiliser un deltaplane dans certaines phases de jeu. Collectez les anneaux pour gagner des vies supplémentaires et libérez les animaux condamnés à la robotisation.

Olha quem está de volta para uma nova e emocionante aventura... É o Sonic, o ouriço mais veloz do mundo. Desta vez, o perverso Dr. Robotnik atacou South Island, e está mantendo Tails, o melhor amigo de Sonic, como prisioneiro.nnPara resgatá-lo, além de seu poderoso Spin Attack, Sonic vai utilizar outros incríveis acessórios. Serão sete novas zonas, repletas de truques, armadilhas, inimigos mortais e principalmente muita ação. Sonic já começou sua corrida. Será que você vai conseguir alcançá-lo?

locale.title: Sonic the Hedgehog : Triple Trouble
locale.synopsis:
Dr. Robotnik has stolen all the Chaos Emeralds, yet again, but when the experiment for his new weapon goes wrong, the Emeralds get scattered across the island. While Sonic & Tails are out searching for them, Robotnik finds the yellow emerald and convinces Knuckles the Echidna that Sonic wants to steal all the other Emeralds. While all this is happening, Nack the Weasel seizes his chance to take the emeralds for himself while everyone else is pre-occupied. Now it's a 4-way race to retrieve the emeralds.
The gameplay is like the other Sonic titles, but this is only available on the Game Gear. The player can choose to play as Sonic or Tails (who can fly), and you're trying to reach the Chaos Emeralds before anyone else. A change from other Sonic games is that when hit, all rings are not lost, only a set amount (3050 depending on the level) is lost.

¡Vuelven otra vez Sonic y Tails con el triple de diversión y el triple de problemas! El Dr. Robotnik está desarrollando el última súper arma con la ayuda de Knuckles y tu lo tienes que impedir. Atraviesa la nieve y el agua montado encima del nuevo turbo monopatín de Sonic o sumérgete en el "Sea Fox" de Tails.

Dans Sonic The Hedgehog : Triple Trouble, titre exclusif à la Game Gear, la célèbre mascotte bleue de Sega doit composer avec trois adversaires en même temps, Knuckles, Eggman et Knack, tous trois à la recherche des Chaos Emeralds. La seule nouveauté par rapport aux autres épisodes Game Gear est qu'il vous reste quelques anneaux après qu'un ennemi vous ait touché.

Sonic und Tails sind zurück - mit dreifachem Spielspaß und dreifachen Problemen! Dr. Robotnik will die ultimative superwaffe bauen, doch Sie können ihn stoppen, wenn Sie die Chaos-Edelsteine zuerst aufstöbern! Surfen Sie mit Sonics neuem "Jet Skate-Board" über Wasser, Schnee und Eis, oder flitzen Sie mit Tails' "Sea Fox" durch tiefe Gewässer - aber Vorsicht vor Nack, dem Wiesel, denn der ist auch hinter den Edelsteinen her!

Dr. Robotnik roubou todos as Chaos Emeralds, de novo, mas quando o experimento para sua nova arma deu errado, as esmeraldas foram espalhadas pela ilha. Enquanto Sonic e Tails estão procurando por elas, Robotnik encontra a esmeralda amarela e convence Knuckles the Echidna que Sonic quer roubar todas as outras esmeraldas. Enquanto tudo isso está acontecendo, Fang the Sniper aproveita essa chance para pegar as esmeraldas para si enquanto todo mundo está ocupado. Agora é uma corrida de 4 lados para recuperar as esmeraldas.nnnnA jogabilidade é igual aos outros títulos do Sonic, mas este só está disponível no Game Gear. O jogador pode escolher entre jogar como Sonic ou Tails (que pode voar), e você deve pegar as Chaos Emeralds antes de qualquer um. Uma mudança dos outros jogos do Sonic é que quando atingido, todos os seus anéis não são perdidos, somente uma quantidade ajustada (30-50 dependendo do nível) é perdida.

locale.title: Soukoban
locale.synopsis: Just like in Soko-Ban, it is your goal to push a number of crates onto certain spots in order to finish a level. Finding the right way to move all the crates on the right spots becomes increasingly difficult and you have to plan numerous steps in advance in order not to block your own way. The game features over 25 levels with 10 sub-levels each one. You can always choose the order in which you want to complete the sub-levels, but you have to complete all sub-levels in order to advance to the next main-level. If you have finished the game or become hopelessly stuck, there is also an option to create your own levels.

Soukoban es un juego. Soukoban es un rompecabezas. Soukoban es el avance del cerebro para el sistema Game Gear que no puedes dejar de lado. El juego se basa en mover cajas en un almacén. Pero el trabajo manual no va a ganar el juego: se necesita energía mental para mover las cajas a sus espacios adecuados para limpiar la habitación y pasar a la siguiente pantalla ... ¡y la siguiente ... y la siguiente! Los acertijos siguen llegando: más de 100 pantallas diferentes en total. ¡Soukoban la mente! Además, puedes elegir tu rompecabezas o usar la función de edición para crear tus propias pantallas. ¡Nunca te aburrirás una vez que obtienes Soukoban!

Sokoban est un jeu de réflexion sur Game Gear. Ce titre remet sur le devant de la scène le vieux jeu de casse-tête : vous devez sortir plusieurs caisses des différents niveaux, parfois avec des mouvements limités. Le titre propose un tutoriel, un mode deux joueurs, trois niveaux de difficulté et 250 niveaux de jeu.

locale.title: Space Harrier
locale.synopsis: Run fly dodge those obstacles, but return fire on wave after wave of attacking aliens. Armed with a really big gun, you have to defend yourself against the alien hordes using your wits to navigate around the screen. But watch out for those end of level bosses!
Viaja a velocidades increíbles a través de Dragonland, destruyendo todo lo que se cruce en tu camino.

Space Harrier sur Game Gear est un shoot'em up. Le personnage dirigé à la troisième personne peut courir ou voler, et doit éviter les obstacles et tirs ennemis. Faites preuve d'adresse pour arriver au terme des 18 niveaux, chacun se terminant par un affrontement avec un boss.

locale.title: Spider-Man
locale.synopsis: America's Superhero, the Amazing Spider-Man, is in serious trouble. The Kingpin has vowed to destroy New York and he's assembled a vast army of villains to help, including Dr. Octopus, The Hobgoblin, Venom, Electro, The Lizard, and The Sandman! But Spider-Man boasts the proportional powers of a super spider! He swings on a web line across dizzying chasms no other superhero could handle! He punches and kicks with spectacular strength, clambers up buildings and crawls across girders - even upside down - and uses his webbing to trap enemies and spin protective shields. Each villain has his own evil bag of tricks. Mutant reptiles in the sewer - electric bats among the high-power lines - alien entities on skyscraper roofs - all these and much more face the high-flying web-slinger as he races to save the city!

El siniestro Kingpin ha colocado una bomba en Nueva york ¡y ha culpado de ello a Spidey! Ahora, con una recompensa de 1.000.000 dólares sobre la cabeza arácnida de Spider-Man, todos, tanto los ciudadanos decentes como sus peores enemigos: Dr. Octopus, The Lizard, Electro, Venom le persiguen. Así que, ¡pon tus telarañas en acción y resuelve esta situación!

Spider-Man vs. The Kingpin sur Game Gear est un jeu d'action/plates-formes dans lequel vous incarnez l'homme-araignée. Wilson Fisk alias The Kingpin déclare à la presse qu'une bombe placée quelque part dans New York va exploser d'ici 24 heures. Il accuse directement Spider-Man, qui se retrouve avec la police sur le dos. Vous devez trouver la bombe et redorer votre blason, mais Octopus, Electro et Mysterio tenteront de vous barrer la route.

game.name: Spider-man And The X-men - Arcade's Revenge

locale.title: Spider-Man / X-Men: Arcade's Revenge
locale.synopsis: Spider-Man and members of the X-Men have teamed up in this side-scrolling action game to fight against Arcade, who has built a giant amusement park for the sole purpose of trapping and destroying the super-heroes. You first play as Spider-Man, who sees the X-Men get kidnapped by Arcade and follows them. Once you make it inside Arcade's park you can choose to play as Spider-Man, Cyclops, Storm, Gambit, or Wolverine, each of whom are trapped in a different part of Arcade's maze of deadly traps. You must navigate all five of them safely out, using their different skills and abilities while defeating baddies and bosses along the way.

Spider-Man y sus amigos mutantes necesitan tu ayuda para escapar del diabólico parque de atracciones de Arcade: lucha contra payasos asesinos, pirañas hambrientas, letales bolas de perdición y réplicas de robots mortales de supervillanos como Carnage y Juggernaut. ¿Las telarañas de Spidey, las garras de Wolverine, las cartas de energía de Gambit, los rayos de Storm y las explosiones ópticas de Cyclops significan GAME OVER para Arcade?

Spider-Man et les X-men unissent leurs forces dans Spider-Man and the X-Men : Arcade's Revenge sur Game Gear. Vous incarnez au début l'homme-araignée poursuivant Arcade, qui a enlevé les X-Men pour les emmener dans un parc diabolique tout droit sorti de son imagination morbide. Une fois à l'intérieur vous pourrez choisir entre Tornade, Cyclope ou Wolverine, chacun disposant de ses attaques respectives.

game.name: Spider-man - Return Of The Sinister Six

locale.title: Spider-Man : Return of the Sinister Six
locale.synopsis:
From the ingame intro:
"Doctor Octopus is plotting the crowning caper of his criminal career... to rule the world. He has reunited the Sinister Six and with these super-villains together again, nothing stands in their way - except Spider-Man!"
Spider-Man: Return of the Sinister Six is a side-scrolling game which puts you in the role of Spidey throughout six levels against Electro, Sandman, Mysterio, Vulture, Hobgoblin and Doctor Octopus respectively. Some puzzle solving (like finding a key) is necessary to beat some levels. Spidey can duck jump, climb walls, punch, shoot webs to swing (by pressing punch and jump together) and perform a jump kick (by pressing the punch button twice). Collecting web cartridges allows Spidey to shoot limited web projectiles.
Although hard to die, Spidey has only one life, there are no items to recharge life (but killing some guys will do so) and only one continue.

El Dr Octopus está planeando el número cumbre de su carrera criminal para... ¡DOMINAR EL MUNDO! Ha reunido a The SinisterSix: Electro, Sandman, Mysterio, The Vulture y Hobgoblin ¡Los Seis Siniestros! Nada puede detener el avance de estos súper villanos reunidos... ¡excepto tu simpático vecino Spider-Man! ¿Podrá, nuestro amigo Spidey, salvar el mundo?. ¿Bastarán sus súper poderes para derrotar a los seis siniestros o es demasiado incluso para Spider-man? Sólo tú conoces la respuesta, porque ¡TU eres Spider-man, balanceándote en la más emocionante de las aventuras del momento para Game Gear!

Spider-Man : Return of the Sinister Six sur Game Gear vous propose de revêtir la combinaison bleue et rouge de l'homme-araignée dans un jeu d'action où vous serez opposé aux Sinister Six (Electro, Sandman, Mysterio, Vulture, Hobgoblin et le docteur Octopus). Vous aurez parfois à résoudre des petites énigmes. Prenez garde, notre héros ne possède qu'une seule vie...

Doctor Octopus plant die Krönung seiner kriminellen Karriere... HERRSCHER DER WELT ZU WERDEN! Er hat die Sinister Six erneut versammelt: Electro, Sandman, Mysterio, The Vulture und Hobgoblin. Niemand vermag diesen wiedervereinten Superschurken Einhalt zu gebieten... außer Deinem netten Nachbarn Spider-Man! Kann Spidey die Welt retten? Werden seine Superkräfte ausreichen, um die Sinister Six zu besiegen, oder kann nicht einmal Spider-Man diese Verbrecher stoppen? Nur Du kennst die Antwort, denn DU bist Spider-Man. Schwing Dich von Netz zu Netz in das heißeste Game Gear-Abenteuer, das Du jemals erleben wirst!

Dr. Octopus não desiste mesmo! Com a sua ambição desenfreada de dominar o mundo, ele reuniu um grupo de vilões como há muito não se via. Quem são? Os seis Sinistros! E para impedi-los, directamente da banda desenhada, veio o Homem-Aranha!nnnnPara atrair nosso herói, os Seis Sinistros cantam "Homem-Aranha, Homem-Aranha, nunca bate, só apanha..." Humilhado perante a sociedade, o pacato repórter Peter Parker vestiu novamente as suas roupas especiais e voltou à actividade, neste jogo fantástico!nnnnEscalando paredes, lançando a sua teia pegajosa e dando saltos incríveis, o Homem-Aranha lutará em seis níveis repletos de gráficos sensacionais e inimigos horríveis. Na Estação do poder, o desafio será Electro. Depois vem o Depósito de Lixo Atômico, com o terrível Homem-Areia!nnnnNa casa da Ilusão, o Homem-Aranha vai apanhar o Homem-Mistério, para depois, em ruas e telhados, detonar o Homem-Abutre. Próximo do fim, mas longe de estar salvo, vem a floresta e a Caverna do Duende para, enfim, chegar ao Castelo de Dr. Octopus e a este em pessoa.nnnnTremei, Seis Sinistros. A saga do Homem-Aranha acaba de começar!

locale.title: Spirou
locale.synopsis: Spirou is a 1995 action game for the Sega Mega Drive and SNES by Infogrames based on the Spirou comic franchise. It was only released in Europe. A somewhat different Sega Game Gear port was also in development, but cancelled; a prototype ROM circulates around the Internet; if it is totally different is unknown

Justo cuando está a punto de presentar sus inventos en un simposio de investigación científica en Nueva York, el Conde Champignac es secuestrado por Cyanida. El malvado robot tiene un solo objetivo: gobernar el mundo. No hay un momento para perder. Spirou tendrá que recorrer las calles, los metros y los rascacielos de Nueva York y volar a Palombia, una jungla pantanosa llena de sorpresas ... buenas y malas ...nnnn*No llegó a salir.

Spirou est un jeu de plates-formes inspiré de l'univers gravitant autour du personnage de bandes dessinées de la maison Dupuis. Si une version SNES et Megadrive ont bien vue le jour uniquement en europe, la version Game Gear a été annulé. On se retrouve donc ici en présence d'un prototype.

game.name: Sports Illustrated Championship Football And Baseball

locale.title: Sports Illustrated Championship Football & Baseball
locale.synopsis: Sports Illustrated: Championship Football & Baseball is a Sports game, developed by Unexpected Development and published by Black Pearl, which was released in 1993.

DOS GRANDES DEPORTES, UN JUEGO INCREÍBLEnnnnJuega los deportes favoritos de Estados Unidos, como solo Sports Illustrated te los puede ofrecer. Métete en el campo de juego sin parar y lucha contra la oposición: solo ganará el equipo más duro. Ponte los picos, recoge tu bate y prepárate para golpear la pelota fuera del estadio.nnnnTe sentirás como si estuvieras en el fragor de la acción, experimentando toda la emoción de los deportes como deberían ser jugados. Ambos deportes cuentan con gráficos súper realistas y secuencias animadas que celebran grandes jugadas. Blaze más allá de la oposición y anotar el touchdown final, golpear ese jonrón y anotar a lo grande con este dúo deportivo inmejorable.
Sports Illustrated Championship Football & Baseball est un double jeu de sport qui vous permet de jouer au Football américain (en vue du dessus) et au Baseball.

locale.title: Sports Trivia
locale.synopsis: Sports Trivia is a Sega Game Gear sports quiz game released exclusively in North America. This particular version of the game is not fully understood - it is thought to have only been distributed as a pack-in with Game Gear consoles. A separate, updated(?) version exists in the form of Sports Trivia: Championship Edition.
Disfruta como nunca de un juego de preguntas sobre deporte. Ahora en tu Game Gear podrás aprender y/o demostrar lo que sabes sobre el mundo del deporte.
Sports Trivia est un jeu de Quizz Sportif sortie uniquement en Bundle avec la Game Gear aux Etats Unis. Une version boite existe sous le nom de Sports Trivia - Championship Edition

locale.title: Sports Trivia - Championship Edition
locale.synopsis: Sports Trivia: Championship Edition is a Sega Game Gear sports quiz game released exclusively in North America. It is an update(?) to Sports Trivia.

Pon tu conocimiento a prueba! ¡El primer juego de trivia de deportes de Game Gear tiene cientos de preguntas, que cubren 11 categorías de deportes diferentes!nnnn¡Todos tus deportes favoritos! Fútbol, baloncesto, béisbol, baloncesto universitario, fútbol americano universitario, golf, hockey, tenis, boxeo, carreras de autos y más.nnnnTus respuestas se juegan en un campo de fútbol. ¡Ve por la bomba larga! ¡Cuantas más preguntas respondas a la vez, más yardas ganas!nnnn¡Juego de 1 o 2 jugadores: desafía a un amigo y haz una copia de seguridad en el campo de juego!
Sports Trivia - Championship Edition est un jeu de Quizz Sportif, version boite du jeu Sports Trivia sortie uniquement en Bundle avec la Game Gear aux Etats Unis.

game.name: Star Trek - Generations - Beyond The Nexus

locale.title: Star Trek : Generations : Beyond the Nexus
locale.synopsis:
Beyond the Nexus is based on the seventh Star Trek movie and its story: Captains Kirk and Picard must team up to stop a mad scientist from destroying an inhabited planet so that he might reenter the mysterious Nexus energy ribbon.
The game has several different playing modes. The first is starship combat: seen from the main screen of the Enterprise (both the -B or the -D version) you navigate the ship through space, firing phasers or photon torpedoes at enemies like Tholians, Klingons and Romulans. Another mode has you navigating the ship to its destination by flying through rectangles in space.
On away missions, the view switches to a top-down perspective where you control a single character and can fire your phaser at enemies.
Finally, the game has two puzzle modes. In the first one, frequencies must be decoded: this is done by putting symbols into the right order. One can only guess the order at first, but after an attempt the game reveals how many of the selected symbols are part of the combination and how many are in the right place. Using logic, the right order can be determined, but there are only a limited number of tries.
The second puzzle mode is used to reroute power from one system to another. To do so, a path must be built on a grid for the energy to flow through. The path must be built out of randomly assigned pieces that don't always fit together, similar to the concept of Pipe Mania.

¡VIAJE A LA FRONTERA FINAL!nnnn¡Vuelve a vivir la última aventura de STAR TREK en tu Sega Game Gear! Basado en la nueva película de STAR TREK GENERATIONS de Paramount Pictures, BEYOND THE NEXUS te sitúa en el centro de la misión más importante de los EE.
