UU. ¡Empresa! ¡En este viaje, un extraño fenómeno cósmico reúne a dos de las más honradas tripulaciones de la famosa nave estelar!nnnnTrabajarás lado a lado con personajes de la serie original de STAR TREK y el popular éxito sindicado STAR TREK: THE NEXT GENERATION.nnnn¡Es una aventura Increíble en el siglo 24!nnnn¡Vuela para el combate de Phaser con astutos guerreros romulanos!nn¡Usa Photon Torpedoes para luchar contra Klingon Birds of Prey en un espacio tridimensional simulado!nn¡Ayuda a Picard a alcanzar la prueba antes de que ocurra lo impensable!nn

Star Trek : Generations : Beyond The Nexus sur Game Gear est basé sur les sept films de la saga. Vous alternez entre phases de combat spatial aux commandes de l'Enterprise, des missions d'action au sol et des pans entiers du jeu dédiés à la résolution d'énigmes.

game.name: Star Trek - The Next Generation - The Advanced Holodeck Tutorial

locale.title: Star Trek : The Next Generation, The Advanced Holodeck Tutorial
locale.synopsis: Star Trek: The Next Generation: The Advanced Holodeck Tutorial is a Sega Game Gear simulation game based on the Star Trek franchise. It was released exclusively in North America.

El Capitán Jean-Luc Picard le da la bienvenida, un cadete de primera categoría en la Academia de la Flota Estelar, a la sesión de entrenamiento más intensa que jamás haya experimentado: ¡el Tutorial de Holodeck Avanzado!nnnnLas simulaciones informáticas de la Holodeck lo ponen a usted al mando de Galaxy Class Starship Enterprise: toda su potencia y tripulación esperan sus órdenes. Te embarcarás en una serie de misiones asignadas por tu instructor, el Capitán Picard, pero solo tú puedes tomar las decisiones de vida o muerte que se requieren de un oficial de la Flota Estelar.nnnnCuanto más éxito tengas en completar tus misiones, mayor será tu clasificación en la Academia y más complejas serán las misiones. Así que pon a prueba tus habilidades para tomar decisiones en una fracción de segundo e impulsa tu entrenamiento de la Flota hasta el límite: ¡las posibilidades son tan ilimitadas como el universo mismo!nnnn"¡La empresa de los EE. UU. Es tuya!"
Star Trek : The Next Generation - The Advanced Holodeck Tutorial est un jeu vidéo exclusivement en import US sur GameGear, de genre Stratégie tour par tour Futuriste

locale.title: Star Wars
locale.synopsis:
This game is based closely on Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope. It combines a number of gameplay styles, but primarily it is a side scrolling run-and-jump platformer.
The game begins on Tatooine, where you, as Luke Skywalker, must travel around and meet up with R2D2, C3PO, Obi-Wan, and so on. Eventually, you travel through Mos Eisley and the Death Star as well. While most of the game has you controlling Luke, Han or Leia directly, some of the various game styles include a first-person Millennium Falcon asteroid belt sequence, and an overhead view Death Star trench run.

La misión: Rescatar a la Princesa Leia de las MALVADAS garras de Darth Vader!nnAcudir en busca de ayuda a Obi-Wan Kenobi y Han Solo; pero, para eso primero habrás de encontrarlos.nnPor último, te corresponde detonar el mortífero misil final que acabará para siempre con el cuartel general del lado oscuro y ... QUE LA FUERZA TE ACOMPAÑE!

Star Wars sur Game Gear reprend à peu de détails près le scénario d'Episode IV : A New Hope. La majorité des missions est orientée vers le jeu de plates-formes, mais vous aurez aussi droit à quelques phases de shooting aux commandes du mythique Faucon Millenium.

Ihre Mission: Retten Sie Prinzessin Leia aus Darth Vaders gierigen Klauen!nnHilfe bekommen Sie von Obi-Wan Kenobi und Han Solo, aber Sie müssen die beiden erst finden!nnZum Schluß gilt es, das DarkSide-Hauptquartier entgültig zu zerstören. MÖGE DIE MACHT MIT DIR SEIN!

Não poderia ser de outra forma! A maior aventura do cinema passa a ser também o maior sucesso no video game: Star Wars! Embarque com Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, a princesa Leia, C-3PO e R2-D2 na luta contra o Império!nnnnAs espaçonaves rebeldes acabaram de conseguir sua primeira vitória contra o Império Galático. Durante a batalha, espiões rebeldes descobriram planos do Império para construir uma arma capaz de dizimar seu planeta inteiro. A princesa Leia, que estava com os planos de destruição da Death Star - a principal nave do Império - foi raptada, mas os planos foram enviados com R2-D2, que está perdido.nnnnPara acabar com essa confusão é que você foi convocado. Lute com Luke Skywalker pelo deserto de Tattooine tentando achar R2-D2 e C-3PO e convencendo Han Solo e Obi-Wan Kenobi a embarcar também nessa aventura. Feito isso, pilote o Falcão Milenar até a Death Star, liberte a princesa Leia e traga-a para a Base rebelde.nnnnParece um sonho mas não é! Você realmente está no meio do filme! Para encerrar, lidere o último ataque rebelde à Death Star para, numa missão quase impossível, tentar destruí-la. Boa sorte... e que a força esteja com você!

locale.title: Stargate
locale.synopsis:
The handheld version of Stargate is a matching puzzle game, similar to a 3-D Tetris. Players drop tiles into a Stargate, and try to stack three identical symbols. Doing so clears those tiles. Mismatched tiles simply build stacks higher and higher, and the player loses if the tiles reach the top of the gate. The player is also given a seven-symbol Stargate "address" along the top of the screen. Stacking three copies of a symbol listed in the address will clear the stack and counts toward completing the address.
There are two game modes building on this basic concept:
1. Skill Mode is a single-player challenge where the player tries to complete as many addresses as they can before being overwhelmed. Speed increases with completed addresses.
Battle Mode can be played against the computer, or against a second player connected with a link cable. In Battle Mode, any stacks you clear are sent through the Stargate and appear on your opponent's side. A height level meter is added on the sides to show how close you and your opponent are to overflowing their gates. You can win by outlasting your opponent (while sending complete stacks through to make things more difficult for them) or by being the first to complete the address.

Experimenta la adicción tridimensional de este laberinto lleno de acción. A millones de años luz de la Tierra, tu única posibilidad de escapar es descifrar el misterio de la StarGate. Prepárate en este mundo de gráficos tridimensionales, para un encuentro muy reñido con el faraón Rá, o en una batalla contra otro jugador con la the Gear-to-Gear cable. Acepta el reto y descubre el secreto más allá de la StarGate.
Stargate est un jeu de tetris en 3D basé sur le film Stargate.

locale.title: Street Battle
locale.synopsis:
Jang Pung II (?? II) is an unlicensed fighting game released in South Korea for the Sega Master System and Sega Game Gear. It is effectively a port of Capcom's Street Fighter II (so much so that is sometimes labeled as Street Fighter or Street Fighter II, particularly when sold outside of South Korea), but with different background graphics and occasionally altered character names. It has also been spotted under the name Street Blaster.
There is not thought to be an original Jang Pung, however it did receive a sequel in the form of Jang Pung 3
Es un clon de Street Fighter II, sin licencia.

Jang Pung II est un clone coréen de Street Fighter II (A tel point que le jeu est vendu hors Corée sous ce nom ou sous le nom de Street Blaster) Il comporte quelques modifications graphiques ainsi que quelques changement de noms.

locale.title: Street Hero
locale.synopsis: Janggun-ui Adeul is an unlicensed beat-'em-up game released in South Korea for the Sega Master System. It was at one point planned for a Sega Game Gear release in North America as Street Hero, but the plans fell through. A prototype has since emerged. Game based on the South Korean film with the same name, which can be translated like General's Son (or Son of the General).

Janggun-ui Adeul es un juego de beat-'em-up sin licencia lanzado en Corea del Sur para el Sega Master System. En un momento se planeó un lanzamiento de Sega Game Gear en América del Norte como Street Hero, pero los planes fracasaron. Un prototipo ha surgido desde entonces. Juego basado en la película surcoreana con el mismo nombre, que puede traducirse como el Hijo del General (o Hijo del General).
Janggun ui adeul est un jeu de combats basé sur le film de gangster coréen du même nom. Il s'agit ici d'un prototype, le jeu n'ayant jamais été publié sur Game Gear

locale.title: Streets of Rage
locale.synopsis:
Streets of Rage, Sega's answer to Final Fight, follows the story of three young police officers (Adam Hunter, Axel Stone and Blaze Fielding) in a city controlled by a criminal syndicate led by a "Mr. X" where crime is rampant, which leads the three heroes to make a pact to leave the force and topple the syndicate by themselves.
Gameplay is straightforward and simple. Three buttons are used, one to jump, other to attack and another to perform a range attack from a support police car. Each character has a limited set of moves that include punching and kicking or performing a back attack (if in the open), two grapple moves (depending if holding the opponent in front or by the back), a flying attack, and if playing with another player two additional tag attacks, and different abilities: Adam is slow, but a good jumper and a hard hitter, Axel fast and also a hard hitter, but a lousy jumper and Blaze fast and a good jumper, but weak hitter. Levels are in typical arcade side-scroller fashion: move from left to right (with two exceptions), clearing screens from enemies one after another as fast as possible while avoid taking damage with a boss in the end. Some levels feature "death drops" where the player must avoid falling, while throwing enemies there at the same time, including a typical elevator level. Several items are scattered on the ground, from melee weapons and bonus points (and lives or additional police cars) to apples and turkeys (to restore health).
Únete a dos policías en una guerra sin cuartel para salvar a la ciudad de un siniestro sindicato del crimen.

Streets of Rage sur Game Gear vous propose de suivre l'histoire de trois jeunes agents de police aux prises avec une organisation criminelle, ménée de main de fer par un certain Mr.X. Le jeu consiste à éliminer tous vos opposants grâce à divers coups, pour progresser dans le niveau et défier le boss. Chaque combattant dispose de ses propres qualités et désavantages.

locale.title: Bare Knuckle: Iron Fist of Anger
Streets of Rage 2
locale.synopsis:
After Axel Stone, Blaze Fielding and Adam Hunter destroyed the evil Syndicate leader, Mr. X, the city became a peaceful place to live, and each one of them followed their own paths. One year later, after their reunion, Adam's brother Sammy returned from school to find their apartment in a mess, and Adam nowhere to be seen, and after calling his two friends, one of them notices a photo of Adam chained to a wall, next to someone they knew very well - Mr. X, who returned to turn the peaceful city once again into a war zone. Now, Axel, Blaze, Sammy, and Axel's good friend Max, a pro wrestler, must head out to stop Mr. X once again...hopefully for good...
Streets of Rage 2 differs from the previous title in several ways. There are changes in both graphics (characters now are bigger, more detailed and with more animation frames, and scenarios are less grainy) and gameplay (the rocket move was replaced by a special move that doubles in offense and defense along several new moves), along other new features such as life bars (and names) for all enemies and the radically different new characters.
¡Únete a Axel Stone, Blaze Fielding y Skate Hunter en una sucia y peligrosa lucha contra los desalmados de la mafia, y devuelve la paz a las calles!

Un an après avoir défait Mr. X, les policiers Axel, Blaze et Adam ont repris le cours normal de leur existence, jusqu'à ce que ce dernier ne soit enlevé. Tel est le point de départ de Streets of Rage 2 sur Game Gear. Le jeu demeure un beat'em all classique, mais s'enrichit grandement en termes de jouabilité par rapport à son prédécesseur, ainsi qu'en termes d'interactivité des environnements.
Helfen Sie Axel Stone, Blaze Fielding und Skate Hunter bei der erbarmungslosen Abrechnung mit den Syndikatsgangstern, und bringen Sie den Frieden in die Stadt zurück!

locale.title: Bare Knuckle II: Requiem to the Deadly Struggle
Strider Returns: Journey from Darkness
locale.synopsis:
Strider has been called into action to save the people of the planet Magenta, armed with a Gyro laser and matter converter. He must fight his way through a forest, a ruined city, underground colonies, a roof-top battle, and finally the prison ship in which the Megantan leader is held.
The gameplay is similar to the original, consisting of running, jumping and attacking, with a very dynamic central character. The laser gun can be used while standing still; moving attacks with the sword are still possible, with the two weapons combining similarly to the Switchblade games. Tokens can be collected, which will turn you into a robot to face the end-of-level enemies if enough are collected.

¡Regresa Strider, fabuloso atleta y el mejor de los guerreros! Su misión consiste en superar 5 niveles llenos de peligro con et fin de llegar a la guarida del malvado Gran Maestro y salvar al planeta de una muerte segura. En esta ocasión ¡NO HABRÁ LÍMITE..., PIEDAD...NI RENDICIÓN!

Strider II sur Game Gear place le joueur dans la peau de Strider, guerrier émérite, appelé à la rescousse par le peuple de la planète Magenta. Vous devez progresser à travers forêts, bâtiments désaffectés et autres prisons. Vif et agile, Strider vous permet de vous accrocher et de grimper aux parois, tout en faisant usage de votre laser-gun.

Strider ist wieder da! Natürlich ist es auch diesmal seine Aufgabe, die Erde vor der totalen Zerstörung zu retten. Dazu muß der athletische Kämpfer fünf aufregende Level überstehen und dem bösen Master im Showdown zeigen, was 'ne Harke ist! Gnadenlos!

Você é Strider, membro de uma tribo guerreira que jurou defender a terra de qualquer invasão. Por enquanto foi só treinamento, agora é para valer... é hora de julgar se esses anos todos o tornaram um bravo ou um fraco, pois o Mestre Meio está de volta!
Da primeira vez, ele quase dominou toda a Terra. Agora, Meio raptou a princesa e a mantém em cativeiro. Sabendo de seu amor por ela, ele fará de tudo para atraí-lo até seu covil e, finalmente, destruí-lo!
Serão 5 fases de pura aventura! Você enfrentará autômatos e escravos guerreiros nos mais excitantes lugares: comece pela Floresta Impenetrável, onde você terá de destruir qualquer forma de vida alienígena que encontrar. Depois parta para o Castelo Central, com seus soldados mutantes e plantas geneticamente transformadas.
Para chegar ao covil do Mestre, você ainda terá de passar pelo Labirinto dos Aliens e pelos Telhados da Morte. Mesmo contando com a leal Espada de Plasma, sua tarefa não será fácil! Strider, empunhe essa espada que sua missão já vai começar!

locale.title: Striker
locale.synopsis: Confusingly it is the fourth game by Rage Software to use the Striker moniker - the original Striker was released for the Amiga in 1992 (later ported to the Amiga CD32 in 1994) and formed the basis for all Striker games to come. A second Striker was released for the Super Nintendo in 1993, being known as World Soccer '94: Road to Glory in North America, World Soccer in Japan and Eric Cantona Football Challenge in France, which was followed by World Cup Striker (released as Elite Soccer in North America) the next year. This fourth Striker was made exclusive to Sega systems as a spiritual sequel to Ultimate Soccer.

MÁS QUE AFICIÓN UNA PASIÓN IMPRESCINDIBLE EN TU LUDOTECA El único juego de fútbol que te ofrece más de 40 opciones, más de 340 equipos nacionales e internacionales, uno o dos jugadores, la Liga , el Mundial, equipos de 6 u 11 jugadores, penaltis, repetición del la jugada, 8 formaciones, 3 velocidades, 3 ángulos de vista, control del tiempo, terreno y más, mucho más.

Striker est le 4eme jeu de Rage Software à utiliser cette licence (depuis 1992 sur Amiga).
Il s'agit d'un jeu de football en vue du dessus.
Pour information, la version française de Striker sur Super Nintendo est connue sous le nom Eric Cantona Football Challenge ; et la version sortie en Amérique du Nord est connu sous le nom World Soccer 94: Road to Glory.

locale.title: Super Battletank
locale.synopsis:
In February 1991, The United States of America sent troops into Kuwait and fought in armed combat against the forces of Iraq. Operation Desert Storm featured many different types of units including mobile armor. The M1 Abrams tank division is deployed in a variety of missions to destroy marked Iraqi targets.
Super Battletank: War in the Gulf is a 1st person tank simulation. Players sit in the cockpit to of a M1 Abrams tank. Controls allow the player to accelerate forward, decelerate, rotate the tank's trajectory left and right, move the tank's cannon left and right, fire the weapon and check the map. The goal of the player is to travel to the location of enemy targets, line them up with the Abrams cannon and fire upon them until destroyed. Each mission covers a large area of land and the player will need to consult the real-time map to travel appropriately to target locations. The M1 Abrams tank also features 2 special weapons: The laser which is more powerful than regular cannon, and the smoke screen which allows the player to escape.

El 2 de agosto de 1991, Iraq invade su vecino país productor de petróleo, Kuwait. El 25 de agosto de 1991, una sesión conjunta del Consejo de Seguridad de las Naciones Unidas autoriza la intervención de la fuerza militar. ¡Durante las horas del crepúsculo del 16 de enero de 1992, comienza la liberación de Kuwait!
Con SUPER BATTLETANK, estás al mando del vehículo blindado superior de defensa militar, el tanque de batalla M1A1 Abrams.
Defiéndete contra el T72 construido por los soviéticos, el móvil S.K.U.D. lanzadores, y una variedad de helicópteros iraquíes armados mientras resplandecen sobre la abrasadora arena del desierto y conducen hacia la victoria.

Garry Kitchen's Super Battletank: War in the Gulf (souvent abrégé Super Battletank) est un jeu vidéo de simulation de tank sorti en 1992 sur Game Gear, Mega Drive et Super Nintendo. Le jeu a été développé et édité par Absolute Entertainment. La version Game Gear a été éditée par Majesco Sales.

locale.title: Super Columns
locale.synopsis:
Super Columns is an updated version of Columns with more options of play, but with the same setup, maneuvering falling blocks into groups of three or more to eliminate them from the screen. Along with a Versus mode there is also a Story mode as well.
An evil sorcerer by the name of Surhand has stolen a mystical amulet which brings peace and serenity to the land of Phoenicia and hopes to use it to bring death and destruction to the land. The player must battle their way through his four guards in a series of best two-out-of-three games of Columns in order to face off against Surhand and bring peace back to the land.
The Flash Mode also returns to this version as well as the new Endless Mode where the main objective is to score as many points as possible before the timer runs out. There are also special columns throughout these modes such as Glitter Columns which eliminates all blocks of the same color on the screen at once as well as Stone Block Columns which can only be eliminated through magic power-ups that can be obtained by eliminating the base blocks.

Super Columns es una versión totalmente nueva del más famoso juego de puzzle. Agrupa las gemas mágicas por colores para hacerlas desaparecer, utiliza los nuevos giros y permanece atento a los gemas transparentes ¡te serán de gran ayuda! Conecta el cable gear to gear* y juega con un amigo para poner tus habilidades a prueba.
Ce jeu vidéo de puzzle fait suite au jeu Columns.

Super Columns geht völlig neue Wege in Sachen Puzzlespiele. Magische Steine vertauschen urplötzlich die Spielfelder, während Explosionssteine 5 Blöcke auf einmal verschwinden lassen. Schnapp Dir einen Freund and mit dem separat erhältlichen Gear-to-Gear-Kabel könnt Ihr dann auch zu zweit Eure Geschicklichkeit testen.

locale.title: Super Golf
locale.synopsis: Super Golf is a golf game developed by Sigma Enterprises and published by Sigma in Japan, Sage's Creation in the US, for the Sega Game Gear.

Let 'er Rip!
Una simulación de golf a todo color con una rebanada de vida. Girarlo. dibujarlo, engancharlo, desvanecerlo, cortarlo, darle un poco de izquierda a derecha, golpear y correr, o romper un trozo de O.B. Este juego juega real. Con Super Golf para Game Gear, tienes control total sobre tu estilo de juego. Elija su club, coloque la camiseta y haga su tiro. ¡Todo depende de usted! Super Golf pondrá a prueba tu habilidad y te hará regresar. Para jugadores individuales a cuartetos, niños y adultos, y aficionados y profesionales. ¡Prepárese para el desafío con Super Golf!
Super Golf est un je de golf plutôt classique destiné à la Game Gear

locale.title: Super Kick Off
locale.synopsis:
Super Kick Off is an enhanced developed version of the popular football game developed by Dino Dini for consoles. It includes 40 teams (16 national and 24 club), along the ability to edit club team names and shirts and player names and looks. Game modes include friendlies, Domestic League and Cup (composed by eight English teams), European League (16 European teams) and International cup (eight team tournament). Training allows to practice free kicks, penalties or to pass, shoot and dribble without opposition. Players can compete head to head, or play cooperatively against the computer in the same team. Other game options include player speed, wind and grass cut, along the typical half length, offside rules, extra time and difficulty setting. All changes, from team edits to options, are stored in the cartridge internal memory.
About the game itself, it was one of the most popular of the time, featuring a top-down view with the ball not sticking to the players' feet being the most prominent gameplay feature.
Un nuevo nivel de acción en fútbol. Tú eliges el tipo de campo, los jugadores, ¡e incluso los árbitros! ¡Participa en el Campeonato de la Liga o en la Copa del Mundo!

Super Kick Off sur Game Gear vous permet de choisir parmi quarante équipes de football (16 nationales et 24 clubs). Après avoir exploré le complet mode Training vous pourrez vous lancer dans un championnat national ou une compétition internationale. Vous pouvez aussi créer votre propre compétition. A noter que tous les changements que vous apporterez aux équipes et leur composition, sont sauvegardés grâce à la mémoire intégrée à la cartouche.

locale.title: Super Momotarou Dentetsu III
locale.synopsis: Super Momotarou Dentetsu III is a Miscellaneous game, published by Hudson, which was released in Japan in 1995.

Super Momotaro Dentetsu III es el único lanzamiento de esta mítica saga en una consola de Sega y el cuarto juego en la serie de juegos de mesa de simulación de trenes. Juega de manera similar a Itadaki Street o Monopoly en que el jugador tiene que acumular riqueza comprando propiedades y haciendo otros negocios que a menudo dependen de la casilla en que terminan su turno. El modelo Momotaro Dentetsu recibió una multitud de pequeños ajustes y adiciones en esta cuarta entrada, pero por lo demás juega de forma idéntica a sus predecesores.

Super Momotarou Dentetsu III est un jeu de plateau, qui reprend les personnages des RPG Momotarou Densetsu. Le but est de voyager de cases en cases autour d'un plateau de jeu après avoir jeté un dé et de devenir riche. Pour cela il faudra investir dans des commerces le long du voyage qui se déroulera en train, en bateau ou en avion. Certaines cases déclenchent des événements.

locale.title: Super Monaco GP
locale.synopsis:
Super Monaco GP is a modified conversion of the arcade game, a first-person perspective racing game. As well as the famous Monaco course, others from around the world have been added, to give the game a longer shelf life. You must complete qualification sessions and the races as fast as possible.
The Genesis version of Super Monaco adds a complete career mode, however. In the career mode, your goal is to win a season of races. Unfortunately, you start with a relatively slow car. By challenging other drivers, you can move to a better team and car, and ultimately win the F1 World Title.
¡La acción se pondrá al rojo a medida que trate de vencer a los mejores corredores del mundo para llevarse el trofeo a casa!

Super Monaco GP sur Game Gear est l'adaptation du jeu arcade du même nom. Le jeu inclut les séances de qualifications, dans lesquelles il vous faut briller pour prendre le départ de la course en bonne position. Seul ou à 2 joueurs en écran partagé, testez vos réflexes sur les circuits officiels du championnat du monde FIA de l'époque.

locale.title: Super Off Road
locale.synopsis: Super Off-Road is the ultimate off-road racing event. Four tough trucks speed around rough and ready tracks packed with pitfalls, power-boosters and prizes. No one knows the meaning of sportsmanship here. Have you got the skill and determination to come out on top?

¡Agárrete al volante y pisa a fondo el acelerador! ¡El reto acampo a través te espera! Esta conversión del clásico arcade americano está llena de emociones fuertes. El vértigo y la agitación de la carrera te convertirán en un formidable consolero estusiasta del todo-terreno 'off-road'. Juega en solitario o compite al volante con un amigo en ocho pistas en estadios diferentes con el cable Gear-to-Gear.

Super Off Road sur Game Gear est un jeu de rallye tout terrain reprenant la licence du pilote légendaire Ivan Stewart dit "Ironman". Vous disputez des courses à quatre, dans des 4x4 spécialement construits pour les bosses et les sauts qui vous attendent sur les circuits. Vous avez la possibilité d'améliorer votre véhicule, à condition de remporter assez d'argent en gagnant des courses.

locale.title: Super Smash T.V.
locale.synopsis:
The year is 1999. The world's most popular television show is Smash T.V., an ultra-violent contest between two armed-to-the-teeth combatants, set loose in a series of deadly arenas that are filled to bursting with hordes of mindless beasts and killer robots. The aim of the game is to blast everything in sight and try to grab more cash and prizes than the other guy. Toaster ovens, VCRs, fancy cars and luxury holidays are there for the taking... for anyone who can survive long enough to enjoy them.
Smash T.V. is an insane shoot-em-up from the brain of Eugene Jarvis, creator of Robotron: 2084. It retains that game's frantic style of play and two-joystick control method, but adds plenty of gore, violence, a hint of satire and that all-important two player mode.

¡Felicidades! Eres el próximo concursante afortunado en el juego espectáculo con lo último en premios....¡TU VIDA! Elige 6 armas futuristas y derrota a las hordas de mutantes ciborg, las poderosas esferas, los tanques de asalto y ¡a los hombres mutoides de 30 toneladas! Características: 1 o 2 jugadores con acción simultánea, 2 controladores de acción con un poder de disparo de 360°° Basado en el éxito arcade Williams/Bally.

Smash T.V. sur Game Gear vous place dans un morbide, mais heureusement fictif, jeu télévisé, où deux combattants armés jusqu'aux dents s'affrontent au travers de diverses arènes remplies d'individus mortellement dangereux. Le but est de faire plus de dégâts que votre adversaire, tout en récoltant un maximum de cadeaux.

Herzlichen Glückwunsch! Du bist ein weiterer glücklicher Teilnehmer der Spielshow mit dem höchsten aller Preise....DEINEM LEBEN! Wähle 6 Waffen der Zukunft, um gegen Horden von Cyborg-Mutanten, mächtige Himmelskörper, Kampfpanzer und den 30 Tonnen schweren Mutoid Man zu bestehen! Spielmerkmale: 1- oder 2-Spieler-Modus und ein doppelter Steuermechanismus, der Rundumfeuer ermöglicht Basiert auf der Arcade-Version von Williams/Bally.

locale.title: Super Space Invaders
locale.synopsis: Remember that arcade classic Invaders? Well this game takes it to the next level with harder aliens, bosses, power ups, and a variety of scenery! Invaders come in several configurations for you to try to blast, and power-ups help you with more weapons to choose from.

Oleada tras oleada de extraños y hostiles extraterrestres, fantásticos campos de acción donde la imagen puede trasladarse en dirección múltiple, enormes súper monstruos para finalizar cada nivel, y niveles secretos que sólo los mejores serán capaces de hallar. Te hará perder la razón pero... ¡No podrás resistir la tentación de seguir jugando!

Super Space Invaders sur Game Gear reprend la recette ayant fait le succès de la version arcade. Vous dirigez latéralement un vaisseau doté d'un simple tir et vous devez vous débarrasser des vagues d'assauts aliens qui planent au-dessus de vous et se rapprochent au fur et à mesure que le temps passe.

game.name: Super Star Wars - Return Of The Jedi

locale.title: Super Star Wars : Return of the Jedi
locale.synopsis:
You select your character from the movie (Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, Princess Leia, or Chewbacca) before each level, as each one has different abilities, and go try to beat levels based on the movie's scenes brandishing lightsabers, blasters or crossbows, etc. depending on your choice of character.
Gameplay consists of standard platform action spiced up with some slightly different (gameplay-wise) sequences. Race to Jabba the Hutt's palace in a speeder, fight your way through Jabba the Hutt's minions before killing Jabba himself, control speeder bikes and the Millennium Falcon, and much more.

Toda la Aventura y la Excitación de un Juego de 16 bits -¿Estas preparado para desafiar al lado oscuro? Elige a tu Guerrero rebelde: Luke Skywalker, Leia Organa, Han Solo, Chewbacca o Wicket el Ewok. Revive la acción de la película mientras rescatas a Han de la garras de Jabba el Hutt, destruyes el generador de energía en el bosque de Endor, desafías a Darth Vader y al malévolo Emperador y ¡encabezas la flota de asalto Rebelde en la batalla final para destruir la nueva Estrella de la Muerte!
¡La Fuerza estará contigo mientras luchas por derrotar al Imperio de una vez por todas!

Super Star Wars : Return of the Jedi sur Game Gear, suit, comme son nom l'indique, l'intrigue du volet clôturant la première trilogie Star Wars. Vous aurez la possibilité de choisir entre Luke, Han Solo, Leia et Chewbacca au début de chaque mission, chacun disposant de caractéristiques lui étant propres. La majorité des missions est orientée jeu de plates-formes, quelques phases de conduite de véhicules interviennent épisodiquement.

Ein 16-Bit-Spiel voller Abenteuer und Spannung - Sind Sie bereit, es mit den Mächten der Finsternis aufzunehmen? Wählen sie Ihren Rebellenkrieger: Luke Skywalker, Leia Organa, Han Solo, Chewbacca oder Wicket den Ewok. Erleben Sie den Film noch einmal, während Sie Han von Jabba the Hutt retten, den Generator auf dem Wald-Mond Endor zerstören, Darth Vader und den Imperator herausfordern und die Angriffsflotte der Rebellen in den letzten Kampf schicken, um den neuen Todesstern zu zerstören!
"May the Force be with you", während Sie darum kämpfen, das Reich des Bösen ein für allemal zu besiegen!

locale.title: Super Tetris
locale.synopsis: Super Tetris is a Korean conversion of the classic Russian game.
Juego de Tetris sin licencia.

locale.title: Superman
locale.synopsis: Lois Lane has been kidnapped by Braniac. The Doom Star orbits the Earth. The deadliest adversaries Superman has ever encountered are running amok. What greater challenge for The Man of Steel, his Heat Vision, and the might of his Super Punch?

"Brainiac ha secuestrado a Lois Lane. La estrella de la suerte gira alrededor de la Tierra. Los más peligrosos adversarios que jamás ha tenido que enfrentar Superman se han desbocado ¡Qué reto más grande para The Man of Steel, su Termo-visión y el poderío de su Súper Puñetazo!"

Superman: The Man of Steel, ou simplement Superman en Amérique du Nord, est un jeu vidéo de plates-formes basé sur le comics Superman.
Lois Lane a été kidnappé par Brainiac, utilisez vos yeux lasers et vos super muscles pour en venir à bout.

"Brainiac hat Lois Lane entführt. Der Todesstern umkreist die Erde. Superman muß es mit seinen tödlichsten Feinden aufnehmen, die von blindwütiger Zerstörungswut getrieben werden. Welche größere Herausforderung könnte es für den Man of Steel mit seinem Hitzeblick und seinem mächtigen Superschlag geben?"

locale.title: Surf Ninjas
locale.synopsis:
Surf Ninjas was created as a tie-on for the 1993 New Line Cinema movie of the same name and is loosely based on its content. The entire introduction of how the surfers discover they are the sons of a Patusani king is not mentioned and instead the player is thrown in the story as a ninja trainee right away. Colonel Chi wants to overthrow the kingdom and kill the last heirs, so he sends troops of ninjas to kill the two brothers.
Players control one of the brothers as he travels through different locations such as the Palace restaurant, the docks at Venice (California), the island of Patu San and more. The 2D side-scrolling platforms missions contains platforms, enemies and ninjas and various hazards. One button is used to jump while the other, in combination with the D-pad, launches punches, kicks, throws and various combos. Attacks can also be performed from the air or using very high jumps.
During gameplay an options screen can be accessed to review the statistics (health, strength, reflex and fight), get a hint through Adam's Game Gear, call the ninja Zatch to launch a powerful attack or select a weapon such as shurikens, fireballs, a knife and a sword. By defeating enemies coins are collected to be spent on bonus time on the clock, Zatch power-ups, a bonus life, complete regeneration, a hint, a weapon or a continue.
¡Reclama tus derechos de nacimiento! ¡Encuentra la espada Kwantzu y destruye el ejército ninja del coronel Chi!

Plus qu'une apparition, on peut véritablement parler de placement de publicité pour la Game Gear, et pour le jeu Surf Ninjas, dans le film éponyme dont il est censé être adapté, fruit d'un accord entre SEGA of America et New Line Cinema, pour promouvoir la portable couleur !
Le jeu va jusqu'à montrer un personnage jouer à la Game Gear, comme dans le film, la boucle est bouclée ; ils sont forts ces Américains !

locale.title: Sylvan Tale
locale.synopsis:
In "Sylvan Tale", you play a young warrior who strolls in the forest and suddenly notices a mysterious glowing object. He touches the object, and gets teleported to the land of Verda. A mysterious voice talk to him, saying that he has to visit six fortresses scattered across the land, and to retrieve six magic droplets, which is the only way to save the inhabitants of Verda from perishing.
This is an action adventure with RPG elements. You wander around the world, visiting towns and descending into dungeons, fighting enemies in real-time combat and getting various items (for healing, HP-increasing, etc.). As the game progresses, you will also collect items that can be used to transform into various creatures with different abilities. As a mole you can dig and destroy certain stones, as a merman you can swim, as a turtle you can use your shell as protection, as a mouse you can go through mouse holes and manipulate certain magnetic stones, and as a bird you can fly and dodge attacks.

Toma el control de Zetts, un joven guerrero que pasea por el bosque y de repente se da cuenta de un misterioso objeto resplandeciente. Toca el objeto y es teletransportado a la tierra de Verda. Una misteriosa voz le habla, le dice que tiene que visitar seis fortalezas esparcidas por la tierra y recuperar seis gotas mágicas, que es la única manera de salvar a los habitantes de Verda de la muerte.

Sylvalant était un monde ou Humains, Animaux, Nature et Dieux vivaient en harmonie et paix. Mais l'équilibre du monde s'écroula... les monstres envahirent les terres de Verda, Flora puis Sylva... tuant et saccageant tout sur leur passage. Et devinez qui va devoir remettre de l'ordre dans tout ça ? C'est Bibi... c'est vous le héros ! C'est vous Zett, qui pour des raisons encore obscures, avez été choisi pour sauver le monde de Sylvalant. Pour cela pas 36 solutions, il vous faut retrouver les Six Larmes de Sylvalant, essences même du toute vie sur Terre.

locale.title: T2 : The Arcade Game
locale.synopsis:
As the title states, this is the home conversion of the arcade rail-shooter based on the film Terminator 2: Judgement Day. Up to two players shoot through future and present levels as robotic killers reprogrammed to serve the human resistance.
Both players wield a machine gun with infinite ammo that lowers its firing rate (overheats) as it is continuously fired. A secondary weapon (missile launchers in the future, shotguns in the present) has limited ammo but deals heavy damage. Powerups inside the game world include secondary weapon ammo and coolant for the machine guns, and are shot to be collected.
T2: The Arcade Game features seven levels based on specific scenes or general concepts in the film. The first four levels act as a prelude, as the player guns down waves of metal Terminators across a post-apocalyptic Battlefield, a besieged Human Hideout, and through the security checkpoints of the enemy supercomputer SkyNet. After destroying the computer, players travel back in time to protect John and Sarah Connor, while also destroying every scrap of SkyNet research at the headquarters of its manufacturer. From there, players must fend off the indestructible T-1000 until the final showdown in the Steel Mill.
Assets from the movie are used when possible, such as voice clips from Arnold Schwarzenegger, and close-up digital stills of Robert Patrick for the final battle against the T-1000. The Genesis and SNES versions also support lightguns (the Menacer and Super Scope, respectively).

El número uno entre los juegos arcade "a la caza de..." hace una incursión en Game Gear. Eres un Terminator T-800 con un arsenal impresionante: ametralladoras de repetición, pistolas, misiles y un lanzagranadas M-79. ¡Destroza endoesqueletos y Helicópteros HK!nn¡Acaba con el metal líquido del T-1000... o estás acabado!

T2 : The Arcade Game sur Game Gear est la conversion d'un jeu de tir sorti sur borne d'arcade. L'intrigue est celle du film Terminator 2 et deux joueurs peuvent jouer ensemble pour défaire les nombreux ennemis. Faites équipe et affrontez le redoutable T-1000 !

locale.title: Tails Adventure
locale.synopsis:
Before Tails met Sonic the Hedgehog he lived on Cocoa Island, a place that isn't on the map. It's an island pulled up by the Chaos Emeralds. Suddenly, while relaxing, Tails hears an explosion that seems like it's coming from inside the island. A Flicky tells Tails that Battle Kukku has invaded the island. He also tells Tails that Battle Kukku is mining here for the Chaos Emeralds, to obtain it's power. Tails gears up and heads for his quest to find the machine parts to build his weapon to defeat the evil Battle Kukku. There are however major plot differences between the Japanese and the western release. In the US and European version of the game it tells the story how Sonic and Tails decide to go separate ways for a while. Tails finds an unknown island and decides to dub it Tails Island. While resting there, a large explosion occurs and a Flicky tells him birds are invading the island.
Unlike the other games in the series, this spin-off is less of a traditional platformer, but has a much slower pace with rpg elements and a focus on puzzle-solving. Tails can walk, jump, fly (momentarily), hang on ledges and throw bombs. He starts with ten health points that can be replenished with rings, but the amount can be extended to 99 by collecting chaos emeralds. In the twelve stages Tails can collect up to 26 items. Per level however, he is only allowed to bring along four and this adds a tactical dimension. One of the most vital tools is the Remote Robot that can squeeze through small areas that Tails cannot reach. Underwater he changes into the small submarine Sea Fox.

Tails está a punto de empezar su propia aventura. Paseando por el bosque, se encontró una pequeña pieza de una gran máquina,¿qué es esto? Ahora empieza la diversión. Ayuda a Tails a recoger todas las piezas de la máquina, mientras lucha contra sus enemigos por el camino y encuentra la respuesta a la adivinanza.

Le jeu de plates-formes Tails Adventure disponible sur Game Gear narre l'histoire du plus connu des compagnons de Sonic le hérisson : Tails l'écureuil volant. Alors que notre héros se repose sur son île, celle-ci est soudainement attaquée par une armée entière de canards. Seulement armé de bombes au départ, Tails pourra récupérer de nombreux gadgets par la suite comme un petit robot télécommandé, ainsi que les fameuses Emeraudes du Chaos afin de booster sa jauge de vol.

Tails bricht zu seiner ersten eigenen Reise auf. Auf dem Weg durch den Wald findet er ein kleines Stück aus einer großen Maschine. Was kann das nur sein? Das Abenteuer beginnt. Helfen Sie Tails, alle Teile zu finden, die lauernden Gegner am Wegesrand zu besiegen and des Rätsels Lösung zu entdecken...

Antes de Tails conhecer Sonic the Hedgehog ele morava em Cocoa Island, um lugar que não está no mapa. É uma ilha puxada pelas Chaos Emeralds. De repente, enquanto relaxa, Tails ouve uma explosão que pareceu que vir de dentro da ilha. Um Flicky diz a Tails que Battle Kukku invadiu a ilha. Ele também diz a Tails que Battle Kukku está minando aqui pelas Chaos Emeralds para obter seu poder. Tails se equipa e se dirige para sua busca para encontrar as peças da máquina para construir sua arma para derrotar o malvado Battle Kukku. No entanto, existem grandes diferenças de enredo entre a versão japonesa e ocidental. Na versão americana e européia do jogo, conta a história de como Sonic e Tails decidem seguir caminhos separados por um tempo. Tails encontra uma ilha desconhecida e decide chamá-la de Tails Island. Enquanto descansava lá, uma grande explosão ocorre e um Flicky diz que os pássaros estão invadindo a ilha.nnnnAo contrário dos outros jogos da série, este spin-off tem um pouco de um jogo de plataforma tradicional, mas com um ritmo muito mais lento com elementos leves de RPG e um foco na resolução de quebra-cabeças. Tails pode andar, pular, voar (momentaneamente), pendurar-se nas bordas e lançar bombas. Ele começa com dez pontos de saúde que podem ser reabastecidos com anéis, mas a quantidade pode ser estendida até 99 coletando as Chaos Emeralds. Nas 12 fases, Tails pode coletar até 26 itens. Por fase no entanto, ele só é permitido trazer quatro e isso acrescenta uma dimensão tática. Uma das ferramentas mais importantes é o Remote Robot que pode se espremer através de pequenas áreas que Tails não pode alcançar. Debaixo d'água ele muda para o pequeno submarino Sea Fox.

locale.title: Tails' Skypatrol
locale.synopsis:
Tails' Skypatrol is the first solo adventure of the Sonic sidekick Tails in the Sonic the Hedgehog series and it was only released in Japan.
While flying around, Tails discovers an island. It seems to be completely abandoned except for some mine cart tracks. As he lands on the island a cart approaches, and Tails hides in the bushes. The passing silver cart is driven by a woman who says she is Wendy Witchcart. She proclaims that everything on the island is hers and threatens to transform everyone in crystal who does not follow her rules. Tails, determined to save all the animals on the island, sets in a chase to the Witchcart.
Gameplay is fairly similar to the Sonic series. Tails need to defeat enemies and complete obstacles. He can fly, but is constantly suspended. He carries a golden rind that is used to take out enemies or to latch on to devices. Sonic, the emeralds and Dr. Robotnik are not presented, and neither are there rings to collect during the levels.
The game came to other territories as an unlockable minigame in the GameCube version of Sonic Adventure DX and as one of the titles in the Sonic Gems Collection.

Los jugadores asumen el mando de Miles "Tails" Prower en un estado de vuelo permanente, que se une a una "Sky Patrol" con la esperanza de salvar una isla al derrotar a la villana malvada Witchcart, quien convierte a cualquiera que se oponga en cristales con su magia.

Tails' Skypatrol sur Game Gear est un jeu de plates-formes spin-off de la série Sonic dans lequel vous incarnez le camarade du hérisson bleu, Tails. Ce dernier a fait la découverte d'une île abandonnée, toutefois une certaine Wendy Witchcart déclare que celle-ci lui appartient et qu'elle changera quiconque lui désobéit en cristal. Notre jeune héros est bien décidé à protéger les habitants de l'île de cette femme tyrannique.

Tails 'Skypatrol é a primeira aventura solo do ajudante do Sonic Tails na série Sonic the Hedgehog e só foi lançado no Japão.nnnnAo voar ao redor, Tails descobre uma ilha. Parece estar completamente abandonada, exceto por algumas trilhas de carrinho de mina. Quando ele pousa na ilha, um carrinho se aproxima, e Tails se esconde nos arbustos. O carrinho prateado passa e é conduzido por uma mulher que se chama Wendy Witchcart. Ela proclama que tudo na ilha é dela e ameaça transformar todos em cristal se não seguirem suas regras. Tails, determinado a salvar todos os animais na ilha, se põe em uma perseguição a Witchcart.nnnnA jogabilidade é bastante semelhante à série Sonic. Tails precisa derrotar inimigos e desviar de obstáculos. Ele pode voar, mas está constantemente suspenso. Ele carrega um anel dourado que é usado para tirar inimigos ou para travar em dispositivos. Sonic, as esmeraldas e o Dr. Robotnik não estão presentes e nem há anéis para coletar durante as fases.

locale.title: Taisen Mahjong HaoPai
locale.synopsis: Taisen Mahjong Haopai is a board game, developed by Arc System Works and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1990.
Posiblemente uno de los mejores juegos de Majhong de todo el catálogo de Game Gear. Cuenta con una secuela con algunas mejoras, Taisen Mahjong Haopai 2.
Taisen Mahjong HaoPai est un jeu de ... Majhong.

locale.title: Taisen Mahjong HaoPai 2
locale.synopsis: Taisen Mahjong Haopai 2 is a board game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1993.
Si su antecesor era posiblemente uno de los mejores juegos de Mahjong del Game Gear, éste renueva y mejora por completo al anterior.
Taisen Mahjong HaoPai 2 et la suite de Taisen Mahjong HaoPai !!! Et en plus c'est un jeu de Majhong...

locale.title: Taisen-gata Daisenryaku G
locale.synopsis:
The Game Gear version of the grand old lady of war simulations, Daisenryaku, arranges a war between the fictive Red and Blue countries. On one of thirty different maps, units are produced and moved out into combat, and the war is only over when the enemy capital has been conquered.
Three basic phases make up each turn: production, movement and combat. Each city or airbase within a distance of five hexagons from your capital may produce one unit each turn, as long as your funds allow it. Each turn yields new funds, whose amount is proportional to the number of cities and airports you have occupied.
Units are moved on the map, which is based on "fake hexagons"; the hexagons are in fact square, but offset on each row so that each square borders six other squares. Each terrain type has different movement and defence values, which makes movement and combat more complicated.
The outcome of combat is determined by the attack strength which varies between different unit types, and by their experience. Each time a unit survives combat, it gains experience points and eventually gains in experience level, which makes the chance of winning in combat higher. As each unit is in fact a squadron of ten, a typical combat will only destroy a certain number of the members of the unit.
An additional moment in the gameplay is the recharging phase. Units which have lost members can be built up to full force in a city or airbase, and those which have run out of ammunition can do the same. Ammunition can also be replenished in the battlefield using supply trucks.
A total of thirteen airbourne and land-based units are available. Some units cannot fight other units; tanks can do nothing against bombers, and mechanised infantry can't protect itself well against a howitzer two squares away.
The game can be played both against the computer or against another human player by linking two Game Gears together.

Daisenryaku G sur Game Gear place le joueur au centre d'un conflit fictif entre la nation bleue et la nation rouge. Vous disposez d'une phase de production de vos unités (d'une douzaine de types différents), puis d'une phase de positionnement, avant que la phase de combat ne débute. La stratégie dépend grandement du terrain sur lequel vous combattez.

locale.title: Taito Chase H.Q.
locale.synopsis:
As an undercover agent of Chase Headquarters, your job is to patrol the streets and track down five criminals. You are given a mission briefing before you start which gives information on the suspect and what car they drive. Then you drive across the city without crashing into other cars, and catch up with the criminal's car. To arrest the suspects, you must keep bumping into their car until it is no longer functional. And you have to do this under a strict time limit. You can't afford to crash into cars or buildings or you waste time getting on the road again.
However, once you've caught up with your suspect, you are given more time. Your car is also equipped with turbo boosts, which you can use to gain extra speed if you are way behind the criminal. Each arrest is based on a "suspicion".

Nueva York, como ayuda para erradicar el crimen, la policía de Manhatam ha establecido un cuartel general de investigación especial. Se denominan CHASE H.Q., y su objetivo es arrestar a todos los criminales que escapen en automóviles de la escena de cualquier crimen.

Dans Chase H.Q. sur Game Gear, vous incarnez un agent secret qui arpente les routes pour retrouver des fugitifs. Le profil du suspect est défini en amont de chaque mission et la tâche qui vous incombe est de le dénicher parmi la population civile. Pour l'appréhender, percutez son véhicule de manière à lui faire perdre le contrôle, en respectant le temps imparti.

New York ? Unter dem Decknamen CHASE H.Q. hat die Polizei von Manhattan ein Sonderhauptquartier zur Verbrechensbekämpfung eingerichtet, mit dem Ziel der Verhaftung krimineller Elemente, die vom Schauplatz ihres Verbrechens mit dem Auto flüchten.

locale.title: TaleSpin
locale.synopsis: Baloo the Bear is the chief and only pilot at the always struggling air-frieght company of Higher for Hire. With his cargo plane, the Sea Duck and the young orphan, Kit Cloudkicker... Baloo is ready to take to the sky and face down air pirates, bad weather and the ruthless Shere Khan.
Kit y Baloo luchan para ganar la competición de vuelo más estrafalaria del mundo, en el famoso Sea Duck de Higher for Hire. El premio: un lucrativo contrato de transporte aéreo.

Dans TaleSpin sur Game Gear, vous incarnez l'ours Baloo et devez l'aider à acheminer ses cargaisons. Le jeu alterne séquences de plates-formes et phases de pilotage aérien. Bravez les conditions climatiques, débarrassez-vous des pirates de l'air, mais surtout, prenez garde aux griffes acérées de Sher Khan !

game.name: Tama And Friends 3 Choume Kouen - Tamalympic

locale.title: Tama & Friends 3 Choume Kouen - Tamalympic
locale.synopsis: Tama & Friends: 3 Choume Kouen Tamalympic is an action game for the Sega Game Gear. It is based upon the 1994 Tama and Friends anime series.
Es la cuarta entrega de la saga Tama & Friends basada en el anime del mismo nombre.

Tama & Friends 3 Choume Kouen - Tamalympic est une adaptation de la série animée Tama et ses amis diffusé en France pour la première fois le 3 mars 2003 sur France 5 dans l'émission Debout les Zouzous.

locale.title: Tarzan - Lord of the Jungle
locale.synopsis: Tarzan is an Action game, developed by Eurocom Entertainment Software and published by GameTek, which was released in Europe in 1994.

Señor de la jungla LA SELVA TE ESPERA ...
Domina a los animales salvajes y la vasta jungla con las habilidades del hombre primordial. Como Tarzán, usarás cuchillos, lanzas, arcos y flechas para proteger tu reino de los cazadores furtivos, los ladrones y los incendios forestales. Solo tú tienes los instintos y la fuerza para proteger el último y verdadero desierto, porque tú eres el Señor de la Jungla.
Tarzan : Lord of the Jungle est un soft de plateforme/action qui n'est pas adapté du dessin animé éponyme de Disney sur ce support.

locale.title: Tatakae! Pro Yakyuu Twin League
locale.synopsis: Tatakae! Pro Yakyuu Twin League is a Sports game, developed by ITL and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1995.
Tatakae! Pro Yakyuu Twin League es un juego de béisbol con personajes al estilo cabezón.
Tatakae! Pro Yakyuu Twin League est un jeu de baseball avec des personnages tout mignon (style Super Deformed).

locale.title: Taz in Escape from Mars
locale.synopsis:
You play as Taz, the famous cartoon-character. Taz is captured by Marvin the Martian and transfered to his intergalactic Zoo! Now it is your job to aid Taz in his great escape from the Zoo-prison and also find a way back home to Earth. To make the escape a little easier, there are items placed here and there, such as cakes which make regain your health. You also find gas tanks, which you can eat and then breath fire.
You will travel trough the Zoo, and a big wasteland and many other hostile zones with lots of weird enemies and bizarre bosses.

Taz ha vuelto, y ¡tiene problemas! Marvin el Marciano ha encerrado a nuestro querido diablo en un zoo especial y tu debes devolverlo a la tierra, atravesando 6 niveles de cómica acción interplanetaria protagonizada por las mega estrellas Wile E. Coyote, Yosemite Sam y Speedy Gonzales.

Taz in Escape From Mars sur Game Gear vous permet d'incarner le célèbre tigre de Tasmanie, capturé par Marvin le Martien, puis exposé dans un zoo. Dans ce jeu de plates-formes aux créatures loufoques, vous devez aider Taz à s'échapper du zoo extraterrestre, et surtout, trouver un moyen de rentrer sur Terre.

locale.title: Taz-Mania
locale.synopsis:
One evening, Taz's father is telling an intriguing tale. Somewhere on Tazmania is a Lost Valley, and in that valley nests a huge seabird, so huge that one of it's eggs could feed a family for a year! Just think of the omelette one of those could make!
Thus Taz becomes fascinated and leaves in search of one of those eggs before his Dad has even finished the story...
Taz can Jump, perform a Spinning Jump and a Spin Attack. Munch roast chickens to replenish life. Gain extra points by moving quickly through the levels - there are six stages and each stage has two rounds.
There are a few other items and pickups such as:
1. Spring: boings Taz up to high ledges. 2. Blocks: destructible. 3. 1-UP: extra life. 4. Star: invulnerability. Unless you run into a bomb. 5. Bomb: does what it says on the tin.
Taz, el diablo de Tasmania tiene hambre y anda al acecho. ¡Únete a TAZ, con su rápido ataque, en la búsqueda de la tortilla más grande del mundo!

Dans ce jeu, Taz peut attaquer les ennemis en se transformant en tornade comme il le fait dans les dessins animés. Il peut creuser des tunnels et ainsi débloquer des passages secrets. Il peut également changer de taille dans certaines zones. En étant minuscule, il accède à des passages très étroits. En devenant gigantesque, il est invulnérable, mais ne peut plus sauter. Les niveaux sont non-linéaires et autorisent plusieurs chemins ainsi que des retours en arrière.

locale.title: Tempo Jr.
locale.synopsis: Tempo Jr. is platforming game and sequel to Tempo on the Sega 32X. The player again takes control of the cute grasshopper Tempo and guides him through various stages. The goal in each level is just to find the exit. Each level consists of two stages and a boss fight. After finishing a level, Tempo can take part in a mini game if he found coins in the completed level and win additional points or lives. Tempo can shoot notes from his hands to stun enemies, which will then automatically be kicked away on contact. He can also use his wings to move faster, float in the air or fall more slowly and more controlled.

Tempo es un saltamontes muy simpático con un gran don para las notas. Su misión será devolver el poder al planeta de Rhythmias coleccionando sonidos y CD's, mientras lucha contra los enemigos utilizando sus rápidos movimientos de baile, y tirándoles notas. Tiene 6 niveles llenos de enérgica diversión.

Le monde de Tempo Jr. vit sous l'influence de la musique. Les personnages qui habitent ce doux pays bougent en rythme et semblent exécuter une danse. Rien n'entame sa bonne humeur, pas même les méchantes bêtes qui occupent les lieux. Contre celles-ci, il se défend par l'envoi de notes de musique qui paralysent l'adversaire ou par un coup de pied s'il est proche de la bestiole.

locale.title: Terminator 2 : Judgment Day
locale.synopsis:
Terminator 2: Judgment Day is based on the movie of the same name. The player takes the role of the T-800 Terminator and has to protect John Connor from being terminated by the T-1000 Terminator.
The game is set over five levels with the following goals:
1. Level 1: Acquire a weapon. Level 2: An isometric racing course on a motorcycle in which the player needs to out-run a tanker truck that is chasing them. This stage was omitted from the Game Gear version. Level 3: Locate and rescue Sarah Connor from the Pescadero asylum. Level 4: Plant explosive charges to destroy the Cyberdyne building. Level 5: Defeat the T-1000 within the steel mill.

Con toda la acción explosiva del éxito cinematográfico. Eres un Terminator enviado del futuro, equipado con un objetivo en pantalla y un impresionante arsenal de armas. ¿Estás preparado para enfrentarte al T-1.000 de metal líquido en la fábrica de acero? Salva el futuro o serás EXTERMINADO.

Terminator 2 : Judgment Day sur Game Gear reprend l'intrigue du film culte. Vous incarnez donc le T-800, en charge de protéger John Connor, menacé de mort par le T-1000. Eliminez tout opposant par les poings ou par les armes dans les différentes niveaux de jeu.

locale.title: Tesserae
locale.synopsis: Tesserae is a 2-d combination of Rubic's Cube and the more advanced levels of Q-Bert. Simple yet colorful symbol graphics make for endless hours of gameplay... akin to how one can play MineSweeper or Tetris on end, this game got into your head. Gameplay consisted of "flipping" tesserae, or tiles, from squares over adjacent squares. The result would either create a complex tile, or cancel out, resulting in the deletion of a tile. The goal was to clear the board entirely. Higher levels were designated by added tile complexity, and larger board grid sizes.

Despeja el tablero saltando un mosaico estampado de colores sobre otro. ¿Sonido fácil? Juzga por ti mismo. Un fascinante rompecabezas, Tesserae, plantea una variedad infinita en tres niveles de dificultad, en nueve tableros de mosaico distintos. Usa la lógica y el instinto para competir por la puntuación más alta. Pero ten cuidado: el cambio de fichas puede ser adictivo.
Tesserae est Puzzle-game dans le style du jeu de GO mais en multicolor

game.name: Adventures of Batman and Robin, The

locale.title: The Adventures of Batman & Robin
locale.synopsis:
The game is based on the famous 1990s animated series of the same name. The player takes control solely of Batman, as the Joker has kidnapped Robin in order to lure Batman into a game. Furthermore, the Jokers lets Gotham's most feared criminals compete with one another in order to distract Batman. Naturally, Batman has to take care of the other master criminals, too, while trying to free Robin.
The Adventures of Batman & Robin is 2D platformer/ beat'em up. The goal in each stage and level is to walk from left to right to reach the (sub)boss and the end of the stage. To beat his foes, Batman uses punches and kicks in close combat and several weapons for short distances. Batman has an unlimited supply of Batarangs with him from the beginning, and there are four more weapons available. Apart from simple jumping, Batman can also perform a double jump to reach higher places and can hold on to ledges.

Mientras los señores del crimen dominan cada vez más la ciudad de Gotham, el Caballero Oscuro se enfrenta al desafío de salvar a Robin de las garras del Jocker y sus compinches. Tendrás mucha acción y suspense durante esta aventura, sacada de la famosa serie de TV de dibujos animados, que cuenta con armas únicas puzzles y plataformas.

The Adventures of Batman & Robin est un jeu de plates-formes sur Game Gear. Incarnez l'homme chauve-souris et son fidèle acolyte Robin, qui utiliseront tous deux leurs gadgets pour défaire l'infâme Mr. Freeze dans ce jeu inspiré du dessin animé. Mais ce ne sera pas le seul ennemi car d'autres méchants se joindront au combat avec parmi eux Le Joker ou encore Double Face.

locale.title: The Berenstain Bears' Camping Adventure
locale.synopsis:
A bear family - Father Bear, Mother Bear, Sister Bear, and Brother Bear - decide to go camping to the nearby forest. While they sit by the fire, the two cubs decide to explore the area. Visit dangerous places, avoid or destroy the enemies, and collect things that bears like most - such as honey or fresh fish!
You can play as either Sister or Brother Bear. From the beginning, you can access four different levels. Once you complete them, you'll unlock the final stage. The bears can jump, throw rocks at enemies, or swing a net to hit them. In each area there are a lot of things to gather - mostly food. After a level is completed, you'll be shown how much valuable stuff you have managed to get.

Todos los Osos Berenstain favoritos se dirigen a las colinas en una aventura de campamento llena de sorpresas. ¡El hermano y la hermana Bear van demasiado lejos y terminan perdidos! ¡Necesitarán mucha "pawful" ayuda para encontrar el camino de regreso al campamento a través de ríos espumosos, cuevas de diamantes, huertos de miel y un bosque embrujado!

Dans The Berenstain Bears' Camping Adventure sur Game Gear, vous incarnez les membres de la famille d'ours partis faire du camping en forêt. Vous explorerez les lieux à la recherche de friandises telles que du miel ou du bon poisson frais. Mais il vous faudra prendre garde aux autres animaux peuplant les bois.

locale.title: The Chessmaster
locale.synopsis:
The Chessmaster is a game where the player has the chance to play against the CPU controlled Chessmaster at a standard game of chess.
To play the game the player must pick up the chess pieces with there hand cursor and place it in the desired location, within the rules a standard chess game. There are 16 different difficulty levels that includes 2 beginner levels, 13 standard levels (ranging from an average of 5 seconds to 4.5 minutes per shot depending on level), and a infinite level that will keep thinking of a shot until a perfect shot can be made or it is forced to move. There is also a teaching mode that shows the player all the possible moves with the selected piece. Two players can play each other with two controllers and there is also an option of letting the Chessmaster play itself.
¿Crees ser bastante bueno, o no? Bien, aún falta que Chessmaster te enseñe un par de cosas. ¡Miles de jugadas clásicas!

The Chessmaster sur Game Gear vous permet de faire des parties d'échecs contre l'intelligence artificielle de la cartouche. Seize niveaux de difficulté, dont deux pour débuter tranquillement, sont proposés. Un mode initiation vous donnera aussi l'occasion d'apprendre les règles de l'un des plus vieux jeux jamais créé.

locale.title: The Excellent Dizzy Collection
locale.synopsis:
Three complete games starring game superstar Dizzy! Enjoy the thrill of an arcade action game, a puzzle game and a complete adventure game all in one pack!
1. Dizzy the Adventurer - Adventure Game Here's Dizzy - in an amazing magical quest packed with action, mystery, surprises and lots of new interesting characters. Escape from an underground cave and wake Daisy from the endless sleep caused by pricking her finger on a cursed spinning wheel! The spell can only be broken by a kiss from a Prince! A great sense of humour and brilliant fun! A superbly crafted cartoon adventure set in a magical kingdom! Brilliant graphics, music and a magical quality that will enchant players. "A magical quest to wake Daisy from her endless sleep"
2. Panic Dizzy - Puzzle Game It's puzzling, challenging and mega playable! Play any of the Yolfolk and challenge friends to a choice of 3 brilliant, original puzzle games. There's shape shifter, dizzy dice and picture puzzler to boggle your mind and blow your brain. Push and shoot the descending shapes in a race against time! Fantastic fun! "Put your brain & reflexes in to top gear for 3 original puzzle games!"
3. Go Dizzy Go! - Action Game It's Dizzy and Daisy to the rescue in this zany arcade challenge. Zaks' treacherous worlds are jam packed with all sorts of nasties. Power-Ups and Special secrets! Take up the challenge in single mode or two player mode. Classic maze style game with 5 worlds each containing 5 levels. Superb graphics, funky music and exciting gameplay! "Dash around weird and wonderful worlds to free the yolkfolk!"

¡Tres juegos completos protagonizados por la superestrella del juego Dizzy! ¡Disfruta de la emoción de un juego de acción arcade, un juego de acertijos y un completo juego de aventuras todo en un solo paquete! 1. Dizzy the Adventurer - Juego de aventuras. 2. Panic Dizzy - Puzzle Game. 3. ¡Ve a Dizzy Go! - Juego de acción.

Dizzy's Excellent Adventures sur Game Gear est une compilation de trois jeux de la gamme Dizzy. Au programme : Dizzy the Adventurer, Panic Dizzy and Go Dizzy Go!. Dans chacun d'eux, vous incarnez Dizzy, le célèbre oeuf dur.

locale.title: The Incredible Crash Dummies
locale.synopsis: It's a crashing, bashing good time guaranteed to break you up! Whether it's an avalanche of laughs on the ski slopes, the boulevard bounce after a stunt jump, or a burst of high pressure humour testing air bags, The Incredible Crash Dummies are a real crack-up! They may have a few screws loose . . . but The Incredible Crash Dummies will knock themselves out so you can have a good time!

¡Te vas a destornillar con este divertido juego de choque! Con avalanchas de risas en la pista de esquí, en el bulevar Rebotante después de un salto mortal o con el humor explosivo de las bolsas de aire comprimido. ¡The Incredible Crash Dummies es un juego loco y divertido! Puede que a los Dummies les falte algún tomillo ... pero The Incredible Crash Dummies no dudarán en hacerse pedazos para que te partas de risa.

Un jeu avec cascades et accidents garantis. Vous allez vous éclater! Une véritable avalanche de rires sur les pistes de ski, la chute sur le boulevard après le saut, une bouffée de bonne humeur pendant les tests des sacs à air comprimé. Vous vous éclaterez sans aucun doute avec The Incredible Crash Dummies! Ils sont peut-être un peu fous ... mais The Incredible Crash Dummies se mettront en quatre pour que vous vous amusiez bien.

Ein irrer Spaß voll umwerfender Crashs und Stürze! Ob Lachlawinen auf den Ski-Pisten, der waghalsige Sprung aufs Straßenpflaster nach einem Stunt oder die Humorausbrüche mit den hochexplosiven Luftsäcken - The Incredible Crash Dummies sind ein echter Knaller! Vielleicht sind bei den Typen ein paar Schrauben locker... aber The Incredible Crash Dummies holen sich selbst die Beulen, und du kannst es voll genießen!

Alô, moçada! Eu sou Slick e esse é meu amigo Spin. Nós somos dublês, caras que se matam nos filmes para fazer as cenas mais arriscadas, enquanto o mocinho leva toda a glória. Não é o trabalho mais bem pago do mundo, mas mesmo assim nós aceitamos qualquer tarefa onde o perigo é constante.nnnnVocê vai nos ajudar a sairmos vivos de cinco emocionantes tarefas. Eu disse ajudar... não vá fazer besteira! A primeira é a queda livre de um edifício. Já se imaginou olhando para baixo e tendo que pular? A segunda é testar pára-choques de ar: vai ser batida para tudo quanto é lado!nnnnTemos ainda que descer uma pista de esqui desviando de árvores e acertando alguns bonecos de neve. Depois vem o controle de qualidade de um produto. Simples? Trata-se de bombas! Se nós sobrevivermos, teremos ainda que guiar mísseis espaciais entre asteróides e mísseis inimigos.nnnnA gente vive rodeado pelo perigo e por isso sabe o quanto é importante a segurança. Usem sempre o cinto de segurança no carro e não se coloquem em situação de perigo. Bom, depois disso tudo, o mínimo que nós merecemos são longas e tranqüilas férias! Você conhece alguém que queira nos substituir?

locale.title: Crash Dummy: Slick Bouya no Daichousen
The Incredible Hulk
locale.synopsis: As The Incredible Hulk you must defeat The Leader's evil forces. Plans are afoot to produce a destructive biochemical army and The Leader has enlisted the assistance of your deadliest foes - Tyrannus, Absorbing Man, Abomination and Rhino in a quest for world domination! The Leader awaits you!

En el papel de The Incredible Hulk tendrás que derrotar a las malvadas fuerzas de The Leader. Se está organizando un destructivo ejército bioquímico y The Leader ha reclutado a tus más mortíferos enemigos: Tyrannus, Absorbing Man, Abomination y Rhino. ¡Es una empresa por la conquista del mundo! ¡The Leader te aguarda!

Dans le rôle de The Incredible Hulk, vous devez affronter et vaincre forces malefiques de The Leader. Des plans ont été élaborés pour produire une armée biochimique destructice, et The Leader s'est allié avec vous ennemis les plus redoutables: Tyrannus, Absorbing Man, Abomination, et Rhino! Tout cela pour dominer le monde! The Leader vous attend!

Eine neue neue Herausforderung für The Incredible Hulk. Man will ihn aus dem Weg räumen, bevoir die geplante invasion auf der Erde beginnt. Jetz geht's für Hulk um die Wurst! Tyrannus, Absorbing Man, Abomination, Rhino und The Leader freuen sich schon darauf, Hulk zum Frühstük zu verspeisen. Fünf spannede Level mit drei Schwierigkeitsstufen. Wohl bekomm's!

locale.title: The Itchy & Scratchy Game
locale.synopsis:
They fight! and fight! and fight, and fight, and fight!... Itchy & Scratchy, from The Simpsons, are a cat and mouse cartoon duo. Itchy the mouse and Scratchy the cat exist only to find new and creative ways to attack and kill one another. As the latest cartoon adventures appear on the television, the violence spreads to brand new places.
Itchy & Scratchy is a single player platform side-scroller. The player controls Itchy, the mouse, and must defeat Scratchy, the cat, with a variety of weapons. Itchy caries a default mallet, but can pick up additional weapons on particular levels. Each of the seven levels takes place in a different fictional location and is designed as a maze of doors and platforms. After defeating Scratchy, he usually will return with a special contraption to attack Itchy, and must therefore be defeated again.

Prepárate porque Itchy y Scratchy (Pica y Rasca, como los conocemos aquí) van a irrumpir en tu casa dando tajos, mies y golpes. Este gato va a necesitar más de siete vidas para sobrevivir a los bazucas, dinamita, rayos y lanzallamas. ¡Hay más de una manera de despellejar a un gato!

Ce jeu est basé sur les personnages Itchy et Scratchy, qui apparaissent dans la série Les Simpson.
Il y a 7 niveaux dans le jeu :
Juracid Bath (Monde Préhistorique) The Medieval Dead (Château Médiéval) Mutilation on the Bounty (Bateau de pirates) The Pusseidon Adventure (Sous la mer) The Magnificent Severed (Le vieil Ouest) A Site For Sawed Eyes (Site de construction) Disassembly Line (Usine)

Mach Dich bereit, denn Itchy & Scratchy hauen und kauen, knallern und ballern sich durch bis in Deine vier Wände! Diese Katze wird mehr als ihre neun Leben brauchen, wenn sie bazookas, dynamit, laserblaster und flammenwerfer überleben will! Es gibt die unterschiedlichsten Methoden, einer Katze das Fell über die Ohren zu ziehen!nnDA FALLEN DIR DIE AUGEN AUS DEM KOPF!nnWAS FÜR EIN GEMETZEL!nnSCHOCKIEREND!nnGESPALTENE PERSÖNLICHKEIT?!!!

locale.title: The Lost World : Jurassic Park
locale.synopsis: The Lost World: Jurassic Park developed by Aspect Co. and published by Sega, was also the final game released in North America and Europe for the Sega Game Gear, released in August 1997.

Experimenta toda la emocionante aventura de The Lost World, la secuela de Jurassic Park, uno de los libros más vendidos y las películas más taquilleras de todos los tiempos. ¿Creías que los dinosaurios están extintos? Bueno, piensa de nuevo. Han vuelto, ¡y están todos aquí!

Dans The Lost World: Jurassic Park, le ou les joueur(s) doivent rejoindre Ian et Sarah au laboratoire, afin de soigner un jeune dinosaure blessé. La route est longue et dangereuse, surtout quand on sait que les parents du dinosaure blessé veulent le récupérer à tout prix.

game.name: Lucky Dime Caper starring Donald Duck, The

locale.title: The Lucky Dime Caper starring Donald Duck
locale.synopsis:
The Lucky Dime Caper is a 2D platform game featuring Donald Duck in search of Uncle Scrooge's lucky dime, stolen by Magica De Spell.
The game is the 8-bit counterpart for Quack Shot (released only for Sega Genesis), which also features Donald Duck, but the story and gameplay are totally different.
Atraviesa tierras traicioneras junto a Donald Duck para salvar a sus sobrinos y recuperar las monedas de la suerte de manos de la maléfica Magica De Spell.

The Lucky Dime Caper starring Donnald Duck sur Game Gear vous propose d'incarner le canard facétieux à la recherche de Riri, Fifi et Loulou qui ont été enlevés. Vous traverserez la forêt canadienne, l'Amérique Centrale ou encore le Pôle Sud et l'Egypte dans ce jeu de plates-formes où les "continues" sont illimités.

A Maga Patalógica raptou Huguinho, Zezinho e Luizinho ! E só para piorar, ela também roubou a Moedinha número 1 do Tio Patinhas ! Junte-se ao Pato Donald nesta aventura, e prove que a Maga não é páreo para vocês.nnnnPercorra sete mundos repletos de magia e perigos, e depois invada o Castelo Assombrado da Maga para resgatar seus sobrinhos e recuperar a moedinha do Tio Patinhas.

locale.title: The Majors Pro Baseball
locale.synopsis: The Majors: Pro Baseball is a Sports game, developed and published by Sega, which was released in 1992.

Muévete a las Grandes Ligas. Estás en la carrera de Banderín con verdaderos jugadores de Grandes Ligas. todo el bateo y el campo según sus estadísticas reales. Sube al plato y enfrenta el calor de "The Rocket" Roger Clemens. Chase en Atlanta con Sheffield y McGriff martillando la pelota larga. Todas las Big Guns salen; Eckersley, Neon Deion, Glavine, Sandberg, Carter e incluso Big Barry Bonds. ¿Estás listo para el Show? Atrapa la fiebre, Pennant Fever!
The Majors Pro Baseball est un jeu de Baseball.

locale.title: The Ottifants
locale.synopsis:
Bruno is a baby Ottifant. It's an ordinary evening, and Bruno's dad is working late at office. Reason enough for Bruno's vivid imagination to run riot, thinking that his dad has been kidnapped by aliens! Jelly babies, that fell from his father's pocket on the way to work, blaze a trail to the office. Now it's up to Bruno to fight his way through hordes of terrorizing toys, Ottifant-eating plants, tear through gloomy caverns of doom and cut across a perilous jungle - workaday objects and boringly normal settings as seen through kids' eyes - and rescue his dad!
The Ottifants for the SEGA Game Gear is a 2D side-scrolling platformer where the player controls Bruno through five worlds: starting with the house and the basement, through to the building site, the office and finally the jungle, whereas each world is in turn divided into three stages. Bruno's primary weapon is his trunk, which gives him the ability to blast enemies by firing sweets at them, or suck in objects like out-of-reach platforms or boxes by holding down the Fire-button. Furthermore, yellow, green and red lollies are spread throughout the stages. Gathering three of them activate one of Bruno's special skills and can - depending on the colour combination - transform the baby Ottifant into Superfant with the ability to fly, boost his speed with Speedy Shoes, give an extra Continue and more.
Picking up jelly babies, blasting enemies and collecting papers gives points and raises Bruno's score up to a fixed value of 9,999 pts. There are several entrances to secret rooms hidden in the five worlds. But, unlike the Genesis-version, the rooms are quite small and basic and there is no 1,000 point reward by completing them. On the whole there are two different tunes backing your journey through the game: one for the stages and one for the boss enemies. The varied background music and sound effects of the Genesis-game are completely missing, as is one entire world: The Garden.
Un pequeño Otifant cree que su padre ha sido raptado. Una estela de dulces conduce desde juguetes espantosos hasta una oficina impresionante.

"The Ottifants", le jeu, est basé sur le dessin animé éponyme en 13 épisodes, diffusé sur RTL, en Allemagne en 1993. Celui-ci est lui-même tiré d'une bande dessinée créée, dans les années 70, par Otto Waalkes.
Bruno, le bébé Ottifant, est très ennuyé. Son père a été kidnappé par des étrangers ! Du moins c'est ce qu'il pense, en suivant la trace des bonbons tombés de la serviette de son père, sur le chemin du bureau (au passage, sachez qu'un niveau se déroule à la cave?). Avant qu'il ne termine sa mission de sauvetage, il devra braver une armée mutante de jouets, de machines et de plantes ? des monstres aux yeux du bébé Otti
Ein Baby Ottifant befürchtet, daß son Vater entführt wurde. Die Sußigkeiten Spur führt über furchterregende Spielsachen zu einem geradezu überwaltigenden Büro.

locale.title: The Pro Yakyuu '91
locale.synopsis: The Pro Yakyuu '91 is a Sports game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1991.
El inicio de una de las mejores sagas de béisbol de la liga japonesa comienza con este juegazo para tu Game Gear.
The Pro Yakyuu '91 est un jeu de Baseball sur Game Gear. Entièrement en Japonais, le jeu vous propose d'incarner une équipe de Baseball dans différents modes de jeu.
O Pro Yakyuu '91 é um jogo de esportes, publicado pela Sega, lançado no Japão em 1991.

locale.title: The Quiz Gear Fight!!
locale.synopsis: The Quiz Gear Fight!! is a Quizz game, developed by Minato Giken and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1995.
Juego concurso de preguntas para tu Game Gear. Disfruta y aprende contestando las preguntas que te ofrece este gran juego, eso sí en japones.
The Quiz Gear Fight!! est un jeu de Quizz

game.name: Simpsons - Bart vs the Space Mutants, The

locale.title: The Simpsons : Bart vs the Space Mutants
locale.synopsis:
Bart vs. The Space Mutants is a platform game where the player goes into the role of Bart Simpson (from the TV show The Simpsons) and must stop the Space Mutants from invading Springfield.
On each of the five levels, Bart must collect (or get rid of) the ingredients that the Space Mutants are planning to use to build their machine, such as purple objects or balloons.
