He also has to collect enough "proof" of the aliens existence (brown coins left behind when they are jumped on), so his family members will help him when he meets a boss (characters such as Nelson and Sideshow Bob). This won't be easy since the Space Mutants are "using" human bodies as disguise. In order to discover who are the real Space Mutants, Bart must use his X-ray Specs.
The ways Bart can get rid of those objects sought by the Space Mutants are numerous. For instance, in the first stage, Bart must get rid of purple objects. He can dye them red, cover them, wash them, etc. Some even involve a little puzzle solving, like playing a trick on Moe to make him get out of the bar.
Bart also has some coins that can be used in many ways throughout the game, like buying things, getting devices operating, etc. Those coins are essential to solve some puzzles in the game.

¡Hola, amigos humanos! Aquí Bartolomeo J. Simpson, con un secreto muy importante: ¿LOS MUTANTES DEL ESPACIO ESTÁN INVADIENDO SPRINGFIELD! Un grupo de delgados y putrefactos monstruos está invadiendo los cuerpos de la gente y quieren construir un arma que va a esclavizar al planeta entero. De todos modos este servidor es el único que los puede ver, gracias a mis gafas de rayos-X, así que es mi misión pararlos. ¡Salvar la Tierra! Comprar este juego. Gracias tío.

The Simpsons : Bart vs the Space Mutants sur Game Gear est un jeu de plates-formes dans lequel vous incarnez Bart Simpson qui part en croisade contre les mutants envahisseurs venus de l'espace. Pour faire la part des choses entre les mutants et les simples autochtones, Bart utilise des lunettes à Rayons X. Sauvez Springfield et enrayez la conspiration visant à détruire la ville avec une arme secrète.

Hallo, Mitmenschen' Her ist Bartholomew J. Simpson mit einem wichtigen Geheimnis: MUTATIONSWESEN AUS DEM WELTRAUM SIND IN SPRINGFIELD EINGEFALLEN! Én Hauten schteimger. stmkender Monster ergreift von den Körpern der Menschen Balte Se wonen eine Waffe bauen, mit der se den ganzen Planeten erobern können. Tja. Louto. und ich Un der einzige, der se sehen kann, wed ich mone Rontgenbnlle aufhabe ? also muß ich se stoppen' De Erde retten' KAUFT DIESES SPIEL' Danke. Leute.

Olá, simples mortal! Aqui fala Bart Simpson. Espero que não esteja ninguém por perto a ouvir-nos, porque tenho um importante segredo para revelar: mutantes do espaço estão a invadir Springfield! Como? Senta-te para não caíres: eles estão a apoderar-se de corpos humanos! E este sortudo que te fala é o único que pode vê-los, graças aos meus poderosos óculos Raio-X!nnnnComo já deves ter percebido, a minha missão é detê-los. Mas como não tenho uma boa reputação (não sei porquê!), preciso de comprovar o que estou a dizer. A única forma de o fazer é pegar em vários items nos mais diferentes lugares de Springfield: pelas ruas, no Shopping, no parque, no Museu de História Natural e ufa! -numa central nuclear!nnnnEu vou precisar de reflexos rápidos para ter êxito. Felizmente poderei contar com vários objectos (muito estranhos) como: latas de spray, pistola de dardos, fisgas... Mas acho que isto não vai ser suficiente, pois preciso de alguém inteligente e brilhante que me ajude a usá-los!nnConto com a tua ajuda!nnOh meu, precisamos salvar a terra.

game.name: Simpsons - Bart vs the World, The

locale.title: The Simpsons : Bart vs the World
locale.synopsis: This game is actually a compilation of smaller games belonging to different genres. Krusty the clown appears in the beginning of the game and presents a menu with five games to play (one of which is not available from the start): A jump-and-run game, where Bart must find an exit on a ship, while enemies fire at him and try to prevent him from reaching the exit; a card game, where you have five tries to find hidden cards on a board; a simple jigsaw puzzle; a series of trivia questions concerning the Simpsons; and finally, a platform-skateboard game (available only after you have completed the ship level). Needless to say all games are connected to the famous TV series "The Simpsons".

¡Eh! Te propongo un trato. Yo gané el concurso artístico del Payaso Krusty por eso mi familia y yo recorrimos a bordo de esta búsqueda super güay del tesoro universal China, Egipto, el Polo Norte y Hollywood. Pero necesito tu ayuda para recoger caras y productos Krusty si quiero llegar a mi último destino: ¡considérate invitado al Show de Rasca y Pica!nn¿Alguna pregunta? Bueno, pues me largo.nnTu amigo,nnBart Simpson.

The Simpsons : Bart vs the World sur Game Gear, est une compilation de mini-jeux où vous incarnez le turbulent Bart Simpson. Vous avez le choix entre cinq jeux, dont un est à débloquer. Dans l'un d'entre eux, qui s'apparente à un jeu de plates-formes, vous devrez aider Bart à s'échapper d'un bateau. Il y a également un jeu de cartes, un puzzle, un questionnaire sur les Simpsons, et enfin, un jeu dans lequel vous ferez du skateboard sur la Muraille de Chine.

Hallo, Leute! Es geht um folgendes: Ich haö' beim Malwettbewerb von Krusty dem Clown gewonnen, also bin ich mit meiner ganzen Familie zu dieser echt coolen Schatzsuche durch die ganze Welt unterwegs: nach China, Ägypten, zum Nordpol und nach Hollywood. Und Ihr müßt mir helfen, Krusty-Gesichter und Krusty-Gegenstände zu finden, damit ich mein großes Ziel erreichen kann: als Gast bei der Itchy & Scratchy-Show aufzutreten!nnNoch Fragen? Gut. Ich mach' mich auf die Socken.nnEuer Freund.nnBart Simpson.

Parece impossível, mas Bart ganhou um prêmio num concurso de arte! Nosso culto amiguinho vai levar toda a família para uma caça ao tesouro ao redor do mundo. Na verdade, tudo não passa de uma armação do Sr. Montgomery Burns que perdeu milhões desde que Hommer foi contratado para sua usina nuclear.nnnnBurns está gastando uma fortuna com essa viagem só para eliminar esta família da face da Terra. Para isso ele conta com vários parentes importantes no mundo todo.nnnnTudo começa na China, onde a Grande Muralha deixa de ser uma das maravilhas do mundo e passa a ser uma pista de skate. Depois vem o Pólo Norte - aqui Bart irá enfrentar uma criatura metade-homem, metade-monstro, metade-Burns. 3 metades??? É, deixa o coitado ser como quiser!nnnnNo Egito, Bart irá passar pelo Vale dos Reis e pela Esfìnge até enfrentar o faraó Ramsés Burns. A última fase é em Hollywood, onde o temido diretor de filmes, Eric von Burns, fará de tudo para acabar com os Simpsons. Burns pensa que não deve ser muito difícil eliminar uma família tão patética. Prove que ele está redondamente enganado!

game.name: Simpsons - Bartman Meets Radioactive Man, The

locale.title: The Simpsons: Bartman Meets Radioactive Man
locale.synopsis:
LISTEN UP, CRIME FIGHTERS!
The greatest comic book hero of all time, Radioactive Man, has been kidnapped...and it's up to yours truly to save the R-Man.
I'll put all my awesome super-powers to the best when I battle the slimy Swamp Hag, the evil Dr. Crab and the bad-tempered Lava Man. Once I wipe these villains out and restore Radioactive Man's powers, we'll take on the brains behind this ugly scheme, Brain-O The Magnificent.
So quit reading and buy this game OR ELSE. That's an order from Bartman, man!!!
-THIS LOOKS LIKE A JOB...FOR BARTMAN! -WILL A BLAST OF COLD BREATH PUT THE FREEZE ON SWAMP HAG? -THE TERRORS OF THE DEEP ARE NO MATCH FOR THE MIGHTY BARTMAN! -DANGER LURKS EVERYWHERE IN THE JUNKYARD! -IT'S FIST AGAINST CLAW IN THE EVIL DR. CRAB'S LAIR!

El héroe más grande de cómics de todos los tiempos, Radioactive Man, ha sido secuestrado ... y le toca a usted salvar al R-Man.
Pondré a todos mis increíbles superpoderes al mejor nivel cuando pelee contra Swamp Hag, el malvado Dr. Crab y el malvado Lava Man. Una vez que elimine a estos villanos y restaure los poderes del Hombre Radiactivo, asumiremos los cerebros detrás de este feo esquema, Brain-O The Magnificent.
Así que deja de leer y compra este juego O BIEN. Esa es una orden de Bartman, hombre!
-THIS PARECE UN TRABAJO ... ¡PARA BARTMAN! ¿QUIZÁ UNA GRAN VENTILACIÓN DE FRÍO PONGA LA CONGELACIÓN EN SWAMP HAG? -¡LOS TERRORES DEL PROFUNDO NO SON PARTIDOS PARA EL PODEROSO BARTMAN! -¡DISPACADORES LUCES POR TODAS PARTES EN EL JUNKYARD! -FUERTE CONTRA LA GARGANTA EN EL MAL DR. CRAB'S LAIR!

Un soir, dans sa cabane. Bart s'aperçoit que Radioactive Man n'apparaît pas dans sa propre BD. C'est alors que surgit Fallout boy qui lui explique que Radioactive man est coincé dans une dimension parallèle créée par Brain-o et ses compères. Bartman devient leur dernier espoir.

locale.title: The Terminator
locale.synopsis:
The Terminator licensed game for the Sega consoles was a fairly standard side-scrolling platform game. However, the game's six levels mirror the story-line of The Terminator movie very closely as you take on the role of Kyle Reese and his quest to save Sarah Connor from termination.
Because the game follows the movie so closely, the first mission which involves blowing up the SkyNet computer and escaping through time is one of the hardest and something that most players remember with love/hate.

Kyle Reese, guerrero solitario del futuro, regresa al pasado para proteger a la única mujer cuya existencia resulta clave para la supervivencia de la raza humana. Juntos deberán enfrentar no sólo todas las sorpresas que les depara la ciudad de Los Ángeles, sino también los aterradores poderes de un ente cibernético conocido con el nombre de Terminator, quien no se detendrá ante nada hasta lograr matarlos.

The Terminator sur Game Gear est un jeu de plates-formes respectant fidèlement la trame du film du même nom. Vous incarnez Kyle Reese et devez sauver Sarah Connor du robot exterminateur. Chacun des six niveaux retrace l'une des scènes les plus mémorables du film, en commençant par le combat contre l'ordinateur Skynet.

Kyle Reese, ein einsamer Krieger aus der Zukunft, kehrt in die Vergangenheit zurück, um die Frau zu beschützen, die als einzige den Schlüssel zum Überleben der menschlichen Rasse besitzt. Gemeinsam sehen sie sich nicht nur den Gefahren der Stadt Los Angeles gegenüber, sondern auch der furchtbaren Macht eines Cyborg, der als der Terminator bekannt ist... und den nichts daran hindern kann, sie beide zu töten.

locale.title: Tintin au Tibet
locale.synopsis: A platform game starring Tin Tin. Tintin in Tibet follows on the heel of Infograme's Asterix & Obelix, with the same gameplay. Although the game will prove easy for the expert gamer, there are many levels to pass, each of which features new locations, enemies, and obstacles that serve to advance the storyline.

¡Parte con Tintín en busca de su amigo Tchang desaparecido en un terrible accidente de avión en pleno Himalaya! Te esperan numerosos peligros en Katmandú. en la cueva del Yeti, etc. Comunica con todos los personajes y ultiliza los objetos para progresar. ¿Llegarás a tiempo para salvar a Tchang?

locale.title: Tintin au Tibet
locale.synopsis: Tintin au Tibet sur Game Gear vous met dans la peau du plus célèbre reporter dans une histoire identique à celle de la BD. Alors qu'il est en vacances, Tintin apprend que son ami Tchang vient lui rendre visite mais l'avion avec lequel il doit partir s'écrase. En partant à sa recherche, Tintin se trouve embarqué dans une grande aventure. Ce jeu de plates-formes ne dispose d'aucun bouton d'attaque et se base uniquement sur de vos capacités de saut et d'esquive.

locale.title: Tom and Jerry : The Movie
locale.synopsis: Tom & Jerry: The Movie is a Tom & Jerry game that's pretty much just Tom chasing Jerry while negotiating a bunch of ridiculously-placed platforms.
Tom necesita 9 vidas para agarrar al furtivo ratón. En 5 niveles superrápidos más uno adicional tendrá a esa alegre pareja persiguiéndose por toda la ciudad.

Tom & Jerry : The Movie est un jeu de plates-formes sur Game Gear. Vous y incarnez Jerry qui tente encore une fois d'éviter de se faire croquer par Tom. Vous allez devoir éviter tous les pièges tendus par ce dernier si vous voulez rester en vie.
Tom braucht alle 9 Leben, um die schlaue Maus zu fangen! In 5 superschnellen Spielstufen und einer Bonusstufe jagen die beiden kreuz und quer durch die Stadt!

locale.title: Torarete Tamaruka
locale.synopsis: Torarete Tamaruka!? is an Action game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1994.
Disfruta de este grandísimo juego basado en la película nipona Torarete Tamaruka, y completamente en japonés.
Torarete Tamaruka?! est un jeu d'action tiré du film japonais éponyme.

locale.title: True Lies
locale.synopsis: Take charge of gun toting Arnie in this top down omni-scrolling action shooter. Arnie takes on the terrorists using a variety of weapons in all the locations from the movie of the same name. In each location you have a mission such as retrieve data or capture a terrorist.This usually involves searching around for your goal while dispatching enemies and trying to minimise civilian casualties. The emphasis is on action and weapons, in particular Arnold's favourites: flame thrower and the uzi. He also has a diving roll to help him dodge the enemies bullets and come back guns blazing..

No es que vaya a salvar el mundo ni nada parecido. ¡Sí, sí lo es! ¡Como el agente especial Harry Tasker, tienes que impedir un holocausto nuclear y detener a Crimson Jihad! ¡Experimenta la explosiva aventura de TRUE LIES (Mentiras Arriesgadas) que incluye misiones secretas nunca vistas! ¡Con toda la acción del éxito cinematográfico y nada de su romanticismo!

True Lies sur Game Gear, est l'adaptation du film de James Cameron sorti en 1994. Vous incarnez l'agent Harry Tasker qui doit éliminer les ennemis se trouvant sur sa route. Vous disposez pour cela de diverses armes telles que uzi, lance-flammes et autres grenades. Dans certaines phases de jeu, il vous faudra prendre garde à ne pas blesser les civils, sous peine de voir la mission se solder par un échec.

locale.title: Ultimate Soccer
locale.synopsis:
Ultimate Soccer is a football (European) game composed by 64 (unlicensed) international teams, each with it's own values for running, ball control and strength. There are five game modes (friendly, penalty shootout, tournament, playoff and league), but the lack of password or built-in battery means each one of them must be completed in one sitting.
The gameplay can be tweaked for the players' preference by changing several key aspects of the physics engine, such as wind strength and direction, ball weight (lighter balls travel higher, faster and farther but are more prone to be deflected by winds than heavy balls, who barely lift of the ground and are slowed down by wet grass), tightness of ball control and players speed and momentum. A five-a-side mode, where the ball is never out of play is also included. Thanks to the many options regarding the physics, the game allows a lot of flexibility in playmaking, from building up the play with small passes from the midfield to belting the ball upwards in hope of a goalmouth deflection.
Graphically, the game is similar to EA's Madden NFL series, with pseudo-3D effects allowing the view to be tilted up to show more detail up front or tilted down to show more of the field.
The series later continued with Striker on the same console and Striker' 96 on PC, Saturn and PlayStation.
Tiros y patadas espectaculares, pases maestros y combinaciones denomenales. ¿Posees la maestría necesaria para llegar a ser un gran campeón del fútbol?

Ultimate Soccer est un jeu de football sur Game Gear. Le soft vous propose de choisir une formation au sein de nombreuses équipes internationales fantaisistes. Cinq modes de jeu sont disponibles : Match Amical, Penalty, Tournois, Exhibition et Ligue.

locale.title: Urban Strike
locale.synopsis:
Urban Strike is the third in EA's long running series of helicopter action games. An evil genius named H. R. Malone has started a cult and managed to gather millions of followers. Malone is using his influence and wealth to build a super weapon with which he will overthrow the government. You will once again suit up and take control of various types of helicopters to stop Malone's evil scheme.
Urban Strike is the first, and only, game in the Strike series to feature non-vehicular combat. In some levels you will leave your helicopter and proceed on foot.

Salva las urbes e los EE.UU. de su total destrucción en 10 espectaculares misiones compuestas de múltiples etapas.nnBaja del helicóptero y ponte a luchar a pie.nnNuevos helicópteros y vehículos de asalto en tierra.nnNuevas pruebas contrarreloj, premios y paneles de mando interactivos.

Urban Strike sur Game Gear place le joueur aux commandes d'un hélicoptère Comanche armé jusqu'aux dents. Par rapport à ses prédécesseurs, cet épisode apporte la nouveauté des phases de jeu à pied. Votre mission sera de localiser un baron de la drogue, après lequel courent les services secrets américains.

locale.title: Vampire : Master of Darkness
locale.synopsis:
Master of Darkness is a Platformer very similar to Castlevania.
You play as a psychologist trying to defeat Dracula. This requires you to fight your way through several spooky locations such as cemeteries, laboratories, castles or a house of wax dolls. To defeat your enemies, you can use several primary and secondary weapons. Primary weapons are close combat weapons ranging from knifes to rapiers and axes, that differ in range and efficiency. Secondary weapons are long-range weapons (pistols, bombs etc.) with limited ammunition. The game features 5 Rounds divided into 3 stages. At the end of each stage, a boss must be defeated.
Deberás encontrar a Drácula, el señor de la oscuridad, y vencerlo antes de que toda Inglaterra quede bajo su aterrador poder.

Dans Master of Darkness sur Game Gear, vous incarnez un psychologue qui tente d'éliminer Dracula et vous devrez donc progresser dans des endroits sombres et lugubres. Votre héros dispose d'armes blanches mais aussi d'armes à feu pour affronter les boss et parvenir à retrouver le comte sanguinaire.

locale.title: Virtua Fighter Animation
locale.synopsis:
Virtua Fighter Animation is an one-on-one 2D fighting game based on the Virtua Fighter anime series. It has two game modes: story and versus.
In the story mode, the player follows the anime's plot, with anime style cutscenes before and after each fight. The story is divided in acts, each one of them corresponding to one fight. The player starts controlling Akira Yuki, as as he beats his opponents, each one of them joins his party, so they can be chosen in the next fights. Besides Akira, the other characters which become available are Pai Chan, Jacky Bryant, Wolf Hawkfield, Kage-Maru, Sarah Bryant and Lau Chan. In the final act, the player must fight against Dural.
The versus mode allows players to choose any of the seven available characters to fight against the CPU. In the two player versus game, Kage-Maru is removed from the character selection.
The Game Gear version has 3 different viewing modes: Normal, Large and Real-Time. The Normal viewing mode shows the fighters from a more distant position (smaller sprites) than the Large mode (larger sprites). The Real-Time mode simulates the zooming camera effects from the other Virtua Fighter games, alternating between the Normal and Large modes. It also has an extended intro sequence, with anime style cutscenes.
In regards to gameplay, the game doesn't differ much from any other 2D fighting game, as the player can perform punches (button 1), kicks (button 2) and jumps (up), as well as some special maneuvers. The Game Gear version has also a block function (START button), absent in the Master System version. The fights are regular best of 3 round matches, and players will loose a round if one of this three possibilities happen: their energy is depleted, they fall out of the ring or they have less energy than the opponent if the time runs out.

Virtua Fighter Animation es un juego de lucha 2D en persona basado en la serie de anime Virtua Fighter. Tiene dos modos de juego: historia y versus.
En el modo historia, el jugador sigue la trama del anime, con escenas de estilo anime antes y después de cada pelea. La historia está dividida en actos, cada uno de ellos corresponde a una pelea. El jugador comienza a controlar a Akira Yuki, mientras golpea a sus oponentes, cada uno de ellos se une a su grupo, para que puedan ser elegidos en las siguientes peleas. Además de Akira, los otros personajes que están disponibles son Pai Chan, Jacky Bryant, Wolf Hawkfield, Kage-Maru, Sarah Bryant y Lau Chan. En el acto final, el jugador debe luchar contra Dural.
El modo versus permite a los jugadores elegir cualquiera de los siete personajes disponibles para luchar contra la CPU. En los dos jugadores contra el juego, Kage-Maru se elimina de la selección de personajes.
La versión de Game Gear tiene 3 modos de visualización diferentes: Normal, Grande y Tiempo real. El modo de visualización Normal muestra los luchadores desde una posición más distante (sprites más pequeños) que el modo Grande (sprites más grandes). El modo en tiempo real simula los efectos de la cámara de zoom de los otros juegos Virtua Fighter, alternando entre los modos Normal y Grande. También tiene una secuencia de introducción extendida, con escenas de estilo anime.
En cuanto a la jugabilidad, el juego no difiere mucho de cualquier otro juego de lucha 2D, ya que el jugador puede realizar golpes (botón 1), patadas (botón 2) y saltos (arriba), así como algunas maniobras especiales. La versión de Game Gear también tiene una función de bloqueo (botón START), ausente en la versión del Sistema Maestro. Las peleas son las mejores de 3 partidas regulares, y los jugadores perderán una ronda si se produce una de estas tres posibilidades: su energía se agota, se caen del ring o tienen menos energía que el oponente si se acaba el tiempo.

Virtua Fighter Animation sur Game Gear, est un jeu de combat en 2D, basé sur l'animé Virtua Fighter. Le jeu propose un mode Story où les combats suivent l'ordre chronologique d'apparition des personnages de l'animé. L'adversaire vaincu est aussitôt jouable pour le prochain combat. Le mode versus vous permet d'affronter un adversaire géré par l'intelligence artificielle de la machine, ou bien d'affronter un ami en connectant deux Game Gear.

locale.title: Wagan Land
locale.synopsis:
Wagyan Land was only released in Japan, and is a slightly enhanced port of a 1989 Famicom game of the same name and was released as part of the Wagyan Land series.
Wagyan Land is a semi-educational title, comprised of both platforming segments and minigames such as shiritori (which is seen as the main reason no games in the series have seen western releases). The Game Gear port features redesigned levels to accommodate the smaller screen, a slightly altered plot and some powerups from Wagyan Land 2.

El científico loco Dr. Devil está tratando de hacerse cargo de Wagan Land, y Wagan quiere proteger su hogar. Hay potenciadores llamados Waganizers, que hacen que las ondas de sonido de Wagan sean más poderosas, aturdendo a los enemigos durante un período de tiempo más largo.

Wagyan Land est un jeu sortie uniquement au japon et qui est un portage légèrement amélioré d'un jeu sortie en 1989 sur NES.
Il s'agit d'un jeu semi-éducatif composé de mini-jeu et de jeu de plateforme.
La version Game Gear comprend des niveaux redessinés pour les écrans de petites taille, une histoire légèrement différente à la version NES et des powers ups provenant de Wagyan Land 2.

locale.title: Wheel of Fortune: Featuring Vanna White
locale.synopsis:
Wheel of Fortune: featuring Vanna White is one of a series games based on the famous TV game show. The goal is to solve a word puzzle by guessing letters. The players take turns spinning a wheel that has designated money amounts in most spaces, but can also bankrupt the player in the wheel lands on the wrong space. A player can guess a letter and if that letter is in the puzzle, those spaces are flipped to reveal the letter and the player earns the cash amount specified by the wheel spin, multiplied by the number of occurrences of the letter. Only English consonants can be guessed-- the 5 English vowels can be purchased using a player's earnings.
This NES edition of the game allows 1, 2, or 3 human players to play against each other. Human players can also elect to play against computer players and at 3 difficulty levels.
The Vanna White Edition differs from previous Wheel of Fortune games on the NES in that it actually bears the likeness of Vanna White. Also, there are avatars for the player contestants, and the wheel animation is different.

El juego de juegos favorito de Estados Unidos ahora es más grande y mejor que nunca en el Sega Game Gear. Esta nueva versión presenta la hermosa Vanna White y más de 4.500 nuevos acertijos. Elija el concursante que desea ser, juegue contra la computadora o contra hasta dos amigos. Gira la rueda, compra una vocal o intenta resolver el rompecabezas. Solo Vanna White sabe qué hay detrás de las fichas. Ver tu programa de juegos favorito es divertido, pero GAMETEK'S WHEEL OF FORTUNE te sitúa justo en el escenario.

Wheel of Fortune sur Game Gear n'est ni plus ni moins que l'adaptation de la célèbre émission télévisée "La Roue de la Fortune". Le but du jeu est donc de deviner, lettre après lettre, la phrase ou le mot mystère. Plusieurs types d'éléments sont à deviner : phrase, personne, titre, etc. Vous pouvez jouer contre deux autres joueurs, ordinateurs ou humains. Cette édition se distingue par l'intégration de Vanna White, l'hôtesse qui tourne les lettres.

locale.title: Wild Snake
locale.synopsis:
WildSnake is a puzzle game released for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System and Game Boy in 1994.
Both Sega Mega Drive and Sega Game Gear versions of WildSnake were advertised for release, but both were cancelled for unknown reasons. Pototypes of both have since surfaced.
Advertising saw Tetris creator Alexey Pajitnov lend his name to the game, however Pajitnov was not involved in its development.

Evita que el nido mortal de las serpientes se desate en WILDSNAKE, la alocada aventura de acertijos llena de reptiles listos para morder. A medida que las serpientes letales caen desde la parte superior, maniobras a las víboras venenosas para que se toquen y traguen entre sí. Pero si dejas que esas serpientes sigilosas tomen el control... ¡CORRE!

Seules les consoles Nintendo ont eu droit à WildSnake en 1994, et pas en Europe. Surfant clairement sur la popularité de Tetris, ce jeu de réflexion allait jusqu'à mettre en vedette Aleksei Pajitnov, alors qu'on doit son concept, similaire il est vrai, à Aleksei Lysogorov et Eugene Sotnikov. Celui-ci consiste à guider des serpents de taille différente jusqu'en bas de l'écran pour former des lignes. Ils présentent donc l'avantage d'être flexibles contrairement aux tetraminos, mais les diriger demande davantage de maîtrise.

locale.title: Wimbledon
locale.synopsis: The oldest of the four Grand Slam tournaments, held in London on grass every July, is the basis for this tennis game. The ball comes off the grass surface fast and low, reflecting the surface's reputation for providing the most exciting tennis. It's viewed in the typical third person perspective, although with quite a distinct 3D effect and with shadows. You can play standard 1 or 2 player matches, or play the full tournament from the quarter-final stages onwards. You can play standard shots as well as lobs and drop shots, and full service rules are featured. You can select your character and build up their skills as the game progresses.
Increíbles Smashes, violentos saques, passing shots, un modo de práctica y cuatro prestigiosos campeonatos. ¡Este juego lo tiene todo!

Disputez le plus vieux des quatre tournois du Grand Chelem dans Wimbledon sur Game Gear. Vous avez la possibilité de jouer en simple et en double, pour un match uniquement, ou bien pour le tournoi complet. Dans ce dernier mode, vous disposez d'un capital de points à distribuer entre quatre capacités, vous permettant de personnaliser à votre guise le joueur fictif que vous incarnez.

locale.title: Winter Olympic Games
locale.synopsis:
This is the official license of Winter Olympics tournament in 1994 at Lillehammer, Norway. You can practice in any event before the tournament. The game offers two modes - Full Olympics and Mini Olympics, which vary in the number of events.
It includes 5 different types of sports - biathlon, alpine skiing (downhill, slalom, giant slalom and Super-G), ski jumping (90 m, 120 m), bobsleigh (2/4 men bob, 1/2 men luge) and skating (elimination, pursuit, time trial). The events use 3D views

WINTER OLYMPICS te ofrece la máxima experiencia en simulación de deportes. Correrás contra los mejores del mundo ... y el reloj ... luchando para ganar la MEDALLA DE ORO en un certamen en el que harás frente a 10 ACONTECIMIENTOS ESPECTACULARES en los que someterás a prueba tu velocidad, fuerza, destreza y resistencia, hasta el límite. Es tu oportunidad de ganar la MEDALLA DE ORO en el ESPECTÁCULO DE DEPORTES DE INVIERNO MAS MAGNIFICO DEL MUNDO.

Winter Olympics : Lillehammer '94 sur Game Gear est le jeu officiel des Jeux Olympiques d'hiver qui se sont déroulés en Norvège en 1994. Vous pouvez participer au biathlon, slalom, super G, ski de bosses, saut à ski, bobsleigh à deux et à quatre, luge ainsi qu'au patinage en ligne. Le jeu utilise la 3D pour certaines disciplines.

WINTER OLYMPICS die ultimative Simulation der spannendsten Wintersport-Disziplinen! Treten Sie gegen die Besten der Welt an ... und gegen die Zeit! Gewinnen Sie GOLD in 10 spektakulären Disziplinen, die Ihre volle Leistungsfähigkeit, Schnelligkeit, Ausdauer und Konzentration fordern. Sie sind dabei! Sie haben die Chance, im weltgrößten Wintersport-Ereignis GOLD zu gewinnen!

locale.title: The XVII Olympic Winter Games - Lillehammer 1994
Wizard Pinball
locale.synopsis: Wizard Pinball is a pinball game that offers one table with a fantasy theme, featuring wizards, dragons, ghosts and skeletons. Two players can play taking turns, each starting with five balls. The table features various secrets and bonuses, including several hidden extra levels and a multi-ball feature. A high score list is available, but there is no way to save it upon turning off.

¿Te atreves a enfrentarte al malvado mago? ¿Tienes el poder necesario para luchar contra él y derrocarlo? Prepárate para luchar contra el personaje más siniestro que haya visto tu Game Gear. El mago tiene el control de tu mesa de pinball y sólo con reflejos de relámpago y una determinación de acero conseguirás la victoria.
Wizard Pinball est un jeu de flipper offrant une table unique sur un theme fantasy avec de nombreux niveau bonus et toutes les options d'un flipper classique comme le multi-ball

locale.title: Wolfchild
locale.synopsis:
Dr. Kal Morrow, expert in genetic research and creation of human-animal hybrids, has been kidnapped and his family brutally murdered by the terrorist organization CHIMERA. His surviving son Saul takes it upon himself to avenge his family. Using his father's research, he turns into a man-wolf and sets out to find CHIMERA's base and defeat their leader Karl Draxx.
As Saul, it is your job to traverse five different areas on your way to Draxx. When Saul collects enough power-ups, he turns into his wolf form and gains a special psychic shot attack, which can be improved by collecting futher power-ups. However, if Saul loses health, he turns back into his human form and only has his fists to fight the numerous enemies.

Los terroristas de Chimera han secuestrado al padre de Saul Morrow y han asesinado a su madre y hermano. ¿Será suficiente su capacidad metamórfica para liberar a su padre? ¿Bastarán los poderes psíquicos de un hombre-lobo para derrotar a un ejército?

Wolfchild est un jeu d'action/plates-formes sur Game Gear qui vous met dans la peau de Saul Morrow, à la recherche de son père, un expert en génétique récemment enlevé. En exploitant les recherches de ce dernier, vous pouvez vous transformer en loup-garou à condition d'avoir trouvé suffisamment de capsules d'énergie dans le niveau. Cette transformation vous confère des pouvoirs spéciaux.

Chimara-Terroristen haben Saul Morrows Vater entführt und seine Mutter und seinen Bruder getötet. Kann er mit Hilfe seiner Fähigkeit, sich in einen werwolfähnlichen Krieger zu verwandeln - einen Wolfsmenschen mit übernatürlichen Kräften - eine gesamte Armee besiegen?

locale.title: Wonder Boy: The Dragon's Trap
locale.synopsis:
Wonder Boy III: The Dragon's Trap is a direct sequel to Wonder Boy in Monster Land. When Tom-Tom defeats the MEKA dragon, the wounded beast casts a spell on him, turning him into a Lizard-Man. To regain your original human form, you have to find the Salamander Cross, hidden by the Vampire Dragon in Monster Land.
In this side-scrolling platform game, you can still buy equipment and items, but unlike its predecessor, it is not divided in sequences of levels. You are allowed to go anywhere, as long as you have the right shape or equipment. During his quest, Tom-Tom has to defeat various dragon bosses. Each win will give you a new shape with new abilities such as flying, swimming, walking on ceilings or clinging to walls, which also give you to access new parts of the world. The possible shapes are Lizard-Man, Mouse-Man, Piranha-Man, Lion-Man and Hawk-Man and the main abilities are defined by attacking power, defense points and charm points (needed for equipment by collecting charm stones). Also, certain blocks can only be destroyed by specific weapons or are only accessible to certain shapes.
The basic actions consist of attacking and jumping, and in the status screen you can equip swords, shields and armour. Special attacks include fire balls, tornadoes, arrows, boomerangs and thunder strikes. Along the way, you collect keys (only one at all times) and gold left behind by defeated creatures, and you often have to revisit places to access new areas. A password is given at the beginning of each town to continue from there.
¡La maldición de un dragón puede ser peligrosa para tu humanidad! Únete a Wonder Boy y ayúdale a poner término a esta maldición y recuperar su forma humana.

Wonder Boy III : The Dragon's Trap sur Game Gear vous place dans la peau de Wonder Boy, victime d'une malédiction l'ayant transformé en dragon. Vous devez retrouver la Salamander Cross pour inverser le sort. Vous prenez la forme de diverses créatures tout au long du jeu, et avez la possibilité d'acheter de quoi améliorer votre équipement.

locale.title: Monster World II : Dragon no Wana
Woody Pop
locale.synopsis:
Every system must have a Breakout clone, and every self-respecting developer must have one, especially in the mid-eighties, following the success of Taito's Arkanoid. Sega's answer was called Woody Pop.
With a wooden paddle, which in fact is Woody the tree spirit, you bounce your ball against bricks laid out in a big house filled with toys. The toys will come out to disturb you. When you hit "mystery bricks", wind-up toy soldiers or robots come out, obstructing your ball. On some levels, a toy train will cross your path as well. Speaking of wells, the bottom of the screen is not a big black hole as in most other games of this kind  instead the whole covers only a part of the wall, so that even if you miss the ball, it might bounce back in the corners.
Once a room is cleared, you can choose freely between up to three adjacent rooms to progress to, making this game less linear than usual.
Like any post-Arkanoid game, there is a range of powerups released from special blocks. Most are known from other games such as the double-ball, the growing bat or the "diamond ball", which destroys all blocks in its path without ricocheting. Some invented by Sega are the fire ball, which sets blocks on fire, allowing them to destroy even neighbouring blocks, and the big ball, which hits bricks with more power, thereby destroying brick with one hit that would otherwise have required several.
Únete a Woody Pop en su lucha contra las fuerzas de la celosa Máquina Loca. ¡Prepárate para rebotes y más rebotes, y acción ilimitada, mientras Woody Pop se convierte en un héroe rompe-ladrillos!

Woody Pop sur Game Gear est un casse-briques dans lequel vous contrôlez latéralement Woody, l'esprit du bois, sur qui rebondit votre bille. Les niveaux se déroulent dans une maison, ce qui vous vaudra d'être ennuyé par de nombreux jouets sur lesquels votre balle rebondira d'une manière plus ou moins prévisible. Une fois un stage terminé, vous avez la possibilité de choisir votre destination parmi trois niveaux, ce qui rend le jeu moins linéaire que les casse-briques ordinaires.

Schließe Dich Woody Pop an, wenn er gegen die Kräfte der neidischen Mad Maschine kämpft. Bereite Dich auf Rückprälle, Abprälle und Hüpf-Bewegungen vor, während Woody Pop sich in einen Würfel-Zerschmetternden Helden verwandelt!

locale.title: World Class Leaderboard Golf
locale.synopsis:
Before the long-running Links series, Access produced the Leader Board lineage, which concludes here. Wind, snap and power are the main considerations as you dodge the bunkers, water and rough which make for more complex courses than the 8-bit versions of the original.
A course editor is provided. The courses provided include real courses like St. Andrews, a fictional designs such as The Gauntlet, which as the name suggests is designed to push your skills to the maximum.
The PC version revolutionized the use of the PC speaker to reproduce voice samples via their patented "RealSound" process. Quips like "No doubt about it, he's deep in the sandtrap", "Straight onto the fairway", and "Looks like he hit the tree, Jim." are used to provide running commentary on the gameplay.
Cuatro de los campos de golf más difíciles en el mundo un rango de golpes de salida, un green para practicar los golpes rodados. ¡Este juego los tiene todo!

World Class Leader Board est un jeu de golf sur Game Gear. Testez vos compétences de golfeur sur des parcours aussi variés que techniques tels que Cypress Creek ou Saint-Andrews. Les effets et voix digitalisées contribuent à donner l'impression d'assister à une retransmission télévisée.

locale.title: World Cup Soccer
locale.synopsis: World Cup Soccer lets the player choose from 24 International soccer teams where the player can enter in the World Cup tournament. The player will compete in an Elimination League where the player must earn enough points, either through victories or draws, to qualify for the World Cup tournament where the games are a Sudden Death format. Friends can also compete head-to-head in an Exhibition mode using the Gear-to-Gear cable.

World Cup Soccer le permite al jugador elegir entre 24 equipos internacionales de fútbol donde el jugador puede participar en el torneo de la Copa del Mundo. El jugador competirá en una Elimination League donde el jugador debe ganar suficientes puntos, ya sea a través de victorias o sorteos, para calificar para el torneo de la Copa del Mundo donde los juegos son un formato de Muerte Súbita. Los amigos también pueden competir cara a cara en un modo de Exhibición usando el cable Gear-to-Gear.
Tengen World Cup Soccer vous propose de jouer au foot avec 24 équipes mondiales des années 90 dans une compétition non officielle.

locale.title: World Cup USA 94
locale.synopsis: For the third World Cup in succession, US Gold had the license to produce the official game. They entrusted Tiertex with the task, who produced a top-down game recreating the full tournament. As well as the 24 teams who qualified for the tournament, other significant footballing nations like England, France and Denmark could be drafted in. The presentation of the menus is largely icon-based, with the official mascot featuring prominently. Tackling is difficult and passing is easy, making for a flowing end-to-end style of play.

Personalización del juego para satisfacer el estilo futbolístico del usuario usando las opciones previas al partido: regla de pase al portero, control del driblaje, regla de fuera de juego, duración del partido, velocidad, control de balón, tiempo, saque de falta, editor de formación y saque de esquina.nnAnimación con más de 3.000 secuencias.

World Cup USA 94 sur Game Gear est le jeu officiel de la Coupe du Monde de football 1994, à laquelle la France n'a pas participé. Qu'à cela ne tienne, vous pourrez changer le cours de l'histoire en tentant de qualifier les bleus, mais aussi nos amis Anglais, compagnons d'infortune en cette triste année. Bien que peu esthétique, le tacle est de rigueur dans ce jeu où il se révèle le moyen le plus efficace pour s'emparer du ballon.

Realistisches Spiel mit über 15 vershiedenen SpieleraktionennnFlugkopfballnnVolleyschußnnFallrückziehernnShießennnHebernnHackentricknnTorwartparadennTorjubelnnGestalten Sie das Spiel vor dem Anstoß mit zahlreichen Optionen Ihren Vorlieben entsprechendnnRückpaßregel ein/ausnnBallbeherrschung (klebefaktor) niedrig/mittel/hoch/supernnAbseitregel ein/ausnnSpieldauer 3 bis 45 Minuten lange HalbzeitennnTempo niedrig/mittel/hochnnBallstoppen ein/ausnnWitterung ein/ausnnFreistoß !nnnnStrategie Bestimmen Sie Ihre SpieltaktiknnnnEckstoßnnnnÜber 3000 Frames Animation

Se você mora neste planeta, já deve estar sabendo que nos EUA, em 1994, estará acontecendo o maior evento do futebol mundial: a Copa do Mundo.nnnnE para que você não fique se divertindo apenas durante os jogos, foi feito um jogo - o único oficial da Copa do Mundo - que vai refletir tudo que está rolando nos gramados norte-americanos.nnnnWorld Cup USA 94 é o mais completo jogo de futebol já desenvolvido para Master System. Você vai poder dar passes incríveis, colocando na bola o efeito que desejar, mudar as regras oficiais, alterar as velocidades dos jogadores e até alterar a formação dos grupos da Copa do Mundo.nnnnAcabou? Claro que não! Há ainda a escolha das estratégias do seu time em campo, duração das partidas, password para gravar um campeonato e reiniciar quando quiser e 8 opções de idiomas.nnnnCom World Cup USA 94 você vai entrar para a galeria dos grandes campeões!

locale.title: World Derby
locale.synopsis: A Japanese derby stallion racing game/betting simulator for the Game Gear handheld.
Juega a este estupendo juego de carreras de caballos en tu Game Gear y consigue ser el mejor.
World Derby est un simulateur de course hippique.

locale.title: World Series Baseball
locale.synopsis:
This game will satisfy if you're a baseball fan. It features a season mode of varying lengths, an exibition mode, and a link game mode. When you play exibition games you can choose between 3 stadiums. Another interesting feature on this game is you can create and name your own team and use them during exibition games.
The stats used in this game came from the 1992 season.

El único juego de béisbol de Game Gear con los 28 equipos de la Major League, incluidos los Colorado Rockies y los Florida Marlins. Listas completas de equipos con los 700 jugadores de Major League.nnEnvíe todas sus amenazas de bolas largas como Bonds, Thomas, Tartabull y McGriff contra los mejores jugadores de béisbol como Langston, McDowell, Glavine o Gooden.nnImagine a los Yankees vs. Mets o Cubs vs. White Sox en el modo de exhibición.nnJuega el All-Star Game y la verdadera World Series.

World Series Baseball est un jeu de Baseball avec les équipes américaines de 1992. Le jeu contient un mode saison (de différente longueur), un mode exhibition et un mode link pour jouer avec 2 consoles.

game.name: Nomo Hideo No World Series Baseball

locale.title: World Series Baseball '95
locale.synopsis: Nomo Hideo no World Series Baseball is a baseball game for the Sega Game Gear released as part of the World Series Baseball series in Japan. It include the japan superstar Nomo Hideo and is a conversion of the US only game World Series Baseball

World Series Baseball '95 presenta la nueva "Center Field View" que te pone cara a cara con los mejores bateadores de la Liga Mayor. Elige hurlers como Maddux, Rijo, McDowell o Massina para enfrentarte a bateadores como Boads, Justice, González o Thomas. ¡Selecciona cualquiera de los 28 equipos de la Major League y juega una temporada completa con juegos de liga real, playoffs y la Serie Mundial!

Nomo Hideo no World Series Baseball est un jeu de baseball sortie uniquement au japon et faisant partie de la série "World Series Baseball". Il inclu la super star japonaise Nomo Hideo dans une conversion du jeu World Series Baseball sortie uniquement au US.

locale.title: Nomo Hideo no World Series Baseball
WWF Raw
locale.synopsis:
WWF Raw is a professional wrestling game featuring 10 superstars from the World Wrestling Federation. The wrestlers you can choose from include Bret "Hit Man" Hart, Bam Bam Bigelow, 1-2-3 Kid, Diesel, Doink, Lex Luger, Luna Vachon, Owen Hart, Razor Ramon, Shawn Michaels, Undertaker, and Yokozuna.
In this game, you attempt to pin your opponent to the mat by reducing his power meter until he can fight no more. There is a large number of moves to perform, including turnbuckle maneuvers and "illegal" acts such as hitting your opponent with a metal folding chair.
This game supports up to 4 simultaneous players, and has the following game modes: One-on-One, Tag Team, Bedlam, Survivor Series, Royal Rumble, Raw Endurance Match, and Rematch.

¡WWF RAW golpea tus sentidos con el caos más implacable! Las superestrellas más populares de la WWF, cada una con su propio movimiento característico, la acción salvaje del equipo de etiqueta y los agotadores combates de la Serie Survivor se interponen entre tú y el cinturón del Campeonato.nnEsto es WWF RAW... y Raw es Guerra!

WWF RAW est un jeu vidéo basé sur l'émission télévisée et branche professionnelle du même nom dirigée par la World Wrestling Federation, commercialisé sur consoles Super Nintendo, Sega 32X, Mega Drive, Game Gear et Game Boy fin 1994 et début 1995 par Acclaim Entertainment. Il s'agit de la suite du jeu WWF Royal Rumble commercialisé en 1993, concluant la trilogie des jeux vidéo WWF de chez LJN. Le joueur peut combattre dans des matchs à un-contre-un, en tag team, bedlam (tornado tag), aux Survivor Series, au Royal Rumble, ou dans un match Raw Endurance.
WWF RAW met en scène les différents catcheurs possédant chacun ses propres prises et coups. Le jeu ajoute également de nombreuses prises exclusives qui n'ont pas été ajoutées dans les jeux précédents, comme le DDT, fallaway slam, et autres types de souplesses. les catcheurs diffèrent selon leurs attributs en vélocité, force, stamina et poids.

locale.title: WWF Wrestlemania Steel Cage Challenge
locale.synopsis: WWF Wrestlemania: Steel Cage Challenge is a Sports game, developed by Teeny Weeny Games and published by Flying Edge, which was released in 1993.

Acepta el reto más duro de la lucha libre: el reto de la jaula de acero ¡WWF WrestleMania Steel Cage Challenge! Controla cada uno de los estupendos movimientos y maniobras llenas de acción - Lanzamiento contra las cuerdas, Codazos, Aplastamientos, Patadones. Cuando estés preparado para el reto final de la lucha libre, la jaula de acero estará lista para ti.

WWF WrestleMania: Steel Cage Challenge est un jeu vidéo de catch professionnel basé sur la World Wrestling Federation. Les modes varient entre matchs à un contre un, tag team, WWF Championship (dans lequel le joueur choisit son personnage et combat les autres pour devenir WWF Champion) et Tag Team Championship.
Retrouvez dix personnages tel que Hulk Hogan, Randy Savage, I.R.S., Ted DiBiase, Ric Flair, Tatanka, Bret Hart, Papa Shango, The Undertaker et Shawn Michaels.
Chacun des catcheurs possèdent les mêmes types de mouvements qui consistent entre autres à donner des coups de poings et coups de pieds, faire des prises (body slam, throw, coups de boule), des attaques rapides (flying clothesline, dropkick) et des attaques au sol. Aucune prise de finition n'est exposée. Cependant, c'est le premier jeu vidéo pour console de salon basé sur la WWF à montrer des matchs en cage (les premiers matchs en cage étaient auparavant exposés dans jeu d'arcade WWF WrestleFest).

Nimm die härteste Herausforderung im Wrestling an: die WWF WrestleMania Steel Cage Challenge! Du steuerst die gesamte Action mit jedem Griff oder Wurf - Clotheslines, Elbowdrops, Bodyslams, Dropkicks. Bist du bereit für das größte aller Wrestling-Matches? Dann steig in den Stahlkäfig!

locale.title: X-Men
locale.synopsis:
X-Men is a sidescrolling beat'em up/platform game, much like its homonymous Mega Drive/ Genesis counterpart. Several X-Men characters are playable throughout the game. The player can choose from two characters from the start, Cyclops and Wolverine, and three Levels are accessible. In the course of the game, the player can unlock five other X-Men, namely Storm, Iceman, Rogue, Nightcrawler and Psylocke.
The story is that most of the X-Men have been kidnapped by Magneto, which is the reason why only Cyclops and Wolverine are available from the start. Apparently, unlocking the characters equals rescuing him. On the way, there several foes from the X-Men universe to beat, and at the end, Magneto once again needs a reprehension.
The basic mechanics of the game are punching, (double-)jumping and jump-kicking. Furthermore, pressing Start activates/ deactivates the characters mutant ability, for example Wolverine's claws or Cyclops' laser beams. Using it however drains a limited amount of energy, which can be refreshed by finding "X"-symbols.

Hijos del átomo. Mutantes. Héroes. Dedicado a luchar contra los males del mundo! Pero ahora, la mayoría de los X-Men han sido secuestrados. ¡Solo las garras de adamantio de Lobezno y los rayos explosivos de Cíclope pueden salvar a sus compañeros de equipo desaparecidos! Elige entre 7 personajes X-Men: Tormenta, Hombre de Hielo, Pícara, Rondador Nocturno y Mariposa Mental para que ellos también puedan liberar sus poderes mutantes. ¡6 niveles de guerra mutante, rompecabezas asesinos y salvajes efectos especiales! Combate contra los villanos: Sauron, Reina Brood, Callisto, Sebastian Shaw, Omega Rojo y Magneto.

Magneto a mis au point le plus meurtrier des virus informatique dans le monde. Son seul but : détruire les X -Men . Wolverine , Gambit , Cyclope et Nightcrawler rejoignent Storm, Iceman , Archangel, Jean Grey et Rogue pour l'arrêter. Leur cible est la base secrète de Magneto sur l'Asteroid M. Mais en Juggernaut , Sabretooth , Mojo et Deathbird sont en embuscade. Est-ce que les griffes d'adamantium de Wolverine et les cartes à jouer chargée d'énergie de Gambit seront suffisant pour vaincre les forces de Magneto ? C'est à toi de voir.

locale.title: X-Men : Gamemaster's Legacy
locale.synopsis: A plague AND a deadly double-cross! The Legacy Virus is annihilating mutantkind and the GamesMaster is holding the key. He offers the X-Men a chance to play his game and win the secret...BUT he also offers the same to their arch-enemies with the ADDED satisfaction of destroying the X-Men! The X-Men must split up to find the cure or perish forever.

¡Una plaga Y una doble cruz mortal! El Virus Legacy está aniquilando Mutantkind y GamesMaster está sosteniendo la llave. Él ofrece a los X-Men la oportunidad de jugar su juego y ganar el secreto ... ¡PERO también ofrece lo mismo a sus archienemigos con la AGREGADA satisfacción de destruir a los X-Men! Los X-Men deben dividirse para encontrar la cura o perecer para siempre.nn7 personajes jugables - Cíclope y Tormenta buscan a Lobezno, Gambito, Pícara, Bishop y Jean Grey. Completa cada nivel y vuelve a unir al equipo uno por uno.nn8 niveles abrasadores de combate cuerpo a cuerpo desde el Ártico a las fortalezas egipcias y en un enclave lunar.nnLos X-Men luchan contra el Infierno: Mister Siniestro, Dyscordia, Sienna Blaze, Apocalipsis, Cronomante, Exodus, Shinobi Shaw y Fabian Cortez.
X-Men: Gamesmaster's Legacy est un jeu de plateforme 2D prenant place dans l'univers des X-men de Marvel

locale.title: X-Men : Mojo World
locale.synopsis:
In a dark future, Mojo has his own TV show where the participants fight to death. He has imprisoned some X-Men from the past to recreate their greatest battles. Wolverine and Rogue have to enter the game and rescue their friends, then defeating Mojo to return back home.
In this platform game, the player starts choosing either Wolverine or Rogue. At each new level beaten, a new X-Men will be available: first Gambit, then Cyclops, Havoc and finally Shard. If one of the X-Men dies, the player has to start the level again, choosing among the remaining X-Men the one to play. After all the X-Men have died, the game is over.
Each character can activate his/her power at will. Wolverine can use his claws, Rogue can fly, Gambit can throw explosive cards, Cyclops will fire optic blasts, Havoc fires plasma blasts and Shard fires energy blasts. The characters have an energy meter and a power meter, which will worn out as they are hit or use their powers, respectively. They can find items to restore their energy and power.
Gameplay consists basically in finding the way out of each of the six levels. Once finding it, the character will face a boss, usually known characters from the comics like Magneto, Fitzroy, a Sentinel, etc. The last boss is Mojo himself.

Los X-Men enfrentan su aventura más brutal de todos los tiempos. Espiral, una bella productora de televisión con 6 brazos y habitante de Mojo World, enfrenta a los X-Men contra sus enemigos más difíciles de todos los tiempos en la última pelea televisada, "The Greatest Battles of the X-Men". Si su esquema funciona, los ciudadanos de Mojo World se sintonizarán y ella se convertirá en su nuevo gobernante.nnnnX-Men del pasado, presente y futuro.nnTen cuidado con Mojo, Magneto, Centinela, Cronomante y Agent. ¡Te destruiremos!nn¡Aventúrate a través de Nueva Orleans, una futurista ciudad de Nueva York y Mojo World!

Dans un sombre futur, Mojo possède son propre show télévisé dans lequel deux concurrents doivent se battre jusqu'à la mort et il a malheureusement enfermé quelques X-Men pour recréer leurs grandes batailles. Dans X-Men : Mojo World sur Game Gear, vous devez aider Wolverine et Rogue à libérer leurs amis. Chaque niveau terminé libérera un X-Men qui sera aussitôt jouable. Lorsque vous mourez, vous devez choisir parmi ceux restants. Vous affronterez des boss tirés du comics tels que Magneto, Fitzroy

Os X-Men enfrentam seu mais brutal episódio. Spiral, uma bela produtora de televisão munida de seis braços (e como será que ela ainda pode ser bela?), está programando um combate final dos X-Men contra seus piores inimigos, com transmissão ao vivo para os telespectadores. Se este plano funcionar, os cidadãos de Mojo World ligarão seu aparelho de TV para assistirem à disputa e ela se tornará, então, sua nova governante!nnnnX-Men diretamente do passado, do presente e do futuro.nnAventure-se em New Orleans, na cidade futurista de Nova York e no Mojo World!nnCuidado com Mojo, o Magneto, as Sentinelas e os Agentes. Eles querem destrui-lo!

game.name: Yogi Bear In Yogi Bear's Goldrush

locale.title: Yogi Bear in Yogi Bear's Goldrush
locale.synopsis: Yogi Bear in Yogi Bear's Gold Rush is an Action game, developed by Empire Interactive and published by GameTek, which was cancelled before it was released.

¡Aquí viene Yogi! El oso de dibujos animados favorito de Estados Unidos está llegando al Game Gear. Jellystone Park está en problemas. El malvado Jake ha robado todo el dinero del parque. Yogi debe abrirse camino a través de las diferentes áreas del parque, encontrar las 12 cajas fuertes secretas y vencer a Jake, de lo contrario el parque se cerrará. *No llegó a salir y fue cancelado.

Un bon petit jeu de plateformes avec notre ami Yogi ! Cependant la maniabilité laisse un peu à désirer dans les moments axés sur l'agilité... Préférez la version Megadrive qui est bien plus intéressante.

game.name: Yu Yu Hakusho - Horobishimono No Gyakushuu

locale.title: Yu Yu Hakusho - Horobishimono no Gyakushuu
locale.synopsis: Yu Yu Hakusho: Horobishi Mono no Gyakushuu is an action game for the Sega Game Gear. It is based upon the YuYu Hakusho manga and anime series.

Eres el delincuente adolescente Yusuke Urameshi, que es nombrado "Detective del mundo subterráneo" después de ser asesinado en un accidente automovilístico mientras trataba de salvar un la vida del niño. Su tarea es investigar varios casos que involucran fantasmas y demonios en el mundo humano.
Yu Yu Hakusho: Horobishi Mono no Gyakushuu est un jeu d'action basé le manga et la série animé du même nom.

locale.title: Yu Yu Hakusho : Horobishimono no Gyakushuu

game.name: Yu Yu Hakusho 2 - Gekitou! Nanakyou No Tatakai

locale.title: Yu Yu Hakusho 2 - Gekitou! Nanakyou no Tatakai
locale.synopsis: Yu Yu Hakusho II: Gekitou! Nanakyou no Tatakai is an action game for the Sega Game Gear. It is based upon the YuYu Hakusho manga and anime series.

Eres el delincuente adolescente Yusuke Urameshi, que es nombrado "Detective del mundo subterráneo" después de ser asesinado en un accidente automovilístico mientras trataba de salvar un la vida del niño. Su tarea es investigar varios casos que involucran fantasmas y demonios en el mundo humano.nnCon respecto a su precuela es totalmente diferente ya que deja de ser un Beat'em up y pasa a ser un juego de lucha 1vs1.
Suite de Yu Yu Hakusho: Horobishi Mono no Gyakushuu Il s'agit toujours d'un jeu d'action basé le manga et la série animé du même nom.

locale.title: Yu Yu Hakusho 2 : Gekitou! Nanakyou no Tatakai
Zan Gear
locale.synopsis: Zan Gear is a simulation game for the Sega Game Gear.
Magnífico juego de estrategia por turnos basado en una historia alternativa. Este juego perteneciente a la saga Zan ahora portátil en tu Game Gear.
Zan Gear est un jeu de stratégie pour 1 à 2 joueurs (alternativement) exclusivement sortie au japon

locale.title: Zool
locale.synopsis:
His name is Zool. He is a Ninja in the 2345th dimension, 6 worlds each with 3 stages.
In this platformer, you can run, jump, climb walls and shoot the enemies. In the levels are also some power-ups for Zool. There are life-spending hearts, smart bombs, shields, more powerful jump-skill and a twin Zool. This "twin" makes all your motions a few seconds after you do.
In the options you can change the difficulty and the game-speed two times, the continues and the background music (Rock or Funk).

Cada año el mundo de los juegos se ve sacudido por un juego tan maravilloso, rápido, lleno de color, total, absorbente, 'mega', imponente, variado, increíble, y lleno de fabulosas características e inesperadas sorpresas, que todos se quedan pasma dos y dicen: ¡ESTE ES!; este año 'ZOOL, THE NINJA FROM THE Nth DIMENSIÓN' es ¡EL JUEGO!

Vous incarnez Zool dans ce jeu d'action/plates-formes sur Game Gear, un ninja de la "Nième Dimension" qui a la capacité de se déplacer très rapidement et de grimper aux parois. Le jeu vous offre la possibilité (originale pour l'époque), de choisir votre musique (Rock ou Funk) ainsi que la vitesse du jeu, qui est une composante essentielle.

Einmal pro Jahr wird die Welt der Computergames von einem Spiel aufgerüttelt, das so beeindruckend, schnell, farbenfroh, großartig, anspruchsvoll, super, atemberaubend, abwechslungsreich, unglaublich und voller fabelhafter Features und irrer Überraschungen ist, daß jeder gleich weiß: "Das ist der absolute Knüller!"In diesem Jahr Ist das zweifelsohne ZOOL, THE NINJA FROM THE "Nth" DIMENSION!

locale.title: Zoop
locale.synopsis:
Fast-paced action-puzzle game where the player eliminates colored shapes that are approaching his alter ego, another colored shape, before they reach the top, ala Tetris.
In order to eliminate the other shapes, you must point your piece at it and 'fire'. If the shape is the same color as your piece, the shape is eliminated, as well as all of the shapes of the same color behind it, until your piece hits a piece of a different color. If the shape is of a different color, or it is hit when collecting a line of similar shapes, your piece exchanges colors with the shape.

Aquí dentro de esta pequeña caja está la emoción que anhelas, el desafío que necesitas. Nivel tras nivel de acción para quemar el cerebro proveniente de todos lados, más y más rápido hasta que tus pulgares estén entumecidos, tus ojos te duelan y tu mente se derrita. Y solo hay UNA cosa que sabes ... "¡No puedo dejar de jugar este juego!"

Zoop sur Game Gear est un puzzle-game dans lequel il faut assembler des blocs de couleur identique, de telle manière à éviter qu'ils ne vous submergent. L'originalité du jeu tient au fait que vous êtes placé au centre des blocs et devez gérer ces éléments de tos les côtés de l'écran. Des blocs de couleur apparaissent à allure régulière et font grimper les colonnes. Pour faire diminuer celles-ci, il vous faut absolument mettre en contact des blocs de couleur identiques.
